<P_I,142>

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_039:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Item , I sent yow word ye shuld inquere what bribes or rewardes Edmond
Clere toke of outlawed men in Norffolk , or any other fals prattes that
he hath doon . PASTON,I,142.039.936

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_039:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Dought ye nat he woll not answere of half the good that he hath taken
of outlawed men , if it were well inquered . PASTON,I,142.039.937

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_039:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
James Gresham shall cone telle where ye shall best inquere ,
PASTON,I,142.039.938

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_039:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and such as ye can knowe send me iustly word . PASTON,I,142.039.939

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_039:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Item , that the exspence mad by Daubeney for myn howsold be mad vp ,
and that Daubeney be charged with all such somes as ye or I or Richard
Calle haue paijd for hym , and ye for that he hath paijd for yow .
PASTON,I,142.039.940

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_039:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
As for that I paijd of that was Daubeneys charge , I toke Calle therof
a bille , wherof lete Calle send me ayen a copy , and also send me the
copy of the bille of your reseytes whech ye haue hom with yow from hens
; PASTON,I,142.039.941

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_039:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and that Daubeney and ye and Call send me a remembrauns of the
exspensis of myn housold and yowres , your children , and the college ,
and all other foreyn paymentes , and that in the makyng of Pecokkes
acompt such thynges as he hath paijd for the college or the housold be
mad as mony deliuerid to Calle or Daubeney , and that in ther acompt
thei to aske alowaunce of the paymentes by the handes of Pecok ,
PASTON,I,142.039.942

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_039:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
for I woll no-thyng haue charged nor discharged withinne the acomptes
of any maners but only such as longyth to the exspensis of the seid
maners . PASTON,I,142.039.943

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_039:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Item , that ye see all acomptes be mad vp , and in especiall for my
barly . PASTON,I,142.039.944

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_039:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Notwithstandyng , inasmoch that ye haue had in moch barly and greynes
for dettes of your tenauntes of Mautby , therfore Pecokes acompt must
be mad first , that such greynes as he hath deliuerid may be charged
vpon the maltster or vpon any other that haue reseyved it .
PASTON,I,142.039.945

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_039:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Item , lete Pecokkes acompt be mad aftir the forme of Norwodes acompt ,
as I suppose is wretyn in your bille of erandes . PASTON,I,142.039.946

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_039:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Item , take good heed at the charge and discharge of the acompt of
Fastolffes barly in all plases , PASTON,I,142.039.947

Selot , had geue a jugement in the mater of the presentacion for the
chirche of Drayton or $Eueret cam thedir . PASTON,I,143.039.956

Item , your seid sones write hedir +tat thei wold put some man in
Cotton betymes , and +tat your yonger sone seith he wold haue do it or
this tyme but that he hath no mony in his purs to pay for his costes
thedir , wherfore he desirith to haue some mony therfore till he myght
gadir it vp . Wherfore , if thei be go or whan thei goo , remembir hem
that thei haue diuers tymes had mony thedirward and do right nought ,
and myn aduersaries sent thedir men without mony and had ther intent .

hele and bodili welfare : PASTON,I,149.041.1030

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1436:16
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:31
LETTER:PASTON_041:M4:1452:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and if it plese +gowre goode brodorod to here of myn wellefare , at +te
makyng of +tis bylle I was in good hele . PASTON,I,149.041.1031

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1436:16
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:31
LETTER:PASTON_041:M4:1452:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And if it leke +gowre good brodorod to remembre +te letter +tat I sent
to +gow of +te noyse +tat was telde of +gow , +tat +ge schuld a be on
of +te capetayns of +te ryserse in Norfolk , and how +tat j scholere of
Cambryg , qweche is parsone of Welle , schuld an vtteryd ferthere to
+gowre grete schalndyr , besechyng +gow to vndyrstond +tat +te seyde
parsone of Welle was sone +tat tyme at Lundon , were he harde sey of j
swyre of ij c. marc be +gere +tat +ge and Master Thomas Wellys wolde
<P_I,150> sewe +te seyd parsone Welle for +gowre schalndyr .
PASTON,I,150.041.1032

schul lese +te same to +te parson of Welle . Were-fore thys jentylman
Rycheforthe taket grete thowt , and pray me to wrythe to +gow +tat ye
wulde sese +gowre suthe tylle +te tyme +tat +ge wulde asyne +tat I
mythe speke wythe +gow , and odyr sundry haue speke wyth +gow of +te
same mater ; PASTON,I,150.041.1036

on Friday last was , in +te mornyng , Wurceter and I were come to
London be viij of +te clok ; PASTON,I,157.045.1156

And he desyryd me to wrythe +gow a letter in hys name and put trust in
+gow in gaderyng of +te good togeder ; and pray +gow to do so and haue
all his good owthe of euery place of his , his awne place , qwere so
euer they were , and ley it secretly were as +ge thowth best at +gowre
assynement , &c. , tyll +tat he speke wyth +gow hym-selff ;
PASTON,I,157.045.1160

to Lundon ward +tis day a-bowthe ij after non , PASTON,I,163.046.1197

{ED:91._TO_JOHN_PASTON_I_1462,_ABOUT_20_JULY}

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:41

<font> To myn wurchipfull broder Jon Paston . </font>
PASTON,I,166.047.1243

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:41
LETTER:PASTON_047:M4:1462:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Ryththe wurchipfull broder , I recomand $me to +gow .
PASTON,I,166.047.1244

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1436:26
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:41
LETTER:PASTON_047:M4:1462:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Lekit it +gow to wethe Jon off Dam is come to towne and purposit hym to
tary here a day are ij , are lengar , I can thynk , and he be desyryd ;
were-fore I pray +gow , and as I haue a-fore +tis tyme desiryd +gow +te
same , that suche materis as hathe be comunyd now lathe be-twyx myn
moder , +gow , and hym may take <P_I,167> some good conclucyon be-twyx
owre-selff here at hom . PASTON,I,167.047.1245

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:41
LETTER:PASTON_047:M4:1462:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And jn myn consayt , sauyng $+gowr better avyse , it were so most
conuenyent and wurchipfull for us all and comforthe to all owre fryndis
. PASTON,I,167.047.1246

take be-twix vs that jche off us all schuld jnyoy +te wylleffare off
odyr , qweche I trust wyth +gowre good help schall be rythe wyll .

<P_I,168>

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:NEPHEW:1442:25
LETTER:PASTON_048:M4:1467:AC:FAMILY_OTHER
Myn suster , Arblaster , and I haue apoyntyd +tat we schall kepe non
howsold +tis terme but go to borde , were-fore we auyse +gow to puruay
for us a logynge nere a-bowt myn lord Chanselere +tat be honest ,
PASTON,I,168.048.1268

{ED:108._TO_RICHARD_ROOS_PROBABLY_1479,_28_NOVEMBER}

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_II:MALE:_:1436:43?
RECIPIENT:RICHARD_ROOS:MALE:_:1410?:69?
LETTER:PASTON_049:M4:1479?:COPY:OTHER
<font> $To <em> my </em> Master Ros $at Refham <em> be +tis lettre
</em> deliuerd . </font> PASTON,I,188.049.1305

<P_I,189>

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_II:MALE:_:1436:43?
RECIPIENT:RICHARD_ROOS:MALE:_:1410?:69?
LETTER:PASTON_049:M4:1479?:COPY:OTHER
Master Ros , I recommand me to you as humbly as I can , thankyng you
nat allonly for <em> ... </em> which ben grete deynte` in this contre`
, and for your brawne and your crane , but also for the <em> ... </em>
labour that ye toke for me in commyng hider to Wodnorton to your grete
disese . PASTON,I,189.049.1306

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_II:MALE:_:1436:43?
RECIPIENT:RICHARD_ROOS:MALE:_:1410?:69?
LETTER:PASTON_049:M4:1479?:COPY:OTHER
For I vndirstonde be Master <em> ... </em> +tat was her with me agein
yisterday +tat ye cam home both colde and late and causid hym and his
broder <em> both to abide </em> with you al nyght and made them ful
goode chier , as he saith . PASTON,I,189.049.1307

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_II:MALE:_:1436:43?
RECIPIENT:RICHARD_ROOS:MALE:_:1410?:69?
LETTER:PASTON_049:M4:1479?:COPY:OTHER
Sir , your seruauntes Symond Gonnour and Mils , whan they cam last from
you , tolde me +tat ye desired me to com by you to Norwiche wardes ,
and +tat if I wolde so do ye wolde ride forth to Norwich .
PASTON,I,189.049.1308

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_II:MALE:_:1436:43?
RECIPIENT:RICHARD_ROOS:MALE:_:1410?:69?
LETTER:PASTON_049:M4:1479?:COPY:OTHER
And morouer , ser , I $remember +tat ye tolde me the last tyme +tat I
was with you at Refham +tat ye wolde dispose your-silf affore this
Cristenmas to take a journey to se my lady of Norffolk ; which if ye
will parfourme nowe I wolde be verrey glade to awaite vpon you and to
accompany with you thider . PASTON,I,189.049.1309

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_II:MALE:_:1436:43?
RECIPIENT:RICHARD_ROOS:MALE:_:1410?:69?
LETTER:PASTON_049:M4:1479?:COPY:OTHER
And ye coude not take your journey thider in a better season ,
PASTON,I,189.049.1310

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_II:MALE:_:1436:43?
RECIPIENT:RICHARD_ROOS:MALE:_:1410?:69?
LETTER:PASTON_049:M4:1479?:COPY:OTHER
for ther is commyn hider to me a seruaunte of my lord of Bukynghams ,
which hath abiden her this iij or iiij dais and wil not departe hens
till he haue me forth with hym to my lady of Norffolk for a serten
mater touching my said lord of Bukyngham , which mater I trust if ye
com I shal handill it so +tat ye shal do both my lorde and hir a
plesure . PASTON,I,189.049.1311

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_II:MALE:_:1436:43?
RECIPIENT:RICHARD_ROOS:MALE:_:1410?:69?
LETTER:PASTON_049:M4:1479?:COPY:OTHER
And ser , if ye wil take this journey I <em> wil awaite </em> vpon you
and com homewardes ageyn with you be my Lady Beaumont and my cousyn Ser
William PASTON,I,189.049.1312

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_II:MALE:_:1436:43?
RECIPIENT:RICHARD_ROOS:MALE:_:1410?:69?
LETTER:PASTON_049:M4:1479?:COPY:OTHER
<em> ... </em> jntende to take this journey I pray you to sende me
aunswer by the brynger herof , PASTON,I,189.049.1313

from hens on Monday in the mornyng and to ly at Norwiche that nyght ,
and <em> vpon Tewisday </em> to ride forth to my lady of Norffolk .
PASTON,I,189.049.1314

<P_I,192>

{ED:111._TO_JOHN_KYNG_1480,_24_FEBRUARY}

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_II:MALE:_:1436:44
RECIPIENT:JOHN_KYNG:MALE:_:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_051:M4:1480:COPY:OTHER
<font> To John Kynge , fermour of my maner of Harwelbury in Kelsall be
Royston , be this delyuerid . </font> PASTON,I,192.051.1353

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_II:MALE:_:1436:44
RECIPIENT:JOHN_KYNG:MALE:_:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_051:M4:1480:COPY:OTHER
John Kyng , I grete yow hartely well , PASTON,I,192.051.1354

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_II:MALE:_:1436:44
RECIPIENT:JOHN_KYNG:MALE:_:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_051:M4:1480:COPY:OTHER
and I vnderstond , as well by my frende Syr William Storar as by
Richard Browne , that as well my kynnesman Syr John Paston that dede is
as my kynnesman John Paston that now leveth have ben wyth yow and yovyn
yow many grete thretis for that ye , acordyng to the trowth , tolde
vn-to them that ye ocupyed my maner of Harwelbury be my leese and be my
ryght . PASTON,I,192.051.1355

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_II:MALE:_:1436:44
RECIPIENT:JOHN_KYNG:MALE:_:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_051:M4:1480:COPY:OTHER
And furthermore I vnderstond , not wythstondyng the seyde grete thretis
, that ye , lyke a full trwe , harty frende , have delyd and fastely
a-bedyn in my tytill and wolde not retorne to none of them . Wherfor I
hartely thank yow , PASTON,I,192.051.1356

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_II:MALE:_:1436:44
RECIPIENT:JOHN_KYNG:MALE:_:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_051:M4:1480:COPY:OTHER
and furthar-more to corage yow in yowr fast dealyng I schew on-to yow
that I have ryght bothe in law and in concience , wher-by I promyse yow
on my feythe to de-fende yow and save yow harmeles for the occupacion
of the londe , or any thynge that ye schall doo in my titill a-gaynst
hym , and it schulde cost me as moche as the maner is worth ; and also
a-nother tyme to doo asmoche for yow and it ly in my powre , yf ye have
ony mater to doo ther , as I may doo for yow . PASTON,I,192.051.1357

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_II:MALE:_:1436:44
RECIPIENT:JOHN_KYNG:MALE:_:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_051:M4:1480:COPY:OTHER
And also I here say by my seid frende Syr William Storar and by Richard
Brown that ye ar of suche substaunce and of suche trust and suche favor
in the contre` ther that it lithe in yowr powre to do a goode turne for
yowr frende . PASTON,I,192.051.1358

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_II:MALE:_:1436:44
RECIPIENT:JOHN_KYNG:MALE:_:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_051:M4:1480:COPY:OTHER
Wretyn at London the xxiiij=ti= day of Februari . PASTON,I,192.051.1359

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_II:MALE:_:1436:44
RECIPIENT:JOHN_KYNG:MALE:_:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_051:M4:1480:COPY:OTHER
Be William Paston PASTON,I,192.051.1360

{ED:116._TO_JOHN_PASTON_I_1461,_25_AUGUST}

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:19
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:40
LETTER:PASTON_054:M4:1461:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
<font> To hijs rythe reuerent and worchypfwll broder John Paston .
</font> PASTON,I,199.054.1423

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:19
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:40
LETTER:PASTON_054:M4:1461:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Rythe reuerent and worchypfwll broder , I recomawnde me to +gowre good
broderhood , desieryng to herre of +goure welfare and good prosperite`
, the qwyche I pray God encresse to his pleswre and +gowre hertys hesse
; certyfyyng +gow +tat I haue spok wyth John Rwsse , and Playter spak
wyth him bothe , on Fryday be-fore Seynt Barthelmw .
PASTON,I,199.054.1424

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:19
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:40
LETTER:PASTON_054:M4:1461:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And he told vs of Howardys gydyng , qwyche mad vs rythe sory tyl we
harde +te conclusion +tat +ge hadde non harme . PASTON,I,199.054.1425

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:19
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:40
LETTER:PASTON_054:M4:1461:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Also I vnderstond by W. Pekok +tat my nevew hadde knowlache +tere-of
also vp-on Saterday nexst be-fore Seynt Barthelmwe , in +te Kyngys
howse . PASTON,I,199.054.1426

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:19
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:40
LETTER:PASTON_054:M4:1461:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Not wyth-standyng vp-on +te sam day Playter and I wryte letterys on-to
him rehersyng al the mater , fore cause if +tere were ony questionys
mevyd to hym +tere-of +tat he xwlde telle +te trowthe , in cas +tat +te
qwestions were meuyd by ony worchypfwll man , and namyd my Lord
Bowchere , PASTON,I,199.054.1427

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:19
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:40
LETTER:PASTON_054:M4:1461:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
fore my Lord Bowchere was wyth +te Kyng at +tat tym .
PASTON,I,199.054.1428

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:40
LETTER:PASTON_054:M4:1461:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
I fele by W. Pekok +tat my nevew is not +get verily aqweyntyd in +te
Kyngys howse , nore wyth +te officerys of +te Kyngys howse .
PASTON,I,199.054.1429

fore +te cokys be not charged to serue hym nore +te sewere to gyue hym

hym hom , +te qwyche xwld cause hym not to be hadde in fauore ;

{ED:118._TO_JOHN_PASTON_I_1464,_15_FEBRUARY}

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:22
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_055:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
<font> To hijs rythe worchypfwl broder John Paston the heldere ,
sqwyere , be thys delyueryd . </font> PASTON,I,202.055.1456

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:22
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_055:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Brodere , I recomawnde me to +gow after all dew recomendacions , &c .
PASTON,I,202.055.1457

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:22
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_055:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Az fore Hew Fennys obligacion , +Geluerton knowlacheyd it to be Sire
John Fastolfe is dede opynly in +te Eschekere , PASTON,I,202.055.1458

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:22
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_055:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and there he hadde is jugement to receyue +te mony and x li. fore
damagys , PASTON,I,202.055.1459

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:22
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_055:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and they report here +tat they haue a schreve after here entent +tat
wyll mak hem execucion , ore ellis return +tat +ge haue wastyd +te
godys of +te dede , so +tat they wyll haue execucion of +gowre own
goodys ore ellys a wryt to tak +gowre body . PASTON,I,202.055.1460

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:22
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_055:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Thus +ge may se they +geue no fors wat they doo , thow they xwld lesse
and stroy all +te goodys of +te dede . PASTON,I,202.055.1461

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:22
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_055:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And there-fore , fore sauacion of +te goodys of +te dede better it were
to tak sum trete` +tan to $suffer +te goodys thus to be <P_I,203> lost
. PASTON,I,203.055.1462

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:22
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_055:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Also , +Geluerton hathe ben at all +te tenauntys in Sowthewerk and
chargid hem to pay no mony but to hym . PASTON,I,203.055.1463

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:22
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_055:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Also , the Kyng hathe ben in Glowceterschere and pwnyssede hijs
rebellious a-+gens +te lawe , PASTON,I,203.055.1464

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:22
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_055:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and so he entendithe to doo in Norfolk , and after +tat in odere
contreez . PASTON,I,203.055.1465

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:22
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_055:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
God +geue grasse and good spede in hijs jornay . PASTON,I,203.055.1466

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:22
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_055:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
No more , but I pray Gode haue +gow in hijs kepyng .
PASTON,I,203.055.1467

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:22
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_055:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Wretyn on Hasse Wednysday in haste . PASTON,I,203.055.1468

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:22
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_055:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Also , I pray +gou send me xl s. +tat I tok Jamez Gressam and John
Pampyng fore +gowre materys . PASTON,I,203.055.1469

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:22
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_055:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Also , there is no man +tat hathe contentyd ony thyng in +te Kyngys
Benche of all thijs term for +gour materys , PASTON,I,203.055.1470

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:22
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_055:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and +tat makythe the clerkys and +gowre aturnay wery .
PASTON,I,203.055.1471

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:22
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_055:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
I trow I xall be fayn to contente hem PASTON,I,203.055.1472

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:22
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43

PASTON,I,203.056.1475

LETTER:PASTON_056:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Ryght worshypfull brothyre , I recomawnde me to +gow after all dew
recomendacions , &c . PASTON,I,203.056.1476

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_056:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Plesse it +gow to wett +tat after +tat I harde say +tat +te parson of
Blowfelde wasse com to town I went to hym to hys jn ,
PASTON,I,203.056.1477

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:22
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_056:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and he bade +te masenger say +tat he wasse not wyth-in .
PASTON,I,203.056.1478

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:22
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_056:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And I bad hym say a-gayn +tat I com thyder to hym fore hijs own
worchype and auayle , and +tat I wasse sory +tat I com so fere fore hym
. PASTON,I,203.056.1479

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:22
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_056:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And after +tat he sent fore me PASTON,I,203.056.1480

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_056:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and he cowde not fynde me , PASTON,I,203.056.1481

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_056:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and I harde say there-of ; PASTON,I,203.056.1482

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_056:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and +tan I wrott a letter resytyng how +tat he wasse sworn +gesterday
fore to say +te trowthe of al maner of materis consernyng Sire John
Fastolfe , PASTON,I,203.056.1483

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:22
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_056:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
auysyd hym to remembere qwat hijs wytnesse hadde sayd fore hijs sake
and wat schame it xwlde be to hym to say +te contrary , and also if he
sayde +te contrary +ge wold here-after proue +te trowthe and $contrary
to hys sayyng , and proue <P_I,204> hym in a periuri .
PASTON,I,204.056.1484

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:22
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_056:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And also I badde hym remembere wyth wat maner of men he delt wythe ,
PASTON,I,204.056.1485

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_056:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and I rehersyd how vntrwly they hadde don . PASTON,I,204.056.1486

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_056:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And not wyth-stondyng thys , after I met wyth hym in +te strett
PASTON,I,204.056.1487

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:22
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_056:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and spak wyth hym , PASTON,I,204.056.1488

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:22
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_056:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and I fownde hym passyng strawngely disposyd , and sor meuyd wyth
consiens +tat +ge xwld haue +te lond and fownd +te colage but wyth an c
marc. not wyth-stondyng he myth fynde in hijs consiens rythe well +tat
+te colage xwld be fowndyd in a-noder plasse but wyth an c marc. , and
+te remnaunt of +te lylode sold so +tat he myth pwrce +te mony .
PASTON,I,204.056.1489

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:22
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_056:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
So I felt by hym +tat all hijs strawngenes from +gow is fore he demythe
+tat +ge wold parte from no thyng , PASTON,I,204.056.1490

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:22
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_056:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and I told hym +te $contrary there-of to be trwe .
PASTON,I,204.056.1491

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:22
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_056:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Az thys day he is exayminid vp-on a bok to sey +te trowthe of all
thyngys as +te juge wyll aske hym fore +te jugeis jnformacion , wych I
trowe wyll not be good . Also they haue pwt jn testes a+gens +gow
iij=xx= ore iiij=xx= men . PASTON,I,204.056.1492

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:22
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_056:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Mayster Robard Kent wold fayn +tat +ge xwld gett +gow ij lycens of +te
prioris of +gowre wytnes Mayster Clement and +te monke , wyth on a datt
beyng be-fore +te comyng vp , PASTON,I,204.056.1493

AUTHOR:CLEMENT_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1442:22
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_056:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR

PASTON,I,204.056.1495

xall haue no lycens fore +gour fundacion , PASTON,I,204.056.1496

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:BROTHER:1421:43

Here colour is fore cause +ge can gett no lycens to fownde it at
Castere , werfore , thow +gour wyll were trwe , they myth lawfully
fownde it in a-noder place . PASTON,I,204.056.1499

Sterkey holdyn it a good question , PASTON,I,205.057.1517

fore +te statut is Patentes dez tenementes dount null titill est troue`

RECIPIENT:AGNES_PASTON[N.BERRY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_

louly maner I recommaund me vnto youre gode moderhode , besekeyng you
dayly and nyghtly of your moderly blissing , euer-more desiryng to here
of your welfare and prosperite` , +te which I pray God to contynw and
encresce to youre hertes desyre ; PASTON,I,206.058.1542

. PASTON,I,206.058.1543

<P_I,207>

{ED:122._TO_JOHN_PASTON_II_PROBABLY_1467,_15_DECEMBER}

AUTHOR:ELIZABETH_POYNINGS/BROWNE[N.PASTON]:FEMALE:AUNT:1429:38?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:NEPHEW:1442:25?
LETTER:PASTON_059:M4:1467?:COPY:FAMILY_OTHER
<font> To the worshipful Sir John Paston , knyght , be this delyueryd
jn hast . </font> PASTON,I,207.059.1559

AUTHOR:ELIZABETH_POYNINGS/BROWNE[N.PASTON]:FEMALE:AUNT:1429:38?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:NEPHEW:1442:25?
LETTER:PASTON_059:M4:1467?:COPY:FAMILY_OTHER
Worshipfull and with all myn hert interly wilbeloued nevoue , I
recomaunde me to yow , desyryng to here of your prosperite` and
wilefayre , which I pray all-myghti God maynteyn and encres to his
plesour and your hertes desire , thankyng God of your amendyng and
helth ; forthermore certefying yow +tat Sir Robert Fenys hath doon
grete hurte in +te lyuelode whiche perteyned to my husbond and me in
+te shire of Kent , wherin William Kene and o+ter persones arn enfeffid
, and gretly troubleth hit and receyueth <P_I,208> +te issuez and
profitez of gret part of theym . PASTON,I,208.059.1560

AUTHOR:ELIZABETH_POYNINGS/BROWNE[N.PASTON]:FEMALE:AUNT:1429:38?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:NEPHEW:1442:25?
LETTER:PASTON_059:M4:1467?:COPY:FAMILY_OTHER
And as of my seid husbondes lyuelode aswell in +te same shire as in
o+ter shirez , besyde myn jountur , my seid husbond whan he departyd
towarde +te feld of Saint Albons made and ordeyned his wille +tat I
shuld haue +te rewell of all his lyuelode , and of Edwarde , his soon
and myn , and to take +te issuez and profitez of +te seid lyuelode to
+te fyndyng of his and myn seid son , to paie his detteez and to kepe
+te right and title of +te same lyuelode which I myght nat accordyng
occupie for Ser Edwarde Ponynges , myn seid husbondes brother .
PASTON,I,208.059.1561

AUTHOR:ELIZABETH_POYNINGS/BROWNE[N.PASTON]:FEMALE:AUNT:1429:38?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:NEPHEW:1442:25?
LETTER:PASTON_059:M4:1467?:COPY:FAMILY_OTHER
And so , sith myn seid husbondes departyng , I assigned +tat +te seid
Ser Edwarde for certeyn yereez shuld haue and take +te reuenuez of +te
maners of Westwode , Estwell , Leuelond , Horsmonden , Totyndon ,
Eccles , Staundon , and Comebesden , parcell of +te seid lyuelode ,
which arn clerely yerely worth lxxvj li. xiij s. iiij d. , to +te
entent +tat +te seid Ser Edwarde shuld paye myn husbondes detteez ,
PASTON,I,208.059.1562

AUTHOR:ELIZABETH_POYNINGS/BROWNE[N.PASTON]:FEMALE:AUNT:1429:38?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:NEPHEW:1442:25?
LETTER:PASTON_059:M4:1467?:COPY:FAMILY_OTHER
for he wold not suffer me to be in rest without +tat he myght haue a
rewell in +te lyvelode . PASTON,I,208.059.1563

AUTHOR:ELIZABETH_POYNINGS/BROWNE[N.PASTON]:FEMALE:AUNT:1429:38?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:NEPHEW:1442:25?
LETTER:PASTON_059:M4:1467?:COPY:FAMILY_OTHER
And after +te seid assignement made , +te seid Robert Fenes , contrary
to trowth and withoute cause of right , interupted me and +te seid Ser
Edwarde aswell of and in +te seid maners as of o+ter maners vndirwretyn
, wher-vppon +te same Ser Edwarde suet vnto +te Kynges highnesse and
hade +te Kyngez honorable lettres vndir his signet directed to +te seid
Ser Robert Fenys , +te tenour wher-of I send vnto yow herin inclossid .
PASTON,I,208.059.1564

AUTHOR:ELIZABETH_POYNINGS/BROWNE[N.PASTON]:FEMALE:AUNT:1429:38?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:NEPHEW:1442:25?
LETTER:PASTON_059:M4:1467?:COPY:FAMILY_OTHER
And as for residue of +te lyuelode of myn seid husbondes and myn within
+te same shire of Kent wherin +te seid William Kene and o+ter arn
enfeffed , that is to say +te manerz of $Tyrlyngham , Woluerton ,
Halton , Newyngton , Bartram , Rokesley , and Northcray , with
th'appurtenauncez , I of them by myn seid husbondes wille shuld haue
residue and take +te issuez and profitez of theym .
PASTON,I,208.059.1565

AUTHOR:ELIZABETH_POYNINGS/BROWNE[N.PASTON]:FEMALE:AUNT:1429:38?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:NEPHEW:1442:25?
LETTER:PASTON_059:M4:1467?:COPY:FAMILY_OTHER
Contrarye to right and conciens , takyng away my ryght and brekyng my
seid husbondes wille +te seid Robert Fenys hath doon gret wast and
hurte ther , PASTON,I,208.059.1566

AUTHOR:ELIZABETH_POYNINGS/BROWNE[N.PASTON]:FEMALE:AUNT:1429:38?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:NEPHEW:1442:25?
LETTER:PASTON_059:M4:1467?:COPY:FAMILY_OTHER
and longtym hath take vpe +te reuenuez and profitez of +te same ,
wherthorough I haue not my ryght PASTON,I,208.059.1567

AUTHOR:ELIZABETH_POYNINGS/BROWNE[N.PASTON]:FEMALE:AUNT:1429:38?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:NEPHEW:1442:25?
LETTER:PASTON_059:M4:1467?:COPY:FAMILY_OTHER
and +te seid wille may not be parfourmed . Wherfor I hertely pray yow
+tat +ge will laboure vnto +te Kynges highnes at yt lyketh hym addres
his honorable lettres to be directed to +te seid Robert Fenys ,
dischargyng hym vtterly of +te menuraunce , occupacion , and receyt of
+te reuenuez of +te said maners of Tyrlyngham and o+ter , accordyng to
+te tenour of +te lettres labored by Ser Edwarde for +te maners
assigned to hym from +te Kynges highnes directyd to +te same Robert
Fynez , or strayter if hit may be , PASTON,I,208.059.1568

AUTHOR:ELIZABETH_POYNINGS/BROWNE[N.PASTON]:FEMALE:AUNT:1429:38?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:NEPHEW:1442:25?
LETTER:PASTON_059:M4:1467?:COPY:FAMILY_OTHER
and +tat I and myn assignez may peasseble` reioce theym ;
PASTON,I,208.059.1569

AUTHOR:ELIZABETH_POYNINGS/BROWNE[N.PASTON]:FEMALE:AUNT:1429:38?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:NEPHEW:1442:25?
LETTER:PASTON_059:M4:1467?:COPY:FAMILY_OTHER
and if eny person wold attempt to do +te contrarye +tat a commaundement
, yf it ples +te Kynges highnes , by hym myght be yevyn to my lorde
Chaunceller to seall writtynges sufficiaunt with his gret seall in
eydyng and assistyng me and myn assignez in +te same .
PASTON,I,208.059.1570

AUTHOR:ELIZABETH_POYNINGS/BROWNE[N.PASTON]:FEMALE:AUNT:1429:38?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:NEPHEW:1442:25?
LETTER:PASTON_059:M4:1467?:COPY:FAMILY_OTHER
And as for <P_I,209> +te maners of Esthall , Faukham , Asshe , and
Chelsfeld , with th'appurtenauncez , in +te said schire of Kent ,
wherof my husbond at his departur was seassed , and my son sethens vnto
+te tyme +tat +te Erle of Kent , without eny $jnquisision or title of
right for +te Kyng , by colour of +te Kynges lettres patentes entret
in-to theym and hym ther-of put owte ; and now myn lorde of Essexe
occupieth them in lyke maner and fourme . PASTON,I,209.059.1571

AUTHOR:ELIZABETH_POYNINGS/BROWNE[N.PASTON]:FEMALE:AUNT:1429:38?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:NEPHEW:1442:25?
LETTER:PASTON_059:M4:1467?:COPY:FAMILY_OTHER
Yf eny remedy therin $will $be {TEXT:wilbe} hade I pray yow attempt hit
. PASTON,I,209.059.1572

AUTHOR:ELIZABETH_POYNINGS/BROWNE[N.PASTON]:FEMALE:AUNT:1429:38?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:NEPHEW:1442:25?
LETTER:PASTON_059:M4:1467?:COPY:FAMILY_OTHER
Also forther-more I hertely pray yow +tat , if eny generall pardon be
grauntyd , +tat I may haue on for John Dane my $seruaunt , whom +te
said Robert Fenys of gret malice hath endyted of felonye ; and +tat +ge
secretly labour +tis and send me an aunsewer in writtyng in as godly
hast as {in}_P +ge may . PASTON,I,209.059.1573

AUTHOR:ELIZABETH_POYNINGS/BROWNE[N.PASTON]:FEMALE:AUNT:1429:38?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:NEPHEW:1442:25?
LETTER:PASTON_059:M4:1467?:COPY:FAMILY_OTHER
As soon as yt may ples yow to send me passels of costez and expences
+ge bere and pay for +te said causez I will truely content yow hit of
+te same , and ouer +tat rewarde yow to your plessour , by +te grace of
Jesu , quo haue yow in his blessed keping . PASTON,I,209.059.1574

AUTHOR:ELIZABETH_POYNINGS/BROWNE[N.PASTON]:FEMALE:AUNT:1429:38?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:NEPHEW:1442:25?
LETTER:PASTON_059:M4:1467?:COPY:FAMILY_OTHER
Wrettyn in Suthwerk the xv=te= daie of Decembyre . By your awnt
Elizabeth Ponynges PASTON,I,209.059.1575

{ED:128._TO_JOHN_PASTON_I_1448,_APRIL}

<P_I,221>

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:27
LETTER:PASTON_060:M4:1448:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
<font> To my ryth wurchypful hwsbond Jon Paston be +tis lettyre
delyveryd jn hast . </font> PASTON,I,221.060.1576

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:27
LETTER:PASTON_060:M4:1448:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Ryth wyrchypful hwsbond , I recomawnd me to +gw , desyryng hertyly to
heryn of +gwr wel-fare , praying +gw to wete +tat I was wyth my Lady
Morley on +te Satyrday nexst after +tat +ge departyd from hens , and
told here qhat answere +tat +ge had of Jon Butt ; PASTON,I,221.060.1577

and sche toke jt ryth $strawngely PASTON,I,221.060.1578

have knowleche +tat +te releve owyth to ben payd to here .
PASTON,I,221.060.1579

for $+ter is $nothere gode cloth nere god fryse in this twn .

{ED:131._TO_JOHN_PASTON_I_1449,_15_FEBRUARY}

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:28
LETTER:PASTON_063:M4:1449:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
<font> To my ryt+g wurchipful mayster Jon Paston be +tis delyueryd in
hast . </font> PASTON,I,227.063.1764

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:28
LETTER:PASTON_063:M4:1449:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Ryt wurchipful hosbond , I recommawnd me to +gou , desyryng hertyly to
heryn of +gowr wele-fare , $preying +gou to weten +tat I commawndyd
Herry Goneld to gon to Gunnore to have copys of +te pleyntys in +te
hundrede . PASTON,I,227.063.1765

no copys , +tow he wer att hom , tyl +te nexst hundred ; qher-for I
send +gou +tat byl +tat was wownd abowt +te relefys .
PASTON,I,227.063.1768

<P_I,230>

{ED:132._TO_JOHN_PASTON_I_1449,_28_FEBRUARY}

<P_I,231>

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:28
LETTER:PASTON_064:M4:1449:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Ryt wurchypful hosbond , I recommawnd me to +gou , desyryng hertyly to
heryn of +gowr wele-fare , be-seching +gou +tat +ge be not displesyd
+tow I be com fro +tat place +tat +ge left me in ;
PASTON,I,231.064.1873

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:28
LETTER:PASTON_064:M4:1449:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
for be my trowth +ter were browth me seche tydyngys be dyuerys personys
qhiche ben +gowre wele-willerys and myn +tat I durst no lengere abyd
there , of qhyche personys I xall late +gou have wetyng qhan +ge com
hom . PASTON,I,231.064.1874

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:28
LETTER:PASTON_064:M4:1449:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
It was done me to wete +tat dyuerys of +te Lord Moleynys men saydyn jf
+tei myt gete me +tey xuld stele me and kepe me wyth-jnne +te kastell ,
PASTON,I,231.064.1875

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:28
LETTER:PASTON_064:M4:1449:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and +tan +tey seyd +tei wold +tat +ge xuld feche me owth .
PASTON,I,231.064.1876

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:28
LETTER:PASTON_064:M4:1449:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
An +tei seydyn it xuld ben but a lytyll $hert-brennyng to +gou .
PASTON,I,231.064.1877

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:28
LETTER:PASTON_064:M4:1449:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And after +tat I herd +tese tydyngys I kowd no rest have in myn hert
tyl I was here , PASTON,I,231.064.1878

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:28
LETTER:PASTON_064:M4:1449:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
nere I durst nowt owt of +te place +tat I was jn tyll +tat I was redy
to ryden ; PASTON,I,231.064.1879

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:28

nere +ter was non in +te place wist +tat I xul com +tens save +te
godewyf not an owre be-fore +tat I kam +tens . PASTON,I,231.064.1880

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:28
LETTER:PASTON_064:M4:1449:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And I told here +tat I xuld com hedder to don maken seche gere as I
wold haue made for me and for +te childer , PASTON,I,231.064.1881

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:28
LETTER:PASTON_064:M4:1449:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and seyd I sopposyd +tat I xuld be here a fowrtennythe or iij wekys .
PASTON,I,231.064.1882

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:28
LETTER:PASTON_064:M4:1449:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
I pray +gou +tat +te caws of my komyng away may ben kownsell tyl I
speke wyth +gou , PASTON,I,231.064.1883

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:28
LETTER:PASTON_064:M4:1449:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
for +tei +tat lete me haue warnyng +ter-of wold not for no good +tat it
were diskuryd . PASTON,I,231.064.1884

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_

<P_I,233>

{ED:133._TO_JOHN_PASTON_I_1449,_2_APRIL}

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:28
LETTER:PASTON_065:M4:1449:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
<font> To my ryt+g wurschipful mayster Jon Paston be +tis delyverid in
hast , dwelling in +te Innere Tempill . </font> PASTON,I,233.065.1938

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:28
LETTER:PASTON_065:M4:1449:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Ryt+g wurschipful hosbond , I recommawnd me to +gou , praying +gou to
wete +tat my kosyn Clere dynyd wyth me +tis day , PASTON,I,233.065.1939

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:28
LETTER:PASTON_065:M4:1449:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and sche told me +tat Heydon was wyth here +gisterevyn late .
PASTON,I,233.065.1940

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:28
LETTER:PASTON_065:M4:1449:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And he told here +tat he had a letter from +te Lord Moleynys ,
PASTON,I,233.065.1941

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:28
LETTER:PASTON_065:M4:1449:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and schewyd here +te same letter , praying hym +tat he wold seyn to his
frendys and wele-willerrys in +tis contre` +tat he thankyth hem of here
godewill and for +tat +tei haue don for hym , and also praying Heydon
+tat he wold sey to Rychard Ernold of Crowmer +tat he was sory and evyl
payd +tat his men maden +te afray up-on hym , PASTON,I,233.065.1942

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:28
LETTER:PASTON_065:M4:1449:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
for he seyd it was not be his will +tat his men xuld make afray on
noman in +tis contre` wyth-owth ryt+g grett cawse ;
PASTON,I,233.065.1943

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:28
LETTER:PASTON_065:M4:1449:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and as for +tat was don to +gou , jf it myt+g ben prevyd +tat he had
don o+terwise to +gou +tan ryt+g wold as for +gowr mevabyl godis , +ge
xuld ben content so +tat +ge xuld haue cawse to kon hym +tank .
PASTON,I,233.065.1944

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:28
LETTER:PASTON_065:M4:1449:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And he prayd Heydon in +te letter +tat it xuld ben reportid in +te
kontre` +tat he wold don so if he had don o+terwyse +tan he awth to don
. PASTON,I,233.065.1945

Strawngys wyf of +te mater +tat +ge spoken to me of .

letyn me haue knowleche +ter-of . PASTON,I,235.066.1964

I xall do my part there-in . PASTON,I,235.066.1965

effectualy , but qhyll he sewyd to hym he kowd never haue remedy of his
mater ; PASTON,I,236.066.1974

haue kownselyd me +tat I xuld kownsell +gou to maken o+ter menys +tan
ye haue made to other folkys +tat wold spede yowr materys better +tan
they haue don +tatt ye haue spoken to +ter-of be-for this tym .

my lord of Suffolkys godelorchyp qhyll +te werd is as itt is ye kan
neuer leven jn pese wyth-owth ye haue his godelordschep .
PASTON,I,236.066.1980

haue hys godelordschep and his love jn ese of all the materis that ye
haue to don , and jn esyng of myn hert also . PASTON,I,236.066.1981

ye haue jn hand now , and of othere that ben not don to yett but if he
wyl don for +gou and be yowr godelord . PASTON,I,236.066.1982

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_

<font> To my ryt+g worchypful maystyr Jon Paston be this delyveryd in
hast . </font> PASTON,I,237.067.1991

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:29
LETTER:PASTON_067:M4:1450:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Ryt+g worchipful hosbond , I recommawnd me to +gow , desyring hertyly
to here of +gowr well-fare , thankyng for +te letter +tat +ge sent to
me , praying +gow to wete +tat I haue sent Henry to Maltby +tis weke to
do seche thyngys as +ge $commawndyd in +gowr letter .
PASTON,I,237.067.1992

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:29
LETTER:PASTON_067:M4:1450:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And as towching +te dyche a+gens the maner gate , +gowr tenawntys haue
nere made itt as +ge desyryd +tat it shuld ben made qhan +ge were +tere
, PASTON,I,237.067.1993

LETTER:PASTON_067:M4:1450:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And +te seyd Henry seyth how it is seyd in Gressam that Partryche sent
hom word +tat he shuld not com hom tyl he com wyth his lord , and +tat
he seyd shuld ben wyth-jnne short tym , and +tat he shuld ben lodgyd at
Jon Wynterys plase . PASTON,I,237.067.2004

in +te gode conseyt of all +te lordys as well as ever he was .

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:30

that there is a gret noyse in +tis town +tat my lord of Oxforth and
Yelverton and ye ben endytid in Kent for mayntenyng of +te
oyrdetermyner , PASTON,I,238.068.2018

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_

Heydon endytyn of treson for takyng down of +te quarter of the man .

aferd be-cawse of +tis noyse and of o+ter langage that is had bo+te in
+tis town and in +te contre` +tat +tese seyd Todenham and Heydon shuld
ben as well at ese and haue as grett rewill as euer they hadde .

here of yowre welfare , preying yow to wete that Herry Halmannys wyf
sent to me word on Saturday last past that Prentys thretyth here
hosbond sore , and Jon Robynys , for seche thingys as Prentys seyth
+tat +tey haue don ayens hym . PASTON,I,239.069.2026

Innere Tempill , be this deliuered in hast . </font>

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:30

that myn vnkyll Phylyp Berney was at Lynne this last weke .
PASTON,I,240.070.2055

hast . </font> PASTON,I,241.071.2075

Rygth wurchipfull hosbond , I recommawnd me to yow , desyring hertyly
to here of yowr welfare , preying yow to wete that itt was told me +tis
weke that +ter is a fayre plase to sell in Seynt Laveransis parysch ,
and stant nere the chirche and by +te watere syde , +te whiche place
Toppis hath to sell . PASTON,I,241.071.2076

my Lady Felbrygg of that ye bad me speke to here of .

mater whyll +tat she levyth . PASTON,I,242.072.2097

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:30?

here of yowr welfare , praying yow +tat ye woll send me word in hast
how ye be agreid wyth Wychyngham and Inglose for +tat mater that ye
spake to me of at yowr departyng ; PASTON,I,244.073.2132

be-twyx +tis and Seynt Margretys masse , as itt is told me .

<P_I,245>

{ED:143._TO_JOHN_PASTON_I_PROBABLY_1452,_21_APRIL}

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:31?
LETTER:PASTON_074:M4:1452?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Right wurchepfull howsbond , I recomand me to yow , prayng yow to wete
that the parson of Oxened told me that Wymdham told hym that
Sweynnysthorp is hold of the Kyng be the thred part or the fourt part
of a knyt fye ; PASTON,I,245.074.2154

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:31?
LETTER:PASTON_074:M4:1452?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and ho so euer had the maner of Sweynsthorp , he shuld fynde an armyd
man in tyme of werre in the Castell of Norwhic xl days to his owyn cost
, PASTON,I,245.074.2155

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:31?
LETTER:PASTON_074:M4:1452?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and that ye shuld pay xxx s. to the Kyng yerly owth of the seyd maner ;
PASTON,I,245.074.2156

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:31?
LETTER:PASTON_074:M4:1452?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and it is fond also that your fader shuld a died seysyd , and that ye
shuld a entyrryd ther-in as heyre after your fader dysseys and that ye
shuld be now vp-on the age of xxx wynter . PASTON,I,245.074.2157

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:31?
LETTER:PASTON_074:M4:1452?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
It semyth be that he seyd that he is preuy to the seyd matere .
PASTON,I,245.074.2158

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:31?
LETTER:PASTON_074:M4:1452?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Also the seyd Wymdham seyd to the seyd parson that the Kyng hath yovyn
it to the Provost of Eton . PASTON,I,245.074.2159

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:31?
LETTER:PASTON_074:M4:1452?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
I suppose that it myth not be graunted so hastyly after that it was
seysyd . PASTON,I,245.074.2160

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:31?
LETTER:PASTON_074:M4:1452?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
It is seyd here that it is lyke that there shall be mad more affrays at
Lynne wyth-in short tyme . PASTON,I,245.074.2161

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:31?
LETTER:PASTON_074:M4:1452?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
I herd sey that Bosvyle cam in-to Lynne wythin this vij ny+gt and mad
affray vp-on a man of Lynne and yaffe hym a buffette , and that shall
turne to non esse or after . PASTON,I,245.074.2162

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:31?
LETTER:PASTON_074:M4:1452?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
In gode feyth I here no man sey but that Bosvyle is right a mysgouernyd
yong man , PASTON,I,245.074.2163

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:31?
LETTER:PASTON_074:M4:1452?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and he hath many wordes myth wele be left . PASTON,I,245.074.2164

wete +tat I spak yistirday wyth my sustere , PASTON,I,247.075.2173

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:32?
LETTER:PASTON_075:M4:1453?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and she told me +tat she was sory +tat she myght not speke wyth yow or
ye yede . PASTON,I,247.075.2174

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:32?
LETTER:PASTON_075:M4:1453?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And she desyrith , if itt pleased yow , +tat ye shuld yeve +te
jantylman +tat ye know of seche langage as he myght fele by yow +tat ye
wull be wele willyng to +te mater +tat ye know of ;
PASTON,I,247.075.2175

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:32?
LETTER:PASTON_075:M4:1453?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
for she told me +tat he hath seyd before +tis tym +tat he conseyvid
+tat ye haue sett but lytil +ter-by . Wherefore she prayth yow +tat ye
woll be here gode brothere , and +tat ye myght haue a full answere at
+tis tym wheddere it shall be ya or nay . PASTON,I,247.075.2176

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:32?

+tat she hath no fantesy +ter-inne , but +tat it shall com to a jape ;

+tat she is right wery +ter-of . Wherefore she desyrith +te rathere to
haue a full conclusyon +ter-inne . PASTON,I,248.075.2179

{ED:149._TO_JOHN_PASTON_I_PROBABLY_1453,_14_NOVEMBER}

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:32?
LETTER:PASTON_079:M4:1453?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
<font> To my right wurshipfull hosbond John Paston be this delyueryd in
hast . </font> PASTON,I,252.079.2272

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:32?
LETTER:PASTON_079:M4:1453?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Right worchipfull hosbond , I recomand me to yow , praying yow to wete
that I have receyvid the mony that Maystere Brakle` had of yow , wherof
he hath ageyn v marc. uppon pledgis of the too basonys +tat ye had of
hym tyll ye come hom . PASTON,I,252.079.2273

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:32?
LETTER:PASTON_079:M4:1453?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
As for cloth for my gowne , I can non gete in this town better than
that is +tat I send yow an exsample of , whiche me thynkyth to symple
bothe of colowr and of cloth ; wherfore I pray yow +tat ye woll
vouchesauf to do bey for me iij yerdys and j quarter of seche as it
pleasith yow +tat I shuld have , and what colowr +tat pleaset yow ,
PASTON,I,252.079.2274

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:32?
LETTER:PASTON_079:M4:1453?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
for in gode feyth I haue do sowte all the draperys shopis in this town

{ED:150._TO_JOHN_PASTON_I_PERHAPS_1454,_29_JANUARY}

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:33?
LETTER:PASTON_080:M4:1454?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
<font> To my right worchippfull hosbond John Paston be thys delyueryd
in hast . </font> PASTON,I,253.080.2295

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:33?
LETTER:PASTON_080:M4:1454?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Right worchipfull hosbond , I recomand me to yow , desyring to here of
your welfare , praying yow to wete that Ser Thomas Howes hath purveyd
iiij dormantys for the drawte chamer and the malthouse and +te browern
, wherof he hath bought iij ; PASTON,I,253.080.2296

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:33?
LETTER:PASTON_080:M4:1454?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and the forte , +tat shall be the lengest and grettest of all , he
shall haue from Heylesdon , whiche he seyth my mayster Fastolf shall
geue me be-cause my chamer shal be made +ter-wyth .
PASTON,I,253.080.2297

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:33?
LETTER:PASTON_080:M4:1454?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
As for +te leying of the seyd dormantys , they shall be leyd this next
weke be-cause of the malthous ; PASTON,I,253.080.2298

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:33?
LETTER:PASTON_080:M4:1454?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and as for the remenant , I trow it shall abyde tyll ye come hom
be-cause I can nother be purveyd of joystys ne of bord not yette .
PASTON,I,253.080.2299

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:33?
LETTER:PASTON_080:M4:1454?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
I haue take the mesure in the draute chamer +ter as ye wold your
coforys and your cowntewery shuld be sette for the whyle ,
PASTON,I,253.080.2300

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:33?
LETTER:PASTON_080:M4:1454?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and +ter is no space besyde the bedd , thow the bed were remevyd to the
dore , for to sette bothe your bord and your koforys there and to haue
space to go and sitte be syde . Wherfore I haue purveyd that ye shall
haue the same drawte chamer that ye had befor , there as ye shall ly to
yourself ; PASTON,I,253.080.2301

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:33?
LETTER:PASTON_080:M4:1454?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and whan your gerre is remeved owte of your lytil hous the dore shall
be lokkyd and youre baggys leyd in on of the grete koforis so +tat they
shall be sauff , I trost . PASTON,I,253.080.2302

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?

I pray yow send me word if ye woll +tat any thyng +tat ye woll be do to
hym or ye come hom . PASTON,I,254.080.2307

<font> To my ryth worchepfull husbond Jon Paston be thys delyueryd in
hast . </font> PASTON,I,258.083.2367

Plesyth it yow to wet that I receyuyd yowyr letter +tat ye sent me by
Nycolas Colman on Sonday last past ; PASTON,I,258.083.2369

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_

and as for the mater +tat ye desyiryd me to breke of to my cosyn
Rokwode , it fortunyd so +tat he came to me on Sonday to dyner sone
aftyr +tat I had yowyr letter , PASTON,I,258.083.2370

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_

LETTER:PASTON_083:M4:1460:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and when we had dynyd I mevyd to hym ther-of in couert termys , as
Playter schall informe yow eraftyr . PASTON,I,258.083.2371

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:39
LETTER:PASTON_083:M4:1460:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And as I thowt by hym , and so ded Playter also by the langwage +tat he
had to vs , +tat he wold be as feythfull as he kowd or myte be to that
good lorde +tat ye wrot of , and to yow also , in onythynge +tat he
kowde or myte do in case wer +tat he wer set in offyse so +tat he myth
owte do . PASTON,I,258.083.2372

myche worthe . PASTON,I,258.083.2373

{ED:155._TO_JOHN_PASTON_I_1460,_29_OCTOBER}

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:39
LETTER:PASTON_084:M4:1460:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
<font> To my ryth welbelovyd brodyr $Clement Paston , for to delyuer
$to hys brodyr Jon jn hast . </font> PASTON,I,260.084.2421

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:39
LETTER:PASTON_084:M4:1460:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Ryth $worchepfull husbonde , I recomande me to yow .
PASTON,I,260.084.2422

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:39
LETTER:PASTON_084:M4:1460:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Plesyth yow to weet +tat I receyvyd a lettyr on Seynt Symondys Evyn and
$Jwd +tat $came frome Jon Paston , in the wyche lettyr he wrot +tat ye
desyiryd +tat I scholde do Jon Paston or Thomas $Playter looke in the
gret standyng chyste in on of the gret canvas baggys whyche standyth
a-geyns the lokk , for the copys of the fals inqwest of ofys +tat was
fownde in Northefolk , <P_I,261> and for the kopy of the comyssyon +tat
came to Jon Andrewys and Fylpot and Heydon , and othyr thyngys
towchynge the same mater . PASTON,I,261.084.2423

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:39
LETTER:PASTON_084:M4:1460:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
I haue do Jon Paston sowte all iij grete baggys in the seyd kofyr at
ryth good leyser , PASTON,I,261.084.2424

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_

{ED:156._TO_JOHN_PASTON_I_1460,_25_NOVEMBER}

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:39
LETTER:PASTON_085:M4:1460:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
<font> To my right wurshipfull husbonde John Paston be this deliuerd in
hast . </font> PASTON,I,262.085.2446

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:39
LETTER:PASTON_085:M4:1460:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Right wurshipfull husbonde , I recomaunde me vnto you .
PASTON,I,262.085.2447

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:39
LETTER:PASTON_085:M4:1460:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Plesith you to witte that myn avnte Mondeforthe hath desiryd me to
write to you besechyng you that ye wol wechesafe to chevesshe for her
at London xx=ti= marke for to be payed to Mastre Ponyngys outher-3 on
Saterday or Sonday , weche $shall $be {TEXT:schalbe} Seint Andrwes Daye
, in discharchyng of them that be bounden to Mastre Ponyngys of the
seide xx=ti= marke for the wardeship of here doughter ; the weche
xx=ti= marke she hath delyuerd to me in golde for you to haue at your
comyng home , PASTON,I,262.085.2448

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:39
LETTER:PASTON_085:M4:1460:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
for she dare not aventure here money to be brought vp to London for
feere of robbyng PASTON,I,262.085.2449

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:39
LETTER:PASTON_085:M4:1460:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
for it $is $seide heere that there goothe many thefys be-twyx this and
London , weche causeth here to beseche you to content the seide money
in dischargyng of the matre and of them that be bounden ,
PASTON,I,262.085.2450

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:39
LETTER:PASTON_085:M4:1460:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
for she wolde for no goode that the day were broken .
PASTON,I,262.085.2451

haue had in that matre , and in all others touchyng her and hers ,
wherfore she seithe she is ever bounden to be your bedwoman and ever
$will $be {TEXT:wolbe} whyle she levethe . PASTON,I,262.085.2452

My cosyn , her sone , and hese wife recomaundethe them vnto you ,

haue ben a-fore tyme . PASTON,I,262.085.2453

suffyr hyr to haue the <P_I,264> auayle of the londys ; wher-fore sche
prayth yow for Goddys sak +tat ye wole puruey a mene +tat Hwe of Fen
may saue hyr harmeles , in as myche as he promysyd hyr husbond to
puruey $therfore in hys lyue . And if it plese not yow to spek to hym
ther-of , +tat it plese yow to do Jon Paston or Thomas Playter or sume
othyr +tat ye thynk +tat cane vndyr-stonde the mater for to spek to the
seyd Hwe of Fen ther-of in hyr name , and to serge the Kyngys bokys
ther-fore , if ye thynk +tat it be for to do , PASTON,I,264.086.2477

Yowyr fermore of Sweynysthorpe hathe fownde suerte` for yowyr dute` ,
as Rychard Calle tellyth me , so +tat ye schall be plesyd when ye come
home . PASTON,I,264.086.2481

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:39
LETTER:PASTON_086:M4:1460:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And the blyssyd Trinite` haue yow in hys kepyng . PASTON,I,264.086.2482

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:39
LETTER:PASTON_086:M4:1460:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Wretyn in hast on the Monday next aftyr Seynt Andrew . By yowyr M. P.
PASTON,I,264.086.2483

<P_I,264>

{ED:158._TO_JOHN_PASTON_I_PROBABLY_1461,_1_MARCH}

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:40?
LETTER:PASTON_087:M4:1461?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Please it you to wytte that it is lete me witte by on +tat owith you
good wyll that +ter is leid awayte up-on you in +tis cuntre` yf ye come
here at large , to bryng you to +te presence of suyche a lord in the
north as shall not be for your ease , but to iopardie of your lyf or
gret and importable losse of your goodes . PASTON,I,264.087.2484

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:40?
LETTER:PASTON_087:M4:1461?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And he that hath take up-on hym +tis enterprise now was vndreshireff to
G. Sayntlowe ; PASTON,I,264.087.2485

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:40?
LETTER:PASTON_087:M4:1461?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
he hath gret fauour herto by the meanes of the sone of William Baxter
that lyth beryed in the Grey Freres . PASTON,I,264.087.2486

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?

in the north to bryng +te matier a-bowte , PASTON,I,264.087.2487

and now he and alle his olde felaweship put owt their fynnes
PASTON,I,264.087.2488

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:40?

and arn right flygge and mery , hopyng alle thyng is and $shall $be
{TEXT:shalbe} <P_I,265> as they wole haue it . PASTON,I,265.087.2489

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:40?
LETTER:PASTON_087:M4:1461?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Also it is tolde me that the fadre of the Bastard in this cuntre` seid
that now shuld this shire be made sewir for hym and his heires
hens-forward , and for the Baxsteris heyres also ; wherby I conceyve
they thynke that they haue none enemy but you , &c. Wherfor like it you
to be +te more ware of your gydyng for your persones sauf-gard , and
also that ye be not to hasty to come in-to +tis cuntre` til ye here +te
world more sewer . PASTON,I,265.087.2490

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:40?
LETTER:PASTON_087:M4:1461?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
I trowe the berar of this shall telle more by mowthe , as he shall be
enfourmed , of the revell in this cuntre` . PASTON,I,265.087.2491

PASTON,I,270.088.2496

And yet I kowd not be mery sethyn I had the last lettyr tyll thys day
+tat the meyir sent to me and sent me word +tat he had knowlage for
very trowthe +tat ye wer delyueryd owt of the Flet and +tat Howard was
comytyd to ward for dyuers gret compleyntys +tat wer <P_I,271> mad to
the Kyng of hym . PASTON,I,271.088.2498

{ED:164._TO_JOHN_PASTON_I_1461,_16_NOVEMBER}

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:40
LETTER:PASTON_089:M4:1461:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
<font> To my right wurchipfull husbond John Paston be this deliuerd in
hast . </font> PASTON,I,272.089.2540

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:40
LETTER:PASTON_089:M4:1461:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
$Ryth $worchepfull husbond , I recomande me to yow .
PASTON,I,272.089.2541

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:40
LETTER:PASTON_089:M4:1461:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Plesyth yow to weet +tat Thomas Grene was wyth me as on Saterday last
paste , PASTON,I,272.089.2542

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:40
LETTER:PASTON_089:M4:1461:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and let me haue knowlage +tat the scherre schold be as thys day at the
gylde-hall in Norwyche ; PASTON,I,272.089.2543

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:40
LETTER:PASTON_089:M4:1461:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and he desyiryd me +tat the swte +tat ye have a-geyns Thomas Jeryng and
othyr myth be sesyd as for thys schere . PASTON,I,272.089.2544

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:40
LETTER:PASTON_089:M4:1461:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And I seyd +tat I durste do ryth not ther-in , PASTON,I,272.089.2545

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:40
LETTER:PASTON_089:M4:1461:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and he tolde me +tat Thomas Jeryng was wyth yow in Flegge the laste
tyme +tat ye wer ther , PASTON,I,272.089.2546

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:40
LETTER:PASTON_089:M4:1461:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and ye seyd to hym +tat he scholde not be hvrte by the swte .
PASTON,I,272.089.2547

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:40
LETTER:PASTON_089:M4:1461:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And Thomas Grene tolde me +tat if the seyd Jeryng and othyr in the same
wryte mad not an end wyth yow by the nexte schere , +te whyche schall
be thys day monyth , +tat the seyd Thomas <P_I,273> Grene wole purchese
a new wryte of hys owne coste ayens +tat daye . PASTON,I,273.089.2548

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:40
LETTER:PASTON_089:M4:1461:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
I woste not +tat the scher schuld be so sone when I wrote to yow yowyr
laste lettyr . PASTON,I,273.089.2549

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:40
LETTER:PASTON_089:M4:1461:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And he remembyryd the trobulus werd +tat is nowe , and also +tat they
wer nowtye felawys +tat ye svyd , and ther-fore he thowte +tat it wer
best to let it be respyte at thys tyme ; PASTON,I,273.089.2550

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:40
LETTER:PASTON_089:M4:1461:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and so they schall be respyth at thys tyme . PASTON,I,273.089.2551

I haue sent to Jaferey Spyrlyng for the bokys +tat ye sent to me fore ,

Item , the tenauntys at Sweynysthorp prayid me for to wryte to yow for
to pray yow for Goddys sake +tat ye wole help forto get hem a good baly
of the $hundyryd +tat they be in , PASTON,I,273.089.2561

gold-smyth as thys day in the mornyng . PASTON,I,274.090.2578

LETTER:PASTON_090:M4:1461?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
As for Syr Thomas , he sent me word he schold to yow ward as on Twysday
last past . PASTON,I,274.090.2579

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:40?
LETTER:PASTON_090:M4:1461?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
If he fayle ony thyng +tat ye sent word he schold bryng wyth hym it is
not for no lak of remembrans , PASTON,I,274.090.2580

. PASTON,I,274.090.2585

thynk is best to do ther-in . PASTON,I,274.090.2587

yow . PASTON,I,274.090.2588

{ED:166._TO_JOHN_PASTON_I_1461,_3_DECEMBER}

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:40
LETTER:PASTON_091:M4:1461:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Right wurchepfull husbond , I recomaund me to you .

And if it please you to send word how ye wull +tat we do for the
lifflode that she had at Walcote , wheder ye wull +tat any body take
possession there in yowr name or not , and if it like you to haue wyth
you my cosyn William , here sone , I trow ye shuld fynde hym a
necessary man to take hede to yowre howshold and to bye all maner of
stuffe nedefull +ter-to , and to se to +te rewle and gode gidyn +ter-of
; PASTON,I,275.091.2603

dysplesyd ; and +tat the Kyng vndyrstood well +tat it was not of ther
owne mosyon boot of cownselyng of one or ij +tat ben evyll dysposyd
folk . PASTON,I,277.092.2649

ony extorcion or brybery don be ony men of thys contre` to them they
wer redy to receyue them and to make a-kord be-twyx hem ; and if they
cowd not mak the acord , +tat than they $schold tak the byllys to the
Kyng and he schold set hem thorow . PASTON,I,277.092.2650

nowthyr spar for good nor loue nor fer , but +tat he wold let the Kynge

thys contre` as he cowd or myth do to the welfare ther-of ,

and seyd +tat he lekyd the contre` ryth well . PASTON,I,278.092.2659

LETTER:PASTON_092:M4:1461:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And John of Dame seyd if the contre` had had knowlage of hys comyng ,
he schold haue had byllys of compleyntys and knowlage of myche more
thyng than he myth haue knowlage of that tyme , ore myth haue be-cause
of schort $abydyng ; PASTON,I,278.092.2660

hast . </font> PASTON,I,278.093.2674

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:41
LETTER:PASTON_093:M4:1462:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Plesyt yow to wet +tat I sent yow a lettyr by Barneys man of Wychyngham
wyche was wretyn on Seynt Thomas Day in Crystmas ,
PASTON,I,278.093.2676

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:41
LETTER:PASTON_093:M4:1462:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and I had no tydyngys nor lettyr of yow sene the weke befor Crystmas ,
wher-of I mervayle sore . PASTON,I,278.093.2677

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:41
LETTER:PASTON_093:M4:1462:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
I fere me it is not well wyth yow be-cawse ye came not home or sent er
thys tyme . PASTON,I,278.093.2678

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:41
LETTER:PASTON_093:M4:1462:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
I <P_I,279> hopyd verily ye schold haue ben at home by Twelthe at +te
ferthest . PASTON,I,279.093.2679

I pray yow hertly +tat ye wole wychesaue to send me word how ye do as

for my hert schall nevyr be in ese tyll I haue tydyngys fro yow .

noysyd ryotous in thys contre` . PASTON,I,279.093.2683

in +tis contre` . PASTON,I,279.093.2685

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:41

The pepyll seyth her +tat they had leuyr go vp hole to the Kyng and
compleyne of siche fals $schrewys as they haue be wrongyd by a-for than
they schold be compleynyd of wyth-owt cause and be hangyd at ther owne
dorys . PASTON,I,279.093.2686

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:41
LETTER:PASTON_093:M4:1462:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
In good feyth men fer sor her of a comone rysyng but if a bettyr remedy
may be had to pese the pepyll in hast , and that ther be sent swyche
downe to tak a rewyll as the pepyll hathe a fantsy in that wole be
jndeferent . PASTON,I,279.093.2687

LETTER:PASTON_093:M4:1462:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
They loue not in no wyse the Dwke of Sowthfolk nor hys modyr .
PASTON,I,279.093.2688

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:41
LETTER:PASTON_093:M4:1462:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
They sey that all the tretourys and extorsyonerys of thys contre` be
meyntynyd by them and by syche as they get to them wyth her goodys , to
that intent to meynten suche extorsyon style as hathe be do by suche as
hathe had the rewyll vndyr them be-for-tyme . PASTON,I,279.093.2689

Men wene and the Dwke of Sowthfolk come ther schall be a schrewd reuell
, but if ther come odyr that be bettyr belovyd than he is her .
PASTON,I,279.093.2690

and schall be tyll ye send me word how ye wole +tat I do wyth hym ;
wher-for I pray yow +tat ye wole let me haue knowlage in hast how ye
wole +tat I do wyth hym . PASTON,I,280.094.2719

Dabeney , Naunton , Wykys , and John Love werre at Drayton for to speke
wyth youre tenauntys there , to put hem in confort and for to aske

Norwych , as Pampyng can enforme you of , for sertyn harnys wych he
delyueryd hym at Newcastell for to cary to Yarmoth by watere and there
to delyuer it to hym a-yen , whych harnys he kypt styll and may not be
delyueryd ; and now ther ys com down an habeas corpus for hym , and
most appyre at the Comyn Place on Fryday next comyng . Wher-fore yf it
pleased you that there myght be taken an accyon in Wykys name of
trespas , vndere such forme as there may be a capias a-wardyd a-yenst
hys comyng , PASTON,I,300.098.2887

{ED:182._TO_JOHN_PASTON_I_1465,_20_MAY}

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_099:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
<font> To my ryght wyrshypfull husbond John Paston by thys $delyueryd
in hast . </font> PASTON,I,301.099.2901

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_099:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Please it you to wyte that on Satour-day last youre seruauntys Naunton
, Wykys , and othere were at Drayton and there toke a dystresse for the
rent and ferm that was to pay , to the nombere of lxxvij nete , and so
broght them hom to Hayllesdon and put hem in the pynfold , and so kept
hem styll there from the seyd Satour-day mornyng in-to Monday at iij at
clok at aftere-non . PASTON,I,301.099.2902

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_099:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Fyrst on the same Satour-day the tenauntys folwyd vppon ,
PASTON,I,301.099.2903

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_099:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and desyryd to haue there catell a-yen , PASTON,I,301.099.2904

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_099:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and I awnnsweryd hem yf thay wold do pay such dewtys as they oght for
to pay to you , that then they shold haue there catell delyueryd a-yen
; or els , yf they were not a powere to pay redy money , that then they
to fynd suffycyant suerty to pay the money at such a day as they $myght
agrye wyth me , and there-to to be bonden to you by obligacyon .
PASTON,I,301.099.2905

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_099:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And that they seyd they durst not for to take vppon hem for to be
bonden , PASTON,I,301.099.2906

and there by the menys of the bayllyff of Coshay put the tenauntys in
such feere , sayng that yf they wold pay such dewtys , or ells for to
be bonden to pay , that then they wold put hem ovte of such londys as
they huld bondly of the lordshyp , and so to dystrayn hem and trobell
hem that they shold be wery of there part . PASTON,I,301.099.2911

<P_I,302> vnderstewerd of the Duche` , sayng that the bestys were taken
vppon the Duche` fee ; wherfore he desyryd me to mak hym $levery of the

. PASTON,I,302.099.2927

Item , as for youre houshold at Castere , sauyng youre betere avyse me
thynkyth that v or vj of youre folkys such as ye wyll assyngne were
<em> ... </em> kype the place , and thay for to go to bord wyth the
prustes and ye not to kype no houshold there yet ,
PASTON,I,306.101.3022

resortyng of pepell thedere . PASTON,I,306.101.3024

take , &c. ; PASTON,I,306.102.3034

pleasid +tat she shuld be there if he wuld . PASTON,I,308.103.3075

And if ye wull haue my good wille eschewe such thynges as I spake to
you of last in owre parissh chirch . PASTON,I,308.103.3081

<font> To my ryght worschipful husbond John Paston be this delyuerd in
hast . </font> PASTON,I,311.104.3087

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_104:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Please it you to wete +tat I sent on Lammesse Day to Drayton Thomas
Bonde and Ser James Gloys to hold the court in your name and to clayme
your tytill , PASTON,I,311.104.3089

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_104:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
for I cowde gete non othere body to kepe the court ner that wuld go
theder but +te seid Thomas Bonde , be-cause I suppose thei were a-ferd
of the pepill +tat shuld be there of +te Duke of Suffolk parte .
PASTON,I,311.104.3090

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_104:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
The seid Thomas and James , as the <P_I,312> Duke of Suffolk men , +tat
is to sey Harlesdon , +te parson of Salle , Mayster Phyllip , and
William Yeluerton , +te which was styward , wyth a lx persones or more
be estymacion , and the tenauntes of the same town , sum of hem hauyng
rusty pollexis and byllys , comyn in-to +te maner yard to kepe the
court , PASTON,I,312.104.3091

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_104:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
met wyth them PASTON,I,312.104.3092

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_104:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and told them that thei were comyn to kepe +te court in your name and
to clayme your titill . Wherefore the seid Harlesdon , wyth-ought any
more wordes or occasion yovyn of your men , comytted the seid Thomas
Bonde to +te kepyng of +te new baly of Drayton , William Dokket , seyng
+tat he shuld go to my lord and do his herand hym-self ,
notwyth-stondyng +tat Ser James dede the erandes to them and had the
wordes ; where-fore thei toke +te seid Thomas wyth-ought occasion .
PASTON,I,312.104.3093

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_

LETTER:PASTON_104:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Thei wuld haue mad the seid Thomas to haue had the wordes ,
PASTON,I,312.104.3094

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_104:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and +te said James told hem that $he had hem be-cause he was the more
pesibill man , wham afterward thei bode avoyde , and sithen led forth
Thomas Bonde to Cossey , and bownde his armes be-hynde hym wyth
whippe-cord like a theffe , and shuld haue led hym forth to +te Duke of
Suffolk ner had be +tat I had spokyn wyth the juges in the morwyn or
+tei yede to the shire hous , and enformed hem of such ryottes and
assaugthis as thei had mad vp-on me and my men , the baly of Cossey and
all +te Duke of Suffolk councell beyng there present and all +te lerned
men of Norffolk and William Jeney and $myche pepill of +te contre` ;
PASTON,I,312.104.3095

gret rebuke , comaundyng the shereffe to se what pepill thei had gadred
at Drayton , which came after to Helesdon to se +te pepill there , wyth
weche $pepill he held hym wele content . PASTON,I,312.104.3096

And in goode feythe I founde the juges ryght gentell <P_I,313> and
forberable to me in my matres notwythstandyng the Dukes councell had
made her compleynt to them or I come in ther werst wice , noysyng vs of
gret gatheryng of peopell and many riotes thynges don be me and your
men . PASTON,I,313.104.3105

and of oure gidyng in like wice , and after the juges vndrestod the
trouthe he gaue the baly of Cossey be-for me and many other a passyng
gret rebuke , seyng wythoute he amended hes condicion and gouernaunce
thei $wold enforme the Kyng and helpe that he schuld be punyschet .

Item , the supersedias and the supplicauit is delyuerd to Alblastre and
to Wechyngham , PASTON,I,314.104.3139

{ED:190._TO_JOHN_PASTON_I_1465,_18_AUGUST}

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
