<font> To my ryght wyrshypfull maystere John Paston be thys lettere
delyueryd in haste . </font> PASTON,I,314.105.3150

<P_I,315>

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_

LETTER:PASTON_105:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_105:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Please it you to wyte that I recevyd a lettere from you send by Laurens
Rede on Fryday laste past , wherby I vnderstond that ye had no
tythyngys from me at that tyme that youre lettere was wryten ; wherof I
mervayll , PASTON,I,315.105.3152

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_105:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
for I send you a lettere by Chyttock ys son that ys prenteys in London
, the whych was delyueryd to hym vppon the Thursday next aftere Lammas
Day , PASTON,I,315.105.3153

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_

as hastely as he my+gt aftere hys comyng to London .

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_105:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
The cause that I wrote to you non ere than I dyde aftere the sessyons
was by-cause that Yeluerton held sessyons at Dyrham and Walsyngham the
next wyke aftere the assyses , and to haue knowlych what labour that
was made there , and to haue send you word therof .
PASTON,I,315.105.3161

haue endytyd youre men both at Dyrham and at Walsyngham ,

no defaute be founde in here , nor noght hath be yf the trogh myght be
vnderstond , as she hopyth it shall be heraftere .
PASTON,I,316.105.3201

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_105:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
She sayth there ys no man a-lyff that she hath put here truste in so
moch as she hath doon in you . PASTON,I,316.105.3202

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_105:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
She sayth she wote well such langage as hath be reportyd to you of here
othere-wyse then she hath deseruyd causyth you to be othere-wyse to
here then ye shold be . PASTON,I,316.105.3203

{ED:194._TO_JOHN_PASTON_I_1465,_17_OCTOBER}

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_106:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
On Tuesday in the morwyn whas John Botillere , o+terwyse callid John
Palmere , and Davy Arnald your cook , and William Malthows of Aylsham
taken at Heylesdon be the balyf of Ey , callid Bottisforth , and led
for to Cossey , PASTON,I,323.106.3207

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_106:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and there thei kepe hem yet wyth-ought any warant or autoryte` of
justice of peas ; PASTON,I,323.106.3208

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_106:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and thei sey thei wull carie hem forth to Ey preson ,
PASTON,I,323.106.3209

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_106:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and as many as thei may gete more of your men and tenauntes +tat thei
may knowe that owe yow good wyll or hath be to you ward , thei be thret
to be slayn or presoned . PASTON,I,323.106.3210

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_106:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
The Duke came to Norwich on Tuesday at x of clok wyth +te nombre of v
hundred men , PASTON,I,323.106.3211

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_106:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and he sent after +te meyre and alderman wyth +te sherefes , desiryng
hem in the Kynges name +tat thei shuld take an enqueraunce of +te
constablys of euery ward wyth-in the cyte` what men shuld a go on your
party to haue holpyn or socowryd your men at any tyme of +tes
gaderynges , and if any thei cowde fynde +tat thei shuld take and arest
hym and correct hym , and also certifie hym the names on Wyndenesse-day
be viij of clok ; which the meyre dede and wull do any thyng +tat he
may for hym and his . PASTON,I,323.106.3212

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_106:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And here-vp-on the meyre hath arestid on +tat was wyth me callid Roberd
Lovegold , brasere , and threte hym +tat he shall be hanged be the nek
, wherfore I wuld +tat there myght come down a writ to remeve hym , if
ye thynk it be to do . PASTON,I,323.106.3213

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_106:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
He was not wyth me , not saue that Harleston and othere mad +te
assaught vp-on me at Lammesse . PASTON,I,323.106.3214

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_106:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
He is right good and feythfull on-to you , PASTON,I,323.106.3215

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:HUSBAND:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_106:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and therefore I wuld he had help . PASTON,I,323.106.3216

LETTER:PASTON_106:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
It is told me +te old lady and +te Duke is set fervently a-geyn vs be
the enformacion of Harlesdon , +te baly of Cossey , and Andrewys , and
Doget +te balys sone , and suych othere fals shrewys the which wuld
haue thes matere born ought <P_I,324> for there owyn plesere ; the
which causith an evyll noyse in this contre` and othere places .
PASTON,I,324.106.3221

and othere wurchepfull men ben mad but here doggeboltes , the which I
suppose wull turne hem to diswurchep here-after . PASTON,I,324.106.3222

LETTER:PASTON_107:M4:1465:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And thay made youre tenauntys of Haylesdon and Drayton , wyth othere ,
to help to breke down the wallys of the place and the logge both , God
knowyth full evyll a-yenst there wyllys but that they derst no nothere
wysse don for ferre . PASTON,I,330.107.3262

then all the contray wyll a-wayte vppon hym and serue youre entent ,

hurt you heraftere . PASTON,I,333.108.3315

wrytyngys and evydens than he dede by any of his moveabell godys .
PASTON,I,333.108.3316

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:24

Item , I wold ye shold take hyde that yf any processe com owte a-yenste
me , or a-yenst any of tho that were endyted a-fore the coronere , that
I myght haue knowlych therof and to purvey a remedy therfore .
PASTON,I,333.108.3318

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_

counsell therin , as I am enformyd it may be provyd thogh no man take
no charge thys twelfmonth . PASTON,I,333.108.3319

for ye may verely knowe by that youre vnkell Will seyd to you and to me

exprest in youre fadere ys wyll , the whych shud be to grete for you or
me to bere . PASTON,I,333.108.3322

and maketh his bost that wyth-in this fourtnyght at Helesdon shuld be
bothe new lordes and new officeres . PASTON,I,334.109.3344

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:25
LETTER:PASTON_109:M4:1467:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And also this day was brought me word fro Cayster that Rysyng of Freton
shuld haue herd seid , in diuerse places there as he was in Suffolk ,
that Fastolf of Coughhawe maketh all the strenght that he may and
purposith hym to assaught Caystre and to entre there if he may , in
somych that it is seyd that he hath a v score men redy <P_I,335> and
sendyth dayly aspies to vnderstand what felesshep kepe the place .
PASTON,I,335.109.3345

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:25

not , PASTON,I,335.109.3346

but ye wote wele that I haue ben affrayd there be-fore this tyme whan
that I had othere comfort than I haue now . PASTON,I,335.109.3347

materes as I wright to you , that there may be purveyd be summe writyng
fro the Kyng that my lord of Norffolk and his councell seas of the wast
that thei don in your lordsheps and in especiall at Heynford ;
PASTON,I,336.110.3372

any o+ter in there names , at there liberte` herye there londes wyth-in

a-twix you for any materes a-twix here and you . PASTON,I,337.110.3389

the shep and your faderes goodes which were takyn a-wey at the pullyng
don of the seid place ; whech wele considered she were wurthy to
recompense you . PASTON,I,337.110.3391

and mevyd me if +tat my lord myght be entreted to suffre endifferent
men to kepe the place and take the profites for bothe parties till +te
right be determyned be the lawe , and my lord for his parte and ye for
your parte to fynde sufficient suerte` +tat your nowthere shuld vex ,
lette , ner trobilled the seid endifferent men to kepe pesibilly the
possession of +te seid place , and to take +te profightes on-to the
tyme it be determyned be +te lawe to his behowe +tat {to}_P the lawe
demeth it . PASTON,I,340.111.3431

And +to seid persones +tat so endifferently kepe possession before
there entre` in-to the seid place to fynde also sufficient suerte` to
answere the parte` +tat the lawe demeth it to of +te profites , duryng
there possession , and to suffre hym pesibilly to entre , or any in his
name , whan so euer thei be required be the parte` to whom the right is
demyd . PASTON,I,340.111.3432

and he brought me nowthere writyng from you ner good answere of this
mater , which grevyth me right ill +tat I haue sent you so many
massangeres and haue so febill answeres ageyn . PASTON,I,341.111.3448

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:27
LETTER:PASTON_111:M4:1469:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Be your modere PASTON,I,341.111.3449

stond in grete joparte` at Cayster and lakke vetayll ;

LETTER:PASTON_112:M4:1469:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and the place sore brokyn wyth gonnes of +te toder parte ; so that ,
but thei haue hasty help , thei be like to lese bothe there lyfes and
the place , to the grettest rebuke to you that euer came to any
jentilman , PASTON,I,344.112.3453

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:27
LETTER:PASTON_112:M4:1469:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
for euery man in this countre` marvaylleth gretly that ye suffre them
to be so longe in so gret joparte` wyth-ought help or othere remedy .
PASTON,I,344.112.3454

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:27

The Duke hath be more fervently set +ter-vp-on , and more cruell , sith
+tat Wretyll , my lord of Claraunce man , was ther than he was be-fore
, PASTON,I,344.112.3455

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:27

and he hath sent for all his tenauntes from euery place , and othere ,
to be there at Cayster on Thorysday next comyng , that there is than
like to be the grettest multitude of pepill +tat came +ter yet .
PASTON,I,344.112.3456

for thei haue sent for gonnes to Lynne and othere place be the seeys
syde , +tat wyth ther gret multitude of gonnes , wyth othere shoot and
ordynaunce , ther shall no man dar appere in +te place .
PASTON,I,344.112.3458

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_

Thei shall hold them so besy wyth ther gret pepill +tat it shall not
lye in there pore wyth-in to hold it a-geyn them wyth-ought God help
them or $thei haue hasty socour from you . PASTON,I,344.112.3459

There-fore , as ye wull haue my blyssyng , I charge you and require you
+tat ye se your brothere be holpyn in hast . PASTON,I,344.112.3460

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:27
LETTER:PASTON_112:M4:1469:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And if ye can haue non meane , rathere desire writyng fro my lord of
Clarens , if he be at London , or ell of my lord Archebusshop of York ,
to +te Duke of Norffolk , +tat he wull graunte them +tat be in +te
place here lyfes and ther goodes . PASTON,I,344.112.3461

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:27
LETTER:PASTON_112:M4:1469:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And in eschewyng of insurreccions , wyth othere inconuenyens +tat be
like to growe wyth-in the shire of Norffolk , this <P_I,345> trobelows
werd , be-cause of such conuenticles and gaderynges wyth-in the seid
shire for cause of +te seid place , thei shall suffre hym to entre
vp-on such appoyntment , or othere like , takyn be the advyse of your
councell there at London , if ye thynk this be not good , till the law
hath determyned othere-wyse ; PASTON,I,345.112.3462

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:27
LETTER:PASTON_112:M4:1469:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and lete hym write a-nothere letter to your brother to deliuere the
place vp-on the same appoyntment . PASTON,I,345.112.3463

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:27
LETTER:PASTON_112:M4:1469:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And if ye thynk , as I can suppose , that the Duke of Norffolk wull not
aggre` to this be-cause he graunted this a-forn and thei in the place
wuld not accept it , than I wuld the seid massangere shuld wyth the
seid letteres bryng fro the seid lord of Clarence , or ell my lord
Archebusshop , to my lord of Oxenford othere letteres to rescuse them
forth-wyth , thoughe the said Erle of Oxenford shuld haue the place
duryng his lyffe for his labour . PASTON,I,345.112.3464

departed my cosyn Calthorp sent me a letter compleynyng in his wrytyng
that for asmych as he can not be payd of his tenauntes as he hat be
before this tyme he purposith to lesse his howshold and to leve the
streytlyere ; wherfore he desireth me to purvey for your suster Anne .

Be ware how that ye spend it but in acquityng you ageyn such as ye be
in daungere to , or abought the good speed of your materes ;
PASTON,I,350.114.3506

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:28?
LETTER:PASTON_115:M4:1470?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Item , spare of the xl li. asmych as ye may , that ye may parfourme vp
the mony that the Duchesse of Suffolk shuld haue in cas that it may not
be gadered of the lyvelode . PASTON,I,357.115.3569

{ED:214._TO_JOHN_PASTON_II_ABOUT_1472}

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:30?
LETTER:PASTON_117:M4:1472?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
I grete you wele , letyng you wete that +ter was told me a thyng in
your absens +tat goth right nere myn hert , be a wurchepfull man and
such on as ye wuld beleve and geffe credence to , and that owyth you
right good wille , which if it had comyn to myn remembraunce at your
departere I wuld haue spoke to you of it most specially befor all
othere materes ; PASTON,I,361.117.3603

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:30?
LETTER:PASTON_117:M4:1472?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
but I am so <P_I,362> trobilled in my mende wyth your materes , that
thei be so delayd and take no better conclusion , and wyth +te ontrowth
+tat is in seruauntes now a days but if +ter maysteres take better heed
to +ter handes , that such thynges as I wuld rathest remembre I sonest
for-gete . PASTON,I,362.117.3604

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:30?
LETTER:PASTON_117:M4:1472?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
It was told me that ye haue sold Sporle wood , of a right credebill and
$wurchepfull man ; PASTON,I,362.117.3605

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:30?
LETTER:PASTON_117:M4:1472?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and +tat was right hevy +tat ye shuld be know of such disposicion ,
consideryng how your fadere , whos sowle God assoyll , cherysshed in
euery maner his woodes . PASTON,I,362.117.3606

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:30?
LETTER:PASTON_117:M4:1472?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And for the more preffe +tat +tis shuld be trought , the forseid person
told me +tat it was told hym of on +tat was toward Ser William
Yeluerton , to whom Richard Calle shuld haue seid in thes termes , +tat
Sporle wood shuld be sold and +tat it shuld comyn now in-to Cristen
mennes handes ; which if it were knowyn shuld cause bothyn your elmyse
and your frendes to thynk +tat ye dede it for right gret nede , or ell
+tat ye shuld be a wastour and wuld wast your lyvelode .
PASTON,I,362.117.3607

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:30?
LETTER:PASTON_117:M4:1472?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
If ye had do so in Ser John Fastolfes lyffelode men shuld haue supposid
that ye had do it of good pollice` be-cause of +te onsuerte` +tat it
stant in , to haue takyn +tat ye had myght of it duryng your possession
, to haue boryn ought the daungeres of it wyth the same ;
PASTON,I,362.117.3608

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:30?
LETTER:PASTON_117:M4:1472?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
but for to do +tus of your owyn lyffelode men shall thyng +tat ye do it
for pure nede . PASTON,I,362.117.3609

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:30?
LETTER:PASTON_117:M4:1472?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And in asmych as it is so ner your most elmyse ere it shall be to you
+te grettere vylney and shame to all your frendes , and the grettest
coragyng and plesere +tat can be to your elmyse . PASTON,I,362.117.3610

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:30?
LETTER:PASTON_117:M4:1472?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
For if ye be thus disposid ye shall make them and all othere certeyn of
+tat that be-for this tyme thei haue ben in dought {of}_P , and cause
them to purpose the more cruelly ageyn you . Where-fore , in eschewyng
of +te greet slaundre and inconveniens +tat may grow +ter-of , I
require you and more-ouer charge you vp-on my blissyng , and as ye wull
haue my good will , that if any such sale or bargany be mad be your
assent or wyth-ought , be Calle or any othere in your name , that ye
restreyn it ; PASTON,I,362.117.3611

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:30?
LETTER:PASTON_117:M4:1472?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
for I wuld not for a m=l= marc. +tat it were vnderstond +tat ye were of
+tat disposicion , ner that ye were comyn to so gret nede which shuld
cause $you to do so , PASTON,I,362.117.3612

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:30?
LETTER:PASTON_117:M4:1472?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
for euery shuld thynk +tat it were thurgh your owyn mys-gouernaunce .
PASTON,I,362.117.3613

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:30?
LETTER:PASTON_117:M4:1472?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
There-fore I charge you , if any such bargayn be mad , that ye send a
bill as hastly as ye can to Herry Halman , +tat he do all such as haue
mad or takyn +tat bargayn seasse , and felle non of +te wood vp-on peyn
that may falle +ter-of . PASTON,I,362.117.3614

{ED:215._TO_JOHN_PASTON_III_1472,_5_FEBRUARY}

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:28
LETTER:PASTON_118:M4:1472:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To John Paston , esquyere , be this deliuered . </font>
PASTON,I,363.118.3621

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:28
LETTER:PASTON_118:M4:1472:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
I grete you wele PASTON,I,363.118.3622

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:28
LETTER:PASTON_118:M4:1472:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and send you Goddes blyssyng and myn , letyng you wete that the woman
that sewyth the appell ageyn your brothere and his men is comyn to
London to calle there-vp-on , PASTON,I,363.118.3623

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:28
LETTER:PASTON_118:M4:1472:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and whan that she shuld come to London there was deliuered here c s.
for to sewe wyth ; so that , be that I here in this countre` , she wull
not leve it but that she shall calle there-vp-on such tyme as shall be
to your most rebuke , but if ye ley the better wetch .
PASTON,I,363.118.3624

nyght the felesshep at Cayster tokyn ought of Mautby Cloos xvj shep of
diuerse mennes +tat were put there-in to pasture ,
PASTON,I,366.119.3648

and thei ledde them a-wey so that euery man ferith to put any bestes or
catell +ter-in , to my grete hurt and discoragyng of my fermour +tat is
now of late come theder . PASTON,I,366.119.3649

from Yarmoth this weke , PASTON,I,366.119.3650

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:28?

and shotte at hym , +tat if he had not had a good hors he had be like
to haue ben in joparte` of his lyfe ; so that be thes rewle I am like
to lese +te profite of +tat lyfelode this yere but if there be purueyd
the hastyere remedy . PASTON,I,366.119.3651

Item , as for Sporyl wood , be-for the Kyngys comyng in-to Norffolk I
myth an had chapmen to a bowtyd a gret for xij=xx= mark ,
PASTON,I,372.122.3750

and now ther wol no man by yt a gret by-cause of +te gret good +tat the
pepyll ys leyd to for +te Kyng . Wer-for we ar a-bowth to retaylyt as
well as we may , and as well as yt can be browth too , and send yow
word how we shall do as astely as I may . PASTON,I,372.122.3751

<font> To the right worshipffull Ser John Paston , knyght , in haste .
</font> PASTON,I,376.125.3824

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:33
LETTER:PASTON_125:M4:1475:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Right welbeloued son , I grete yow wele PASTON,I,376.125.3825

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:33
LETTER:PASTON_125:M4:1475:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and sende you Godes blissyng and myn , desiryng to knowe how ye do and
how ye fare . PASTON,I,376.125.3826

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:33
LETTER:PASTON_125:M4:1475:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
I mervell moche I here no word from you in writyng sith the letter I
sent you be Symme weche he delyuerd you at London , wherin I sent you
word that I desired <P_I,377> to knowe how ye wold that I , and other
weche ye wold , shulde do for you here bothe for your liflode and for
other thynges and also for the mater be-twix your vncle and you , and
also be-twix yow and other folkes ; PASTON,I,377.125.3827

AUTHOR:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:33
LETTER:PASTON_125:M4:1475:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
for , as God defende , and ought come to you but weele nowther I nor
non other that I knowe +tat owyth yow wery goode wille wot not in what
cace ye stonde nor how ye wold it shulde be dalte wyth , nouther in
lyfelode nor in othyr thynges , weche is ryght hevy to me for to
remembre concederyng the viage weche ye be in nough at this tyme .
PASTON,I,377.125.3828

and charged them that they shulde not pay no money nor no dewte`s
longyng to +tat londe but only to hym or his son or suche as they wol
assigne , and he to saue them harmeles a-yen you and all other .
Wherfore I requere and prey you , as hastely as ye godely may , for my
hertes eace to sende me worde how ye and your brethern fare , and how
ye spede in your viages , and a knowelege how ye wold that I and other
shulde dele for you in thes maters a-boue wreten , ar in any other that
ye thynke shuld be profitable for you ; PASTON,I,377.125.3840

contry is bareyn of money and +tat my lady of Yorke and all her howsold
is here at Sein Benettes and purposed to a-bide there stille til the
Kynge come from be-yonde the see , and lenger if she like the eyre ther
, as it is seide . PASTON,I,377.125.3842

<font> To my rythg reuerent and worchypfoll fadere John Paston ,
esquyere , dwellyng jn Heylysdon , be thys lettere delyueryd jn haste .
</font> PASTON,I,390.126.3846

LETTER:PASTON_126:M4:1461:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR

PASTON,I,390.126.3847

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:FATHER:1421:40

LETTER:PASTON_126:M4:1461:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR

wrythgtyng , PASTON,I,390.126.3849

fore I kowd not spede to myn jntent the materys that ye sent to me fore
. PASTON,I,390.126.3850

LETTER:PASTON_126:M4:1461:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
I laboryd dayly my lord of Estsexe , treserere of Ynglond , to haue
meuyd the Kyng bothe of the manere $of Deddham and of the byll copye of
the corte rolle euerye mornyng ore he went to the Kyng ,
PASTON,I,390.126.3851

LETTER:PASTON_126:M4:1461:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:19

LETTER:PASTON_126:M4:1461:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR

tymys de-layeng me that jn trowthe I thowt ta haue send yowe word that
I felyd by hym that he was not wyllyng to meue the Kyng there-in .

and prayed Baronners , hys man , to remembyre hym of it .

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:19
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:FATHER:1421:40
LETTER:PASTON_126:M4:1461:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
I told offten tymys to my seyd lord that I had a man teryyn jn town
that I schuld a sente to yow fore othyre sundry materys , and he teryid
fore no thyng but that I mythg send yowe by hym an answere of the seyd
materys ; othyre tymys besechyng hym to spede me in thoys materys fore
thys cawse that ye schuld thynke no defawte jn me <P_I,391> fore
rememberyng jn the seyd materys . PASTON,I,391.126.3857

LETTER:PASTON_126:M4:1461:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR

had meuyd the Kyngys hythgnes there-in ; PASTON,I,391.126.3858

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:19
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:FATHER:1421:40
LETTER:PASTON_126:M4:1461:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and he answeryd me +tat he hadde felte and meuyd the Kyng there-in ,
rehersyng the Kyngys answere +ter-in : how +tat , when he had meuyd the
Kyng in the seyd maner of Dedham , besechyng hym to be yowre good lord
there-in , konsyderyng the seruyse and trewe hart that ye haue done and
owthg to hym , and jn espesyal the rygth that ye haue there-to , he
seyd he wold be yowre good lord therein as he wold be to the porest man
jn Inglond . PASTON,I,391.126.3859

{ED:234._TO_JOHN_PASTON_I_PROBABLY_1464,_5_MARCH}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:22?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:FATHER:1421:43?
LETTER:PASTON_127:M4:1464?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To my ryght wyrschypful fadre John Paston , esquyere , be thys
letter delyueryd in hasty wyse . </font> PASTON,I,394.127.3895

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:22?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:FATHER:1421:43?
LETTER:PASTON_127:M4:1464?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Ryght worschypful syre , jn the most lowly wyse I comaund me to yowre
good faderhod , besechyng yow of yowre blyssyng . PASTON,I,394.127.3896

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:22?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:FATHER:1421:43?
LETTER:PASTON_127:M4:1464?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Mut it plese yowre faderhod to remembre and concydre the peyn and
heuynesse +tat it hathe ben to me syn yowre departyng owt of thys
contre` , here abydyng tyl the tyme it please yow to schewe me grace ,
and tyl the tyme that by reporte my demenyng be to yowre plesyng ;
besechyng yow to concydre +tat I may not nere haue noo mene to seke to
yow as I awght to do sauyng vndre thys forme , whych I besech yow be
not take to no dysplesure , ner am not of power to do any thynge in
$thys contre` for worschyp or profyht of yow nere ease of yowre
tenauntys whych myght and scholde be to yowre pleasyng . Wherfor I
beseche yow of yowre faderly pyte` to tendre +te more thys symple
wryghtyng , as I schal owt of dowght her-afftere doo +tat schal please
yow to +te vttermest of my powere and labore . PASTON,I,394.127.3897

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:22?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:FATHER:1421:43?
LETTER:PASTON_127:M4:1464?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And if there be any servyce +tat I may do , if it please yow to comaund
me or if I maye vnderstonde it , I wyl be as glad to do it as any thyng
erthely , if it were any thyng +tat myght be to yowre pleasyng .
PASTON,I,394.127.3898

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:22?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:FATHER:1421:43?
LETTER:PASTON_127:M4:1464?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And nomore , but Allmyghty God haue yow in kepyng .
PASTON,I,394.127.3899

Wretyn the v day of Marche . By yowre oldere sone John Paston
PASTON,I,394.127.3900

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:FATHER:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_128:M4:1465:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Pleasyth it yow to wete +tat I sente yow a letter but late agoo , in
whych letter I lete yow haue vnderstondyng +tat , if it pleasyd yow to
grante and assente there-to , Syre Thomas Howes wolde resyngne the
benefyce of Mawteby to a ful prestly man of Norwych callyd Syr Thomas
Lyndys , whom I suppose ye haue knolech of . PASTON,I,395.128.3903

and I vnderstond and knowe hys vertews leuyng and dysposicion ryght
wele , whyche herafftere I wote wele scholde please yow ryght wele .
PASTON,I,395.128.3906

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:23
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:FATHER:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_128:M4:1465:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And that letter whyche I sente yow , as I vnderstod syns , Nycholas
Colman the berere there-of cam not owte of Norwych iiij or v dayes
aftere that the bylle was delyueryd hym , wherfor I am jn dowte
whythere it is come to yowre handes <em> or </em> $not , whyche cawsyth
me to wryght to yow ageyn jn thys wyse ; besechyng yow , if it plese
yow +tat the seyd Syr Thomas Lyndys schal be of yowre promotyng jn +te
wyse above wretyn , +tat then it lyke yow +tat I may haue answere by
the berere herof , whych schal tary at London a day or ij and not
passyng . PASTON,I,395.128.3907

Nomore to yow at thys tyme , but Alle-myghty God haue yow in guydyng .
PASTON,I,395.128.3908

Wretyn at Heylesdon the Fryday next byfore Sceynt Mychell . By yowre
oldere son John Paston PASTON,I,395.128.3909

{ED:236._TO_JOHN_PASTON_III_1467,_PROBABLY_MARCH}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:25
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:23
LETTER:PASTON_129:M4:1467:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To my brothere John Paston . </font> PASTON,I,396.129.3910

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:25
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:23
LETTER:PASTON_129:M4:1467:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Ryght worschypful and verrely welbelouyd brothere , I hertely comande
me to yow , thankyng yow of yowre labore and dyligence that ye haue in
kepyng of my place at Castre so sewerly , both-2 wyth yowre hert and
mynde , to yowr gret bisynesse and troble ; PASTON,I,396.129.3911

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:25
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:23
LETTER:PASTON_129:M4:1467:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and I ageynwarde haue hadde so lytell leysere that I haue not spedde
bot fewe of yowre erendys , nere $can $not {TEXT:kannot} before thys
tyme . PASTON,I,396.129.3912

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:25
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:23
LETTER:PASTON_129:M4:1467:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
$As $fore {TEXT:Asfore} my lady Boleynes dysposicion to yow werdys , I
$can $not {TEXT:kannot} in no wyse fynde hyre a-greable +tat ye scholde
haue here dowter , for all the preuy meanes +tat I kowde make ; in so
moche I hadde so lytell comfore by all the meanes +tat I kowde make
+tat I dysdeyned in myn own person to comon wyth hyre there-in .
PASTON,I,396.129.3913

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:25
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:23
LETTER:PASTON_129:M4:1467:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Neuerthelesse I vndre-stande +tat sche seythe , ' What if he and sche
kan agre` , I wyll not lette it ; PASTON,I,396.129.3914

but I will neuer advyse hyre therto in no wyse . '
PASTON,I,396.129.3915

And vppon Tewesday last past sche rood hom in-to Norfolke ; wherfore as
ye thynke ye may fynde the meane to speke wyth hyre yowre-selfe ,
PASTON,I,396.129.3916

And as fore Crosseby , I vndrestand not +tat +ter is no maryage
concludyd betwen them ; PASTON,I,396.129.3918

hyre pleasur and yowrys , but that thys ye $can $not {TEXT:kannot} do

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:27

and I suppose ther cam no man owt of the place to yow syn that tyme
that cowde haue asserteynyd to yow of there dethys .
PASTON,I,405.131.3950

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:27
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_131:M4:1469:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And as towchyng the fyrsenesse of the Duke ere of hys peple schewyd syn
that tyme that Wryttel departyd , I trowe it was concludyd that trews
and abstynence of werre scholde be hadd ere he departyd whych shalle
dewre tyl Monday next comyng . PASTON,I,405.131.3951

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:27

nyght afftre , by whych tyme I hope of a goode dyreccion schall be
hadde . PASTON,I,405.131.3952

abut . PASTON,I,406.131.3958

And the grettest deffaut erthly is mony , and som frendys and neyborys
to helpe ; wherffore I beseche yow to sende me comfort what money ye
coude fynde the menys to get ore cheuysche vppon suerte` sufficient ere
vppon lyfflod to be jnmorgage ere yit solde , and what peple by lyklyod
, yowre frendys and myn , kowde make vppon a schort warnyng , and to
sende me worde in all the hast as it is nedffull .
PASTON,I,406.131.3959

fore the hasty purchace of mony and men schall be the getyng and rescu
of it , and the sauevacion of most mennys lyffys , iff we take +tat
weye . PASTON,I,406.131.3975

whych same only maye be lyklyod be the savacion of all .

and promyse yow +tat I haue and schall labore and fynde +te meane +tat
ye schall haue honore of yowre delyng , as ye haue hyddre-towardys , as
all Ingelond and euery man reportythe . PASTON,I,407.132.3997

schall be one exicutyd by thys day xiiij nyght at +te ferthest , and
parauenture wyth-in vij dayes , PASTON,I,407.132.3998

I wolde nat +tat they were maryed of a whyle , iff it maye be , fore
dyuers concideracions . PASTON,I,409.133.4033

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:27
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_133:M4:1469:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Iff it lyk yow to speke on my behalffe , and yowrys bothe , to +te
Bysshop to tary it tyll Crystmesse , I hope by that tyme to fynde som
remedye therffore ; and to telle hym that I desyryd yow to speke to hym
therin . PASTON,I,409.133.4034

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:27
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_133:M4:1469:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And iff soo be that they sshall be maryed in haste , +tat than ye sende
me worde +ter-of whether it be don or nott , and whoghe he purposythe
to dele wyth hyre , and how he woll gyde hyre and wher he woll dwelle .
PASTON,I,409.133.4035

Item , that it lyke yow to vndrestande what fellaschyp and what guydyng
ys at Caster , and that ye haue alwey som spye that maye be grett wyth
them and so to vndrestande it and to sende me worde .
PASTON,I,409.133.4036

the Erle of Essex , the lordez Harry and John of Bokyngham , the Lord
Dakrez , the Lorde Chambreleyn , the Lorde Montjoye , and many other
knyghtys and sqwyerys , the meyr of London , xxij aldremen in skarlett
, and of the crafftys men of the town to +te nombre of cc all in blewe
. PASTON,I,409.133.4040

<P_I,412>

{ED:248._TO_JOHN_PASTON_III_1470,_ABOUT_20_FEBRUARY}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:28
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:26
LETTER:PASTON_134:M4:1470:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
<font> To John Paston , esquiere , beyng at Norwyche , be thys letter
delyueryd . </font> PASTON,I,412.134.4055

<P_I,413>

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:28
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:26
LETTER:PASTON_134:M4:1470:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
I comande me to yow , letyng yow wete that I haue receyuyd yowre letter
in +te boxe , and the byllys also off yowre receytys where-in ye
refferre yow to a rekenyng whyche ye made to me last , whyche I
remembre nat , nere haue no byllys off it that I remembre .
PASTON,I,413.134.4056

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:28
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:26
LETTER:PASTON_134:M4:1470:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
But thys was it that I desyred off yow to haue wreten ore asserteynyd
me off in rekenyng off all the receyt , asswell olde as newe , off all
that was be-hynde and owyng off the tenantys by the seyng and wryghtyng
off Richard Call , and off whom and in what place and what daye and
whyther off the olde arreragys ore ellys off the last yere .
PASTON,I,413.134.4057

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:28
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:26
LETTER:PASTON_134:M4:1470:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Item , ye wryghte to Osberne Berney vij li. , refferryng yow to +te
last rekenyng , PASTON,I,413.134.4058

and I haue not +tat I knowe no suche rekenyng , PASTON,I,413.134.4059

and what is owyng me . PASTON,I,413.134.4061

But thys ye may sey to Wylliam Yeluerton , whyche hathe by-foore thys
tyme feynet that he ment well and wold that we hadd ben acordyd , that
ye vndrestand that suche a tretye is hadd be-twen hym and me , and that
ye preye God make an ende betwen vs , and than schall we all be goode
felawez ageyn ; and that ye vndrestande +tat Heydon woll be a gret
letter her-off , for he louythe nowthe Syr W. Yeluerton in conclusion ,
nor me nowther , and that he hathe a gret whyle lawhyd at vs bothe ;
and iff we tweyn wer agreyd that nowthere of vsse bothe hathe no nede
in tyme to kome to dele wyth hym , PASTON,I,414.134.4099

<P_I,430>

{ED:256._TO_JOHN_PASTON_III_1470,_5_AUGUST}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:28
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:26
LETTER:PASTON_135:M4:1470:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Brother , I comand me to yow , letyng yow wete +tat I sende yow a
letter in a boxe by Corby , and a nother by Gulmyn the gonnere whyche I
wote well is nat comen yit to yow ; wherffor I praye yow to remembre
the letter broght to yow by Coorby , and in cheff that the euydence
whyche ye wote offe be here in all the haste , PASTON,I,430.135.4142

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:28
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:26
LETTER:PASTON_135:M4:1470:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
for by my trowthe and they be not her by Saterdaye itt is to me a
reproche , PASTON,I,430.135.4143

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:28
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:26
LETTER:PASTON_135:M4:1470:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
I haue so largely appoyntyd and promysed ther-in .

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:26
LETTER:PASTON_135:M4:1470:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Item , I thynke +tat Mestresse Kateryn Dodlee hathe lettyd yow ,
wherffor iff it soo be +tat Dauerse com in-to Norffolke ere than ye
haue serchyd fore the seyde euydence , he woll parcase desyre to helpe
yow , whyche nedythe nat to doo , PASTON,I,430.135.4145

company in that {in}_P ye maye . PASTON,I,430.135.4148

Westminster sent me on a tyme by hym to the Moore a rynge off goolde to
a tookne , whyche I hadde not off hym ; wherffor I wolde he scholde
sende it hyddre , PASTON,I,430.135.4149

<P_I,439>

{ED:263._TO_JOHN_PASTON_III_1471,_15_SEPTEMBER}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:29
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:27
LETTER:PASTON_136:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To Mestresse Margret Paston or to John Paston , esquier , hyr
sone , in hast . </font> PASTON,I,439.136.4172

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:29
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:27
LETTER:PASTON_136:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Ryght well belouyd brother , I comande me to yow , letyng yow wete +tat
I am in wellffare , I thanke God , and haue ben euyre syns +tat I spake
last wyth yow ; PASTON,I,439.136.4173

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:29
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:27
LETTER:PASTON_136:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and mervayle sore +tat ye sent neuer wryghtyng to me syns ye <P_I,440>
departyd . PASTON,I,440.136.4174

and iff ye had sent to Wykys he scholde haue conveyd it to me .

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:27
LETTER:PASTON_136:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
I herde yister-daye +tat a worsted man off Norffolk +tat solde
worstedys at Wynchester seyde +tat my lord off Norffolk and my lady wer
on pylgrymage at Owre Lady on foote , and so they went to Caster ; and
+tat at Norwyche on scholde haue had large langage to yow and callyd
yow traytore , and pyked many quarellys to yow . PASTON,I,440.136.4178

LETTER:PASTON_136:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Item , I wolde wete whether ye haue spokyn wyth my lady off Norffolk or
not , and off hyr dysposicion , and the howsoldys , to me and to yow
wardes , and whether it be a possible to haue Caster ageyn and ther
goode wyllis , or nott . PASTON,I,440.136.4188

Caster , PASTON,I,440.136.4189

so +tat fro hense forthe by yowr langage noo man parceyue +tat ye fauor
any person contrary to +te Kynges plesure . PASTON,I,440.136.4193

For all my spekyng wyth hym my-selffe , and +ter-to +te {ED:daye}
assyngnyd by hym-selffe , wher as he scholde haue payed at Candelmes to
paye me , he hadd daye to paye Townesend tyll Fastyngonge ;
PASTON,I,440.136.4201

. PASTON,I,440.136.4203

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:29
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:27
LETTER:PASTON_136:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
for by my trowthe I kan not her by <P_I,441> pylgrymes +tat passe +te
contre` , ner noon other man +tat rydethe er gothe any contre` , +tat
any borow town in Ingelonde is free from +tat sykenesse .
PASTON,I,441.136.4210

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:29
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:27
LETTER:PASTON_136:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
God sease it whan it pleasyt hym . PASTON,I,441.136.4211

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:29
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:27
LETTER:PASTON_136:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Wherffor , for Goddysake , late my moodre take heede to my yonge
brytheryn , that they be nat in noon place wher that sykenesse is
regnyng , nor that they dysport not wyth noon other yonge peple whyche
resortythe wher any sykenesse is . PASTON,I,441.136.4212

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:29
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:27
LETTER:PASTON_136:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And iff +ter be any off that syknesse ded or enffecte in Norwyche , for
Goddes sake lete hyre sende them to som frende off hyrse in-to +te
contre` , PASTON,I,441.136.4213

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:29
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:27
LETTER:PASTON_136:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and do ye +te same , by myn advyce . PASTON,I,441.136.4214

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:29
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:27
LETTER:PASTON_136:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Late my moodre rather remeve hyr howsolde in-to +te contre` .
PASTON,I,441.136.4215

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:29
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:27
LETTER:PASTON_136:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Euyn now Thyrston browt me worde fro Lundon +tat it was Doctore Aleyn
+tat cawsyd yowre troble +tat ye had at Norwych , and +tat John Pampyng
roode for a dyscharge fore yow and +tat he hathe sped well ;
PASTON,I,441.136.4216

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:29
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:27
LETTER:PASTON_136:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
but hoghe , +tat wot I nott . PASTON,I,441.136.4217

<P_I,442>

{ED:264._TO_JOHN_PASTON_III_1471,_28_SEPTEMBER}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:25
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:23
LETTER:PASTON_137:M4:1467:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To hys well belovyd John Paston , esquier , at Norwyche , or to
Mestresse Margret hys moodre . </font> PASTON,I,442.137.4241

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:25
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:23
LETTER:PASTON_137:M4:1467:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
I comande me to yow , letyng yow weet +tat I vndrestonde +tat +te
Duchesse off Suffolk and +te Duke of Norffolk concelle jntend verrely
thys terme in the begynnyng to comence a-geyn the appelys ageyn me and
yow and other off owr seruantys , wherffor itt is full convenyent +tat
we take goode heede and ryght goode advyce how to guyde vs for itt ,
and whether it is convenyent for me to appyre or nott ; wher-in I wolde
, as well as in other materys , fayne knowe yowre advyce and comon wyth
yow and other off my frendes er I joparte any sertayn weye ,
PASTON,I,442.137.4242

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:25
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:23
LETTER:PASTON_137:M4:1467:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
for in my conseyt I most thys terme take oon wey or other . Wherffor I
praye yow , iff ye maye in any wyse , +tat ye wolde be her at London
wyth-in iiij dayes afftre Seynt Feythe , as well for the materys above
wretyn as for a fynall conclusion to be taken wyth Mestresse An Hault
and wyth all other folkys . PASTON,I,442.137.4243

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:25
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:23
LETTER:PASTON_137:M4:1467:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Item , I vndrestande be Juddy +tat he hathe spoken wyth yowr cosyn
Sampson at +te Barse , PASTON,I,442.137.4244

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:25
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:23
LETTER:PASTON_137:M4:1467:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and he promyttyd Juddy +tat he scholde hym-selffe haue spoken wyth yow
er thys tym . PASTON,I,442.137.4245

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:25

PASTON,I,442.137.4246

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:25
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:23
LETTER:PASTON_137:M4:1467:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
howe it is syns I wote not . PASTON,I,442.137.4247

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:25
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:23
LETTER:PASTON_137:M4:1467:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
I wolde fayne haue the mesure wher my fadre lythe at Bromholm , bothe
the thyknesse and compase off the peler at hys hed and from that the
space to +te alter , and the thyknesse off that awtre and jmagery off
tymbre werk , and what hyght the arche is to +te gronde off +te jlde ,
and how hye the grovnde off the qwyre is hyer than the grownde off the
jlde . PASTON,I,442.137.4248

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:25
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:23
LETTER:PASTON_137:M4:1467:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Item , I praye yowe late the mesure by pakthred be taken , or ell
mesured by yerde , how moche is from the northe gate ther the brygge
was at Gressham to +te sowthe wall , and in lyke forme from the este
syde to +te west ; also the hyght off the este wall and the $hyght off
the sowthest towre from +te grownde , iff ye maye easely .
PASTON,I,442.137.4249

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:25
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:23
LETTER:PASTON_137:M4:1467:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Alsso what breede euery towre is wyth-in +te wall , and whych towre is
moore than other wyth-in ; PASTON,I,442.137.4250

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:25
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:23
LETTER:PASTON_137:M4:1467:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
alsso how manye fote or what brede eche towre takythe , wythin jche
cornere off +te quadrate <P_I,443> ovyrethwert the dorys , and how many
taylorys yerdys is from +te moote syde wher the brygg was to +te hyghe
weye , or to +te heddge all a-longe the entre` , and what brede the
entre` is be-twyen +te dykys . PASTON,I,443.137.4251

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:25
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:23
LETTER:PASTON_137:M4:1467:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
I praye yow , iff ye haue a leyser in any wyse , se thys doone
yowr-selffe iff ye maye ; PASTON,I,443.137.4252

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:25
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:23
LETTER:PASTON_137:M4:1467:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
or ellys iff Pampyng do it , or who +tat ye thynke can doo it , I wolle
spende xx d. , or as ye seme , to haue the sertayn off euery thyng
her-in . PASTON,I,443.137.4253

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:23
LETTER:PASTON_137:M4:1467:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA

ryden and goon to Canterbury , neuyr so moche peple seyn in pylgrymage
her-to-foor at ones , as men seye . PASTON,I,443.137.4256

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:30

LETTER:PASTON_138:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Most worschypffull and kynde moodre , I comande me to yow
PASTON,I,445.138.4286

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:30
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_138:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and beseche yow off yowre dayly blyssyng and remembraunce .
PASTON,I,445.138.4287

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:30
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_138:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Please it yow to wete thatt I haue my pardon , as +te berere heroff can
jnfforme yowe , for comffort wheroffe I haue been the merier thys
Crystmesse , and haue been parte ther-off wyth Syr George Browen and
wyth my lady myn aunte hys wyffe . PASTON,I,445.138.4288

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:30
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_138:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And be-for Twelthe I come to my lorde Archebysshope , wher I haue hadde
as greete cheer , and ben as welkom , as I cowde devyse ,
PASTON,I,445.138.4289

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:30
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_138:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and iff I hadde ben in sewerte` +tat Castre weere hadde ageyn I wolde
haue comen homewardes <P_I,446> thys daye ; wherffor I sende thys man
home nowe to late yow haue knowleche theroff , and my brother bothe ,
in chyeffe for thys cause , that iff theer be any crafftye delaye by
Sothewell or Brandon , thatt than my brother maye late them haue
knowleche ther-off , soo thatt my lordes concell off Norffolk maye
vndrestand thatt my lorde neer noon other maye haue it off +te Kynges
<em> ... </em> as they $haue been halffe <em> ... </em> off
heer-to-foore ; besechyng yow to hast my brother in laboryng ther-abowt
iff <em> ... </em> be <em> ... </em> soo thatt itt maye ones ageyn come
to Crysten mennes handes . PASTON,I,446.138.4290

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:30
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_138:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And by the latter ende off thys terme , iffe itt be hadde ageyn , I
purpose to come home and see yow thys Lente and sette my londe in
better rewle than {in}_P itt hathe been heer-to-foore and repayre vppe
my howses . PASTON,I,446.138.4291

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:30
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_138:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And I beseche yow to remember my brother to doo hys deueyre thatt I
maye haue ageyn my stuffe , my bookes and vestmentys , and my beddyng ,
how so euyre hee doo , thoghe I scholde gyffe xx=ti= scutes by hys
advyse to my lady Brandon or som other goode felawe .
PASTON,I,446.138.4292

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:30
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_138:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
As for any tydynges , ther be noon heer saffe +tat the Kynge hathe
kepte a ryall Crystmesse , and now they seye +tat hastelye he woll
northe , and some seye +tat he woll in-to Walys , and some seye +tat he
woll in-to +te west contre` . PASTON,I,446.138.4293

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:30
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_

Wyndeshore to Walyngfforthe nyghe to Ewhelme , my lady off Suffolk
place in Oxenfforthe schyre . PASTON,I,446.138.4294

{ED:269._TO_JOHN_PASTON_III_1472,_4_NOVEMBER}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:30
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:28
LETTER:PASTON_140:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
A Johan Paston , esquyere , soit done` . PASTON,I,449.140.4324

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:30
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:28
LETTER:PASTON_140:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Worshypffull and weell belovyd brother , I recomaund me to yow , letyng
yow weet +tat I sente yow a letter and a rynge wyth a dyamand , in
whyche letter ye myght well conceyue what I wold ye scholde do wyth +te
same ryng , wyth manye other tydyngys and thyngys whyche I prayed yowe
to haue doon for me ; whyche letter Boton had the beryng off .
PASTON,I,449.140.4325

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:30
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:28
LETTER:PASTON_140:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
It is soo nowe +tat I vndrestond that he is owther deed ore ellys harde
eskapyd , wheroff I am ryght heuye , and am not serteyn whethyre the
seyd letter and rynge come to yowre handys ore nott .
PASTON,I,449.140.4326

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:30
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:28
LETTER:PASTON_140:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
I wolde nott that letter were seyn wyth som folkys , wherffor I praye
yow take goode heede hoghe thatt letter comythe to yowre handys , hooll
or brokyn ; PASTON,I,449.140.4327

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:30
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:28
LETTER:PASTON_140:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and in especiall I praye yow gete it iff ye haue it nott .
PASTON,I,449.140.4328

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:30
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:28
LETTER:PASTON_140:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Also I praye yow feele my lady off Norffolkys dysposicion to me wardys
, and whethyre she toke any dysplesure at my langage , ore mokkyd ore
dysdeyned my wordys whyche I hadd to hyre at Yarmothe be-twyen the
place where I fyrst mett wyth hyre and hyre lodgyng .
PASTON,I,449.140.4329

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:30
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:28
LETTER:PASTON_140:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Fore my lady Brandon <P_I,450> and Syr William also axhyd me what
wordys I had had to hyre at that tyme . PASTON,I,450.140.4330

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:30
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:28
LETTER:PASTON_140:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
They seyde +tat my lady seyde I gaff hyre ther-off , and +tat I sholde
haue seyde +tat my lady was worthye to haue a lordys soon in hyre belye
, PASTON,I,450.140.4331

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:30
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:28
LETTER:PASTON_140:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
fore she cowde cheryshe itt and dele warlye wyth it .
PASTON,I,450.140.4332

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:30
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:28
LETTER:PASTON_140:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
In trowthe , owther the same ore wordys moche lyke I had to hyre ,
whyche wordys I ment as I seyde . PASTON,I,450.140.4333

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:30
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:28
LETTER:PASTON_140:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
They leye to +tat I seyde she toke hyre ease . PASTON,I,450.140.4334

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:30
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:28
LETTER:PASTON_140:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Also I scholde haue seyde +tat my ladye was off $stature goode and had
sydes longe and large , so that I was in goode hope she sholde bere a
fayre chylde ; PASTON,I,450.140.4335

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:28

he was nott lacyd nore bracyd jne to hys peyn , but +tat she leff hym
rome to pleye hym in . PASTON,I,450.140.4336

sholde haue rome jnow to goo owt att . PASTON,I,450.140.4337

nowt , or whether she thynke I mokkyd hyre , or iff she wyght it but
lewdnesse off my-selffe , I praye yow sende me worde ,
PASTON,I,450.140.4340

Item , os fore tydynges , nowe heer be but fewe saff that , as I
vndrestande , jmbassatorys off Bretayn shall come to London to-morowe ,
and men seye that the Lorde Ryuerse and Scalys shall hastelye come hom
, and men seye +tat ther is many off the sowdeorys +tat went to hym
in-to Bretayn been deede off the flyxe and othere jpedemye , and +tat
the remenant sholde come hom wyth the Lorde Skalys ;
PASTON,I,450.140.4342

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:28
LETTER:PASTON_141:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
A John Paston , esquyer , soyt done` . PASTON,I,451.141.4357

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:30
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:28
LETTER:PASTON_141:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Brother , I comand me to yow , letyng yow weet +tat wheer my moodre
desyreth +tat I sholde sende worde to my fermorys off Sporle that they
sholde paye to my moodre x marke for my brother William , it weere nowe
to short a warnyng , PASTON,I,451.141.4358

. PASTON,I,451.141.4359

wher-off I am not serteyn . PASTON,I,451.141.4372

yeer , I feer me she wolde be weery and lothe to paye an other c s. for
the next . PASTON,I,451.141.4373

me a thank moore than the rynge and I are worthe ore deserue .

And wheer ye goo to my laydy off Norffolkys and wyll be theere att the
takyng off hyre chambre , I praye God spede yow , and Owre Ladye hyre
to hyre plesure , wyth as easye labore to overkom that she is abowt as
euyre had any lady or gentyll-woman saff Owre Lady heer-selffe .

{ED:271._TO_MARGARET_PASTON_OR_JOHN_PASTON_III_1472,_22_NOVEMBER}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:30
RECIPIENT:MARGARET[N.MAUTBY][0R_JOHN_PASTON_III]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_142:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
<font> To Mestresse Margret Paston , or to John Paston , esquiere , or
to Roose dwyllyng affore ther gate to delyuer to them . </font>
PASTON,I,453.142.4402

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:30
RECIPIENT:MARGARET[N.MAUTBY][0R_JOHN_PASTON_III]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_142:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Please it yow to weete +tat I have opteyned letterys from the Kynge to
my lorde off Norffolke , to my lady off Norffolke , and to ther concell
, whyche letter to there concell is nott superscrybyd for cawse we wyst
nott serteyn whyche off the councell sholde be present when the
massengere cowme . PASTON,I,453.142.4403

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:30
RECIPIENT:MARGARET[N.MAUTBY][0R_JOHN_PASTON_III]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_142:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
I therffor thynke +tat thoos namys most be somwhatt by yowre advyce ,
PASTON,I,453.142.4404

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:30

LETTER:PASTON_142:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and for-get nott Gornaye , nor yitt Brome , iff ye thynke so best , nor
Sowthewelle . PASTON,I,453.142.4405

well do hys mastrys massage and brynge trywe reporte .
PASTON,I,453.142.4413

and wher +tat herre-to-fore I wolde have departyd wyth c $marke
{TEXT:mrke} to have hadde hyre goode helpe and to be restoryd to my
place , whyche nott acceptyd I tolde my seyde lady +tat I feeryd +tat
my power sholde natt be ther-afftre to gyff so large a plesyre ;
PASTON,I,453.142.4419

for at +tat tyme I was in hope +tat the Bysshop off Wynchester sholde
have payd it , thoghe it hadde drawen a c li . PASTON,I,453.142.4420

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:30

LETTER:PASTON_142:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Yit , for as moche as men may nott lure none hawkys wyth empty handys ,
I wolde yitt agre` to gyffe my lady xx li. for an horse and a sadell so
+tat I be restoryd to my place , and thatt doone to have a relesse off
my lorde and my gounys and bokys to be <P_I,454> restoryd iff it maye
bee . PASTON,I,454.142.4421

ladyes chambre , +tat my moodre , iff she weer at Norwyche , she myght
speke wyth hyre , for +tat she is a woman and off worshyppe .

LETTER:PASTON_142:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
But as Gode helpe me I thynke my lady shalle have my servyce a-bove any
lady erthely , wheche she scholde weell have knowyn had I been in suche
case as I hadde nott been alweye +te werse welkome for that on off myn
herandys alweye was vndrestande +tat it was for Caster , whyche was
nott acceptable and I euyre the werse welkome . PASTON,I,454.142.4437

Item , brother , I ame concludyd wyth my lorde for yow +tat ye shalle
be at Caleys iff ye list , and have iij men in wagys vndre yow ,
wheroff my lorde seythe +tat William Lovedaye most be on tyll tyme +tat
he have purveyd othere rome for hym . PASTON,I,454.142.4438

{ED:272._TO_JOHN_PASTON_III_1473,_3_FEBRUARY}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:31
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:29
LETTER:PASTON_143:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To John Paston , esqwyere , ore to Mestresse Margret Paston hys
moodre , be thys letter delyueryd . </font> PASTON,I,455.143.4457

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:31
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:29
LETTER:PASTON_143:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Weell belovyd brother , I comand me to yow , letyng yow weet +tat I
wrote yow a letter +te xxij daye off Januare whyche was delyueryd to
Thomas Elys at Caleys the seyde daye , wenyng to me +tat he sholde haue
ben in Norffolk wyth-in vj or vij dayes afftre , PASTON,I,455.143.4458

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:31
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:29
LETTER:PASTON_143:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
but now I vndrestand that thys letter is lyke to be wyth yow as sone as
it . PASTON,I,455.143.4459

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:31
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:29
LETTER:PASTON_143:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
It is so now +tat I suppose verrely to be at London by the xiij or
xiiij daye off Feverere but iff wynde ore wedre cawse it ; at whyche
daye , acordyng as the other letter spekyth off , I beseche my moodre
+tat Playtere maye mete wyth me there , lyke as he and I comonyd
towchyng the maner off Sporle , PASTON,I,455.143.4460

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:31
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:29
LETTER:PASTON_143:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and I trust to God that that mater shall be easyd .
PASTON,I,455.143.4461

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:31
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:29
LETTER:PASTON_143:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Item , I praye yow take goode heed to +te letter +tat yonge Thomas Elys
hathe the beryng off , to weete whether it hathe been oponyd ore nott ;
PASTON,I,455.143.4462

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:31
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:29
LETTER:PASTON_143:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
+te worde is full false . PASTON,I,455.143.4463

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:31

As for tydyngys heer , ther bee but fewe saff +tat +te Duke off Borgoyn
and my lady hys wyffe farethe well ; PASTON,I,455.143.4464

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:31

LETTER:PASTON_143:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
but alwey my sawse was ' How faret Master John yowre brother ? ' ,
wher-wyth I was wrothe and spake a jalous worde are too , dysdeynyng
+tat she shulde care so moche for yow when +tat I was present .
PASTON,I,455.143.4472

<P_I,456>

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:29

contynew past a monyth by lyklyhod . PASTON,I,456.143.4473

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:29
LETTER:PASTON_144:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
I prey yow iff W. Mylsent go froo yow +tat he myght come to me to
Caleys . PASTON,I,460.144.4483

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:31
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:29
LETTER:PASTON_144:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
I woll haue hym . PASTON,I,460.144.4484

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:31
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:29
LETTER:PASTON_144:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Wyrsshypffull and ryght hertyly belowyd brother , I recomande me on-to
yow , letyng yow wete +tat on Wednysdaye last past I wrote yow a letter
wheroff John Garbalde had the beryng , promyttyng me +tat ye shold haue
it at Norwyche thys daye ore ellys to-morowe in the mornyng ; wherin I
praye yowe to take a labore acordyng afftre the tenure off the same ,
and +tat I maye haue an answere at London to Hoxon iff any massenger
come , as $euere {TEXT:eue} I maye doo fore yow . PASTON,I,460.144.4485

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:31
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:29
LETTER:PASTON_144:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
As for tydyngys , there was a truse taken at Brussellys abut the xxvj
daye off Marche last past be-twyn the Duke off Borgoyn and +te Frense
Kyngys jmbassatorys and Master William Atclyff for the Kyng heere ,
whyche is a pese be londe and water tyll the fyrst daye off Apryll nowe
next comyng , betwyen Fraunce and Ingelond and also +te Dukys londes .
PASTON,I,460.144.4486

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:31
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:29
LETTER:PASTON_144:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
God holde it for euere PASTON,I,460.144.4487

Plattyng , yowre man , wolde thys daye byd me fare-well to to-morow at
Douer , not wythstondyng Thryston , yowre other man , is from me and
John Myryell and W. Woode , whyche promysed yow and Dawbeney , God haue
hys sowle , at Castre +tat iff ye wolde take hym in to be ageyn wyth me
+tat than he wold neuer goo fro me ; PASTON,I,461.144.4500

{ED:277._TO_JOHN_PASTON_III_1473,_3_JUNE}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:31
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:29
LETTER:PASTON_145:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To John Paston , esquiere , be thys delyveryd . </font>
PASTON,I,463.145.4511

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:31
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:29
LETTER:PASTON_145:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Ryght wyrshypffull brother , I comand me to yow , latyng yow weet +tat
thys daye I was in verry purpose to Caleys warde , all redy to haue
goon to +te barge , saff I teryed for a yonge man +tat I thoght to haue
had wyth me thyddre , on that was wyth Rows whyche is in the cowntre` .
PASTON,I,463.145.4512

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:31
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:29
LETTER:PASTON_145:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And becawse I cowde not geet hym , and +tat I have nomore heer wyth me
butt Pampyng , Edward , and Jak , therffor Pampyng remembryd me that at
Caleys he tolde me +tat he purposed to be wyth the Duchesse off
Norffolk , my lady and yowrys ; PASTON,I,463.145.4513

And as happe was yisterday Juddy went a-fore to Caleysward ; wherffor I
am nowe ille purueyd , whyche for owte +tat I knowe yit is lyke to kepe
me heere thys Wytsontyd . Wherffor , iff ye knowe any lykly men and
fayre condycioned and good archerys , sende hem to me , thowe it be
iiij , and I wyll have them and they shall haue iiij $marke {TEXT:mrke}
by yere and my levere' . PASTON,I,463.145.4518

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:31
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:29
LETTER:PASTON_145:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
He maye com to me hyddre to +te Gott , or yit to Caleys , wyth a riall
iff he be wyse , whyche iff nede bee I wolde +tat Berkere toke hym to
com vppe wyth , iff it be suche on as ye tryst . PASTON,I,463.145.4519

and Erlham excepte Fayrechyldys ; PASTON,I,464.145.4531

daye vij nyght I sende yow a letter by Nycholas Bardeslee , a sowdyore
whyche is wont to be at borde {ED:at} Perauntys , and also an
hoseclothe off blak fore yow . PASTON,I,465.146.4553

Item , I sende a lytell praty boxe herwith whyche I wolde +tat Juddy
sholde delyuer to +te woman +tat he wotyth off , and praye hyre to take
it to +te man +tat she wotyth off ; +tat is to seye as moche as ye know
all well j-now , bot ye maye nott make yow wyse in no wyse .
PASTON,I,465.146.4564

wellffare , and whether I weere owt and other jnne , ore nott ; and
whether she shall forsake Caleys as sone as ye sende me worde off , or
nott . PASTON,I,465.146.4565

and he hathe wretyn to me +tat he wyll come homwarde by Caleys .
PASTON,I,465.146.4571

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:31

rather for yowre sake . PASTON,I,465.146.4572

but as yit Songer knoweth nott so parffytly all +tat ye wolde weet +tat
he woll nott wryght to yow off thees ij dayes tyll he knowe moore .
PASTON,I,465.146.4574

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:31
RECIPIENT:EDMOND_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:_:_

But iff she hadde ben bolde , and durst have abydyn styll at hyre gate
and spoken wyth me , so God helpe me she had hadd thys same +tat I
sende nowe where ye woot off , whyche ye shall see woryn heer afftre .
PASTON,I,465.146.4575

, PASTON,I,465.146.4577

<P_I,466>

{ED:279._TO_MARGARET_PASTON_1473,_30_JULY}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:31
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_147:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To my ryght wyrshypful Moodre , Margret Paston . </font>
PASTON,I,466.147.4587

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:31
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_147:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Ryght wyrshypffull and my ryght tendre modre , I recomaunde me to yow ,
besechyng yow off yowre dayly blessyng . PASTON,I,466.147.4588

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:31
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_147:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Please it yow to weet +tat I herde nott from yow off longe tyme ,
whyche cawsythe me to be ryght hevye ; PASTON,I,466.147.4589

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:31
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_147:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
nere at +te last tyme +tat I sende to yow in wryghtyng I hadde from
yowre-selffe noo wryghtyng ner answere ageyn saff by Playtere on tym
and by my brother an other tyme , whyche answer off Playtere was
noo-thyng acordyng but contraryaunt to other wryghtyng more comfortable
+tat he had sent me nott longe byffore thatt , on yowre behalve as he
wrotte , whyche God amende . PASTON,I,466.147.4590

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:31
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_147:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Neuerthelesse to my more heuynesse I herde seye +tat ye sholde have
been passhyng hevy for my sake , and in cheffe fore that I was lyke to
late goo the maner off Sporle , wherin I was pytte in comffort to have
had relyffe by the meanes off yow ; PASTON,I,466.147.4591

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:31
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_147:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and syns it was tolde me +tat iff I leete it goo +tat ye wolde therfore
dysavauntage me more londe in tyme to come off syche as by poscybylyte`
myght com to mee off yowrys . Vppon whyche corage my grauntdame and myn
oncle to-gedre gaffe me an answere on hyr part moche lyke ,
PASTON,I,466.147.4592

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:31
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_147:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and so my fadre , God have hys sowle , leffte me scant xl li. londe in
rest , PASTON,I,466.147.4593

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:31
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_147:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and ye leffe me as pleasythe yow , and my grauntdame at hyre plesure .
PASTON,I,466.147.4594

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:31
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_147:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Thus maye I have lytell hope off the worlde . PASTON,I,466.147.4595

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:31
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_147:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Neverthelesse I beseche yow to be my good moodre , how so euer ye doo
wyth yowre londe , PASTON,I,466.147.4596

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:31
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_147:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
fore I feell weell +tat iff I have on losse I am lyke therffor to have
three . PASTON,I,466.147.4597

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:31
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_147:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
But <P_I,467> as for Sporle , it shall nott goo iff I maye nere by my
wyll , PASTON,I,467.147.4598

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:31
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_147:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and iff ther hadde ben performed me as largelye as was promysed me by
Playtere I were sewre it sholde nott have goon nor yit sholde nat goo .
PASTON,I,467.147.4599

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:31
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_147:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Neuerthelesse , iff ye and all my frendys and yowrys in Norffolk myght
haue lende me so moche monye , and to haue takyn it vppe in v yere , I
suppose they sholde par auentur have ben payed ageyn in a yere ore ij
iff I had solde any woode . PASTON,I,467.147.4600

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:31
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_147:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Neuerthelesse , plese yow to weet +tat I have provyd my fadres wyll and
testement , wherin I maye nowt dele on-to +te tyme that all the
executorys have reffused , wherffore ther most be sende sitacions to
yow and alle other that weer namyd my fadris executorys , wherin iff ye
lyst not to take admynystracion , as I woot well ye woll nott off olde
, ye most than make a proctore that must on yowre behalve byffor my
lorde off Canterbury , wyth a sufficiant warant and autoryte` , vndre a
notarys syngne ther in the corte reffuse to take admynestracion ;
PASTON,I,467.147.4601

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:31
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_147:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and thys jnstrument and aultoryte` I beseche yow maye be redy and at
London by the fyrst daye off +te terme . PASTON,I,467.147.4602

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:31
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_147:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And iff ye be not aqueyntyd wyth non suche at London , iff it please
yowe to take and avowe for yowre proctore and sende hym auctoryte` , on
Master John Halsnothe , whyche was a clerke off Master Robert Centys
and was so trusty to my fadre , God have hys sowle , and to sende me a
letter off yowre wylle ther-in , I vndretake +tat he shall nott do but
as ye sende me worde . PASTON,I,467.147.4603

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:31
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_147:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Plese it yow to gyff credence to Juddy her-in . PASTON,I,467.147.4604

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:31
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_147:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
No more to yow at thys tyme , but Jeshu have yow in hys kepyng .
PASTON,I,467.147.4605

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:31
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_147:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Wretyn att Caleys the last daye saff on off Julle .
PASTON,I,467.147.4606

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:31
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_147:M4:1473:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Yowre $sone J. P. , K. PASTON,I,467.147.4607

<P_I,474>

{ED:284._TO_MARGARET_PASTON_1474,_20_FEBRUARY}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_148:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> Mestresse Margrett Paston , at Norwyche . </font>
PASTON,I,474.148.4608

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_148:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Ryght honorable and most tendre good moodre , I recomand me to yowe ,
besechyng yow to haue , as my tryst is +tat I have , yowre dayly
blessyng ; PASTON,I,474.148.4609

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_148:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and thanke yow off yowre good moderhood , kyndenesse , cheere , charge
, and coste whyche I had and pvtte yow to att my last beyng wyth yow ,
$whyche {TEXT:whche} God gyffe me grace her-afftre to deserve .
PASTON,I,474.148.4610

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_148:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Please it yow to weet +tat I thynke longe +tat I heere nott from yow ,
ore from Pekok yowre seruaunt , fore the knowlege howe he hathe doon in
+te sale off my ferme barlye , nere what is made there-off . Wherffore
I beseche yow , iff it be not answeryd by that tyme +tat thys bylle
comythe to yowe , to hast hym and <P_I,475> itt hyddrewardys ,
PASTON,I,475.148.4611

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_148:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
fore iff +tat had nott taryed me I deme I had ben at Caleys by thys
daye . PASTON,I,475.148.4612

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_148:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
For it is soo , as men seye , +tat +te Frense Kynge wyth a gret hoste
is at Amyas , but iij=xx= myle from Caleys , PASTON,I,475.148.4613

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_148:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and iff he ore hys roode byffore Caleys and I nott theere , I wolde be
sorye . PASTON,I,475.148.4614

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_148:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Item , men seye +tat the Erle off Oxenfford hathe ben constreynyd to
sewe fore hys pardon only off hys lyffe , and hys body , goodes ,
londes , wyth all +te remenaunt at +te Kynges wyll , and soo sholde in
all haste nowe com in to +te Kyng . PASTON,I,475.148.4615

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_148:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And som men seye +tat he is goon owt off +te Mownte , men wot not to
what plase , and yit leffte a greet garnyson theere weell fornysshyd in
vytayll and all other thyng . PASTON,I,475.148.4616

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_148:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32

Item , my brother John farethe weell , PASTON,I,475.148.4618

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
