and hathe doon ryght delygentlye in my cosyn Elisabeth Berneys materys
, wheroff hastely I trust he shall sende hyre tydyngys +tat schall
please hyre ; PASTON,I,475.148.4619

<P_I,475>

{ED:285._TO_MARGARET_PASTON_1474,_PROBABLY_NOVEMBER}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_149:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To Mestresse Margrett Paston at Norwyche , er to J. Paston in
hyre absence . </font> PASTON,I,475.149.4624

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_149:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Ryght wyrshypfull and my moste kynd and tendre moodre , I recomaund me
to yow , thankyng yow off the grete cost and off the greet chere +tat
ye dyd to me and myn at my last beyng wyth yowe ; whyche cheere also
hathe made me perffyghtly hooll , I thanke God and yow , in so moche
+tat where as I feeryd me +tat for weykenesse , and so green recuveryd
off my syknesse , +tat I scholde have apeyryd by the weye , but , God
thanke yow , I toke soo my crommys whyls I was wyth yow +tat I felyd
my-sylffe by the weye that God and ye had made me stronger than I wenyd
+tat I had ben , jn so moche +tat I feell my-selffe euery daye hollere
than othere . PASTON,I,475.149.4625

<P_I,476>

It was soo that I mett wyth myn onkle William by the weye ,
PASTON,I,476.149.4626

off hym , PASTON,I,476.149.4627

recompensyng off Towneshend . PASTON,I,476.149.4628

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_

fore I tolde hym +tat I was in hope to fynde suche a freende +tat wolde
lende me c li . PASTON,I,476.149.4634

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_

I answeryd hym an olde marchaunt , a freende off myn ;
PASTON,I,476.149.4636

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_149:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
but myn oncle thowte +tat sholde be by weye off chevyshanse and to myn
horte , wherffore I was pleyne to hym and tolde hym that ye were
sewerte` therffore and purueyed it off suche as wolde doo for yowe .
PASTON,I,476.149.4637

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_149:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And as for the forte c mark , he seyde to me +tat as for that he wolde
, rather than joparte` sholde be , purvey it by weye off chevyshaunce
at London , jn so meche +tat ere he come fro London he had for my sake
leyde v c markys worthe off plate wyth Hewghe Fenne .
PASTON,I,476.149.4638

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_

prey for hys sowle . Wherffor iff it lyke yow by the next massenger ore
karyere to sende hem , in a daye I shall have them dressyd heer ;
PASTON,I,476.149.4656

<P_I,477>

{ED:286._TO_MARGARET_PASTON_1474,_20_NOVEMBER}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_150:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
<font> To Mestresse Margrete Paston , ore to Roose dwellyng byffore
hyre gate at Norwyche . </font> PASTON,I,477.150.4660

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_150:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Afftre dew recomendacion , my most tendre and kynde moodre , I beseche
yow off yowre dayly blessyng . PASTON,I,477.150.4661

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_150:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Please it yow to weete +tat I reseyvyd a lettre that come from yowe ,
wretyn +te xxvj daye off Octobre , non erst but on Wednysday last past
; wherby I conceyvyd +tat at +te wryghtyng off +tat letter ye weere
nott serteyn off the delyng betwyn Towneshende and me .
PASTON,I,477.150.4662

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_150:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
It was so +tat , God thanke yow , I receyvyd +te xx li. broght by Syme
and also the mony browght by my brothere , wyth whyche mony , and wyth
moore +tat I had my-selff , I redemyd the maner off Sporle and payed
Towneshend bothe +te cccc $marke {TEXT:mrke} ther-fore and also x li.
+tat I owte hym besyde ; and have off hym an aqwytaunce off all
bargaynes and off all other dettys . PASTON,I,477.150.4663

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_150:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Neuerthelesse , I assayed hym iff he wolde , iff nede hadde ben , gyvyn
me a xij monyth lenger respyght , whyche he grauntyd to do .
PASTON,I,477.150.4664

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_150:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
But in conclusyon I can nott entrete hym but +tat he woll have the
vttremest off hys bargayn , and thys xx li. payeable at Candelmesse and
Esterne . PASTON,I,477.150.4665

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_150:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
I kan entrete hym noon other wyse as yit ; wherfore I thynke iff I had
passyd my daye it had ben harde to have trustyd to hys cortesye , jn so
moche I fynde hym also ryght loose in the tonge . PASTON,I,477.150.4666

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_150:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
For Bekham , he spekyth no-thyng comfortably ther-in ;
PASTON,I,477.150.4667

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_150:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
what he wyll doo can I nott seye . PASTON,I,477.150.4668

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_150:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Item , as for Castre , it nedyth nott to spore nore prykke me to doo
owghte ther-in . PASTON,I,477.150.4669

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_150:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
I doo +tat I can wyth goode wyll , PASTON,I,477.150.4670

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_150:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and somwhat I hope to doo hastely +ter-in +tat shall doo goode .
PASTON,I,477.150.4671

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_150:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Item , as for the bokes +tat weere Syre James , God haue hys sowle ,
whyche it lykethe yow +tat I shall have them , I beseche yow +tat I
maye have them hyddre by the next massenger ; PASTON,I,477.150.4672

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_150:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and iff I be goon , yit that they be delyueryd to myn ostesse at +te
George at Powlys Wharff , whyche wolle kepe them saffe , and +tat it
lyke yow to wryght to me whatt my peyne ore payment shall be for them .
PASTON,I,477.150.4673

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_150:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Item , it lyked yow to weet off myn heelle . PASTON,I,477.150.4674

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_150:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
I thanke God nowe +tat I am nott greetly syke nere soore but in myn
heele , wherin alle men know nott whatt peyne I feele .
PASTON,I,477.150.4675

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_150:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And wher ye advysed me to hast me owt off thys towne , I wolde full
fayne be hense . PASTON,I,477.150.4676

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_150:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
I spende dayly more than I sholde doo iff I were hense ,
PASTON,I,477.150.4677

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_150:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and I am nott well porveyed . PASTON,I,477.150.4678

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_150:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Item , blessyd be Good my grauntdam is amendyd by suche tyme as myn
oncle W. come hyddre , PASTON,I,478.150.4679

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:32

{ED:288._TO_JOHN_PASTON_III_1474,_11_DECEMBER}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:32
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:30
LETTER:PASTON_151:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
<font> To John Paston , esquiere . </font> PASTON,I,480.151.4686

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:32
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:30
LETTER:PASTON_151:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Brother , I recomaunde me to yow , letyng yow weete +tat I have , lyke
as I promysed yowe , I have doon my devoyre to knowe my Lady Walgraues
stomake , whyche , as God helpe me and to be pleyn to yowe , I fynde in
hyre no mater nere cawse +tat I myght take comfort off .
PASTON,I,480.151.4687

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:32
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:30
LETTER:PASTON_151:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Sche wyll in no wyse receyve nere kepe yowre rynge wyth hyre ,
PASTON,I,480.151.4688

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:32
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:30
LETTER:PASTON_151:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and yit I tolde hyre +tat she scholde not be any-thynge bownde therby
but +tat I knew by yowre herte off olde +tat I wyst weell ye wolde be
glad to forbere the levest thyng +tat ye had in the world whyche myght
be dayly in here presence +tat sholde cawse hyre onys on a daye to
remembre yow ; PASTON,I,480.151.4689

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:32
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:30
LETTER:PASTON_151:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
but itt wolde not be . PASTON,I,480.151.4690

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:32
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:30
LETTER:PASTON_151:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
She wolde nott therby , as she seyde , putte yow nere kepe yow in any
comffort ther-by , PASTON,I,480.151.4691

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:32
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:30
LETTER:PASTON_151:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and more-ovyre she preyed me +tat I sholde neuer take labore moore
heere-in PASTON,I,480.151.4692

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:32
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:30
LETTER:PASTON_151:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
fore she wolde holde hyre to suche answere as she hadd gevyn yow
to-foore ; wherwyth she thowght bothe ye and I wolde have holde vs
contente had nott been the wordys off hyre suster Geneffyeff .
PASTON,I,480.151.4693

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:32
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:30
LETTER:PASTON_151:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
When I vndrestoode all thys , and that ouer nyght she bad hyre +tat
weent bytwyen hyre and me byd me brynge wyth me hyre muskeball whyche ,
&c. , than I aftre all thys axid iff she weere dyspleasyd wyth me for
it , PASTON,I,480.151.4694

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:32
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:30
LETTER:PASTON_151:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and she seyde naye . PASTON,I,480.151.4695

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:30
LETTER:PASTON_151:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Than I tolde hyre that I had nott sent it yowe fore synne off my sowle
, PASTON,I,480.151.4696

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:32
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:30
LETTER:PASTON_151:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and so I tolde hyre all how I had wretyn to yow why that I wold nott
sende it yow by-cawse I wyst weell ye sholde have slepyd the werse .
PASTON,I,480.151.4697

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:32
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:30
LETTER:PASTON_151:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
But nowe I tolde hyre , as God helpe me , +tat I wolde sende it yow ,
and gyffe yow myn advyse nott to hope ouyre moche on hyre whyche is
ovyre harde an hertyd-7 lady for a yonge man to tryst on-to , whyche I
thowght +tat for all my wordys ye cowde nott nere wolde nott do fore
all myn advyce . PASTON,I,480.151.4698

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:32
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:30
LETTER:PASTON_151:M4:1474:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Yitt ageynwardys , she is nott dyspleasyd nor forbad me nott but that
ye sholde have the kepyng off hyre mvskball . Wherffor do ye wyth itt
as ye lyke . PASTON,I,480.151.4699

onhappy muskeball also . PASTON,I,480.151.4701

all haste howe +tat Lynsted hathe doon wyth Towneshend and also att
Snaylwell ; wherffor in hast sende worde to me or to myn ostesse at +te
George . PASTON,I,481.151.4713

{ED:291._TO_MARGARET_PASTON_1475,_22_FEBRUARY}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:33
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_152:M4:1475:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To Mestresse Margret Paston at Norwyche be thys delyueryd .
</font> PASTON,I,484.152.4719

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:33
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_152:M4:1475:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Please it yow to weete +tat I receyuyd a letter from yow wretyn +te
Saterdaye next byffore Candelmesse , for answere wheroff lyke it yow to
weete +tat , as for the bokys +tat weer Syr James , God haue hys sowle
, I thynke best that they be styll wyth yow tyll +tat I speke wyth yow
my-selff . PASTON,I,484.152.4720

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:33
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_152:M4:1475:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
My mynde is now nott most vppon bokys . PASTON,I,484.152.4721

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:33
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_152:M4:1475:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Item , as for xx li. +tat ye sey +tat yowre plate lythe fore , it is so
+tat I fownde my oncle William no sewerte` therffore .
PASTON,I,484.152.4722

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:33
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_152:M4:1475:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
As Playtere and my brother John bothe cowde enfforme yowe , it was
neuer desyryd off me , nere the tolde me nott +tat any suche pledge
laye for it , but +tat ye hadd dyschargyd me off xx li. and chevysshyd
it , and +tat ye sholde repaye it in hast ; wherin I woll do as ye woll
, and as it pleasyth yow to sende me wetyng . PASTON,I,484.152.4723

<P_I,485>

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:33

off yowe , whyche ye sholde haue receyuyd ageyn off my londys in Flegge
; PASTON,I,485.152.4724

Neuer the lesse my wyll is that ye sholde have yowre holl xx li. ageyn
and nott lose j d. ; wherffor iff it be soo +tat ye be mysse seruyd
there , I beseche yowe off pacyence tyll the begynnyng off the next
yeere , PASTON,I,485.152.4726

for as God helpe me I wolde be sory +tat ye lost moore for me .
PASTON,I,485.152.4728

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:33
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_152:M4:1475:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
I have pytte yow to cost , charge , and losse j-nowge ,
PASTON,I,485.152.4729

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:33
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_152:M4:1475:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
God thanke yowe off it , thoughe ye lose no more ; wherffor jff Sporle
woode sprynge any syluer ore golde it is my wyll +tat fyrst off alle ye
be yowre owne payere off all +tat is be-hynde , and next thatt to paye
myn oncle William vij=xx= vj li. xiij s. iiij d. , and besyd that xvj
li. lost vppon the chevysshaunce offe iiij=xx= li. ;
PASTON,I,485.152.4730

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:33
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_152:M4:1475:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and so I owe viij=xx= ij li. xiij s. iiij d. Wherfor I beseche yow to
make hast in repayment heroff as fast as it woll growe , as my trost is
in yowe . PASTON,I,485.152.4731

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:33
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_152:M4:1475:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Item , wher it pleasyd yow to weete off myn heele and a-mendyng , I
thanke Godde I ame in goode case , and as goode $as full hooll bothe
off the fevre agwe , off myn je , myn legge , and myn heele , saff +tat
I ame tendre off all theese and , were nott goode rewle , full like to
feell off iche off them ryght soone . PASTON,I,485.152.4732

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:33
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_152:M4:1475:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Neuerthelesse God thanke yow off yowre large profre , wheroff I wolde
be ryght gladde iff I myght , fore trobles and other labore that I have
takyn on me nowe in-to Fraunce warde . PASTON,I,485.152.4733

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:33
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_152:M4:1475:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
For the goode spede off me and +tat jorneye I beseche yow off yowre
preyerys and remembrance ; PASTON,I,485.152.4734

RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_

and thatt jorney wyth Goddys grace onys doon , I purpose verrely wyth
Goddys grace therafftre to daunce atendaunce most abowt yowre plesure
and ease . PASTON,I,485.152.4735

RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_

And wyth Goddys grace soone vppon Esterne , ere euyre I goo forthe , I
hope to se yow and fecche yowre blessyng . PASTON,I,485.152.4736

{ED:292._TO_EDMOND_PASTON_II_1475,_13_JUNE}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:33
RECIPIENT:EDMOND_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_153:M4:1475:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To John Paston ore to hys brother Edmond Paston at +te George at
Powles Wharff . </font> PASTON,I,485.153.4740

<P_I,486>

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:33
RECIPIENT:EDMOND_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_153:M4:1475:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Brother Edmonde , it is soo +tat I heer telle +tat ye be in hope to
come hyddre and to be in suche wagys as {in}_P ye schall can lyve lyke
a jentylman , wheroff I wolde be gladde . Wherffor for yowre better
speede I lete yow weete +tat Heugh Beamond is deed , wherffor I wolde
ye had hys roome , nowe ore neuer iff ye can brynge it a-bowt .
PASTON,I,486.153.4741

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:33
RECIPIENT:EDMOND_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_153:M4:1475:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Ellys , iff ye dyspose yowe to abyde in Inglonde , syns it is so +tat
the Bysshop of Lynkolne is chauncelere , hys seruyse is the meter for
yow - PASTON,I,486.153.4742

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:33
RECIPIENT:EDMOND_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_153:M4:1475:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
he is next neyghbore to Norffolk off any astate . PASTON,I,486.153.4743

LETTER:PASTON_153:M4:1475:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
God sende yow som good warde off hys . PASTON,I,486.153.4744

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:33
RECIPIENT:EDMOND_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_153:M4:1475:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
I praye yow iff yowre leyser be ther-afftre to remembre Towneshende
+tat he wyth the advyse and assystence off my Master off +te Rollys
have on daye off Marche wyth +te slawe Bysshope off Wynchester , +tat
he maye kepe me hys promyse ; +tat is to seye to entrete +te Duke and
Duchesse off Norffolk for Caster . PASTON,I,486.153.4745

Notwytstondyng , iff I may do yow servyce or ease , as ye and I have
comonyd heere-to-foore , afftre as I heere from yow , as God helpe me ,
I purpose to leeffe alle heere and come home to yow and be yowre
hosbonde and balyff ; wher-in I spake to my brothere John to telle yow
myn advyce . PASTON,I,487.154.4761

<P_I,490>

{ED:296._TO_JOHN_PASTON_III_1476,_27_JANUARY}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
LETTER:PASTON_155:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To John Paston , esquiere , at Norwyche be thys delyueryd .
</font> PASTON,I,490.155.4771

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
LETTER:PASTON_155:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
I recomaunde me to yow , letyng yow weete +tat I was jnfformyd by
Richard Radle` +tat on Scarlett , +tat was vndrescheryff to Hastyngys ,
wolde sywe to me on yowre behalff fore thatt ye weere dyspleasyd wyth a
returne off Nichyll vppon yow in +te seyde Hastyngys tyme ; wherffor
Richard Radle` thoghte +tat the seyde Scarlett wolde be gladde to gyff
yow a noble or a riall for a sadell to amendys , so +tat ye wolde sease
and stoppe the bylle whyche ye entende to putt in to +te corte ageyn
hys master Hastyngys . Wherffor the seyde Scarlett com to me and prayed
me to helpe in the same , PASTON,I,490.155.4772

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
LETTER:PASTON_155:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and so I have don my devoyre to feele off hym the most +tat he can
fynde in hys stomake to departe wyth to please yow ;
PASTON,I,490.155.4773

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
LETTER:PASTON_155:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and in conclusyon I trowe he shall gyff yow a doblett clothe off sylke
, price xx s. ore +ter-abowte , whyche vppon suche answeere as I heer
from yowe I deme +tat Bysshop the atornye shall , iff I conclude wyth
hym on yowre behalve , paye in mony or otherwyse to whom +tat ye woll
assyngne heere . PASTON,I,490.155.4774

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
LETTER:PASTON_155:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
I shall by the meanys off <P_I,491> Raddele` weete at whoys sywte it
was takyn owte . PASTON,I,491.155.4775

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
LETTER:PASTON_155:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
I deme it som-thynge doon by craffte by the meanys off them +tat have
entresse in yowre lond to +t'entent to noyse itt therys , or to make
yow past shame off the sellyng ther-off . PASTON,I,491.155.4776

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
LETTER:PASTON_155:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Item , I have receyvyd a letter from yowe , wretyn on Tywesdaye last .
PASTON,I,491.155.4777

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
LETTER:PASTON_155:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Item , wher +tat som towardys my lady off Norffolk noyse +tat I dyd
onkyndely to sende so hastely to Caster as I dyd , +ter is no dyscrete
person +tat so thynkyth ; PASTON,I,491.155.4778

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
LETTER:PASTON_155:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
fore iff my lorde hade ben as kynde to me as he myght have ben , and
acordyng to suche hert and seruyce as my grauntffadre , my fadre ,
yowre-selff , and I have owght and doon to my lordys off Norffolk +tat
ded ben , and yitt iff I hadde weddyd hys dowghtre , yitt most I have
doon as I dydde . PASTON,I,491.155.4779

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
LETTER:PASTON_155:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And moore-ovyre , iff I had hadde any demyng off my lordys dethe iiij
howrys ore he dyed , I most nedys , but iff I wolde be knowyn a foolle
, have entryd it the howre byffore hys dyscesse . PASTON,I,491.155.4780

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
LETTER:PASTON_155:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
But in effecte theygh that in +tat matere have alweye ment onkyndely to
me , they feyne +tat rumore ageyn me ; PASTON,I,491.155.4781

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
LETTER:PASTON_155:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
but there is noon thatt ment truly to hym +tat dede is +tat wolde be
sory +tat I hadde itt , and in especiall suche as love hys sowle .
PASTON,I,491.155.4782

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
LETTER:PASTON_155:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Item , wher it is demyd +tat my lady wolde herafftre be the rather myn
hevy lady for +tat delyng , I thynke +tat she is to resonable so to be
, PASTON,I,491.155.4783

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
LETTER:PASTON_155:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
fore I dyd it nott onwyst to hyre cowncell . PASTON,I,491.155.4784

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
LETTER:PASTON_155:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
+Ter was no man thoght +tat I sholde doo otherwysse ,
PASTON,I,491.155.4785

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
LETTER:PASTON_155:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
an as to seye +tat I myght have hadde my ladyes advyce ore lyve , I
myght have teryed yitt or I cowde have speken wyth hyre , ore yitt have
hadde any body to have mevyd hyre on my be-halve .
PASTON,I,491.155.4786

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
LETTER:PASTON_155:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
As ye wote , I dydde what I cowde . PASTON,I,491.155.4787

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34

Moreouyre I taried by the advyce off Syr Robert Wyngffelde iij dayes
+ter for +tat he putte me in comffort +tat +te Lorde Howard and hys
brother Syr John sholde have comyn to Norwyche , att whoys comyng he
dowtyd nott but +tat I sholde have a goode dyreccion takyn for me in
thatt mater . PASTON,I,491.155.4788

onkyndly ore onsyttyngly , but +tat I was moore onresonably dalte wyth
. Wherffor , late men deme whatt they wylle , PASTON,I,491.155.4791

{ED:300._TO_JOHN_PASTON_III_1476,_30_JUNE}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
LETTER:PASTON_156:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To John Paston , esquiere , beyng at the syngne off the George
at Powles Wharf . </font> PASTON,I,496.156.4816

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
LETTER:PASTON_156:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
I recomaunde me to yow , letyng yow weete +tat I hav receyvyd yowre
letter wretyn the next daye aftre Mydsomer ; for answer wheroff I
thynke +tat to be bownde in v=c= $marke {TEXT:mrke} I thynke it is to
moche , where-as I felt by yow ye sholde have wyth +te gentylwoman but
iiij=c= . PASTON,I,496.156.4817

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
LETTER:PASTON_156:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Neuer the lesse I agree . PASTON,I,496.156.4818

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
LETTER:PASTON_156:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
But ye shall vndrestande +tat I wyll not be bownde for yow +tat ye
shall make hyre joyntoure past xx li. by yere wyth-in a sertayne daye
lymyted , be it j yere ore ij ; PASTON,I,496.156.4819

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
LETTER:PASTON_156:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
+tat is +te largest +tat ye maye performe . PASTON,I,496.156.4820

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
LETTER:PASTON_156:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
For as fore the maner off Sparham , my moodre and ye acorde nott in
yowre sayngys . PASTON,I,496.156.4821

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
LETTER:PASTON_156:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
She wyll nowght graunte yow ther-in whylse she levyth , saff , as she
seythe to me , she hathe grauntyd yow x $marke {TEXT:mrke} by yeere
tyll xl li. be payed , +tat is but vj yeere . PASTON,I,496.156.4822

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
LETTER:PASTON_156:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And afftre hyre dyscease she woll agree wyth goode will , so +tat it
maye be yowre proferment +tat ye sholde have +tat maner in joyntur wyth
yowre wyffe to +te lenger lyvere off yow bothe , payng x $marke
{TEXT:mrke} by yeere , soo ore there as she wyll +tat it shall be .
PASTON,I,496.156.4823

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
LETTER:PASTON_156:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Therfore as for 1 $marke {TEXT:mrke} joyntur , I pray yow bynde me in
no suche clawse butt iff it be for xx li. by a resonable daye , and xx
$marke {TEXT:mrke} afftre the dyssease off my moodre .
PASTON,I,496.156.4824

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
LETTER:PASTON_156:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA

ye shall fynde par case so slakke payerys +tat ye myght be deseyvyd
ther-by . PASTON,I,496.156.4829

<P_I,497>

{ED:301._TO_MARGARET_PASTON_PROBABLY_1476,_30_AUGUST}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:34?
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_?
LETTER:PASTON_157:M4:1476?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To Mestresse Margret Paston . </font> PASTON,I,497.157.4842

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:34?
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_?
LETTER:PASTON_157:M4:1476?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Please it yow to wete +tat I was vppon Tywesdaye , the daye +tat I
departyd froo yowe , wyth my brothere John at Atelborow by viij off the
clokke at euyn , and founde hym in suche case as iff ye had seyn hym
than ye wolde nowe be as gladde of hym osse off a nywe sone .
PASTON,I,497.157.4843

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:34?
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_?
LETTER:PASTON_157:M4:1476?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
I wenyd nott +tat he scholde not have levyd tyll +te mornyng , in so
moche +tat by my trowthe I dare seye +tat iff it had nott fortunyd vs
to have comyn to hym , he had $not been on lyve on Wednysdaye ;
PASTON,I,497.157.4844

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:34?

{ED:302._TO_JOHN_PASTON_III_1477,_14_FEBRUARY}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:35
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:33
LETTER:PASTON_158:M4:1477:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To John Paston , esquyer , at Norwyche in hast . </font>
PASTON,I,498.158.4870

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:35
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:33
LETTER:PASTON_158:M4:1477:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
I recomaunde me to yow , letyng yow weete +tat yisterdaye beganne the
grete cowncell to whyche all the astatys off +te londe shall com to ,
butt iff it be for gret and resonable excusis . PASTON,I,498.158.4871

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:35
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:33
LETTER:PASTON_158:M4:1477:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And I suppose +te cheffe cawse of thys assemble` is to comon what is
best to doo $now vppon +te greet change by the dethe off +te Duke of
Burgoyne , and for +te kepyng off Caleys and the Marchys , and for the
preseruacion off +te amyte`ys taken late as weell wyth Fraunce as now
wyth the membrys off Flaundrys ; wher-to I dowt nott +ter shall be jn
all hast bothe +te Dukys off Clarance and Glowcestre , wheroff I wolde
+tat my brother E. wyst . PASTON,I,498.158.4872

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:33

<P_I,500>

{ED:304._TO_MARGARET_PASTON_1477,_28_MARCH}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:35
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_160:M4:1477:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
<font> To my ryght worshypfull moodre Margret Paston . </font>
PASTON,I,500.160.4915

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:35
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_160:M4:1477:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Please it yow to weete +tat I have receyvyd yowre letter wherin is
remembryd the gret hurte +tat by liklihod myght falle to my brother
John iff so be +tat thys mater betwyn hym and Syr Thomas Brewses
doghtre take nott effecte , wheroff I wolde be as sory as hym-selffe
reasonably ; and also +te welthy and convenyent mariage +tat scholde be
iff it take effecte , wheroff I wolde be as gladde as any man , and ame
better content nowe +tat he sholde have hyre than any other +tat euyre
he was hertoffoore abowte to have hadde - concyderyd hyre persone ,
hyre yowthe , and the stok +tat she is comyn offe , +te love on bothe
sydes , +te tendre fauore +tat she is in wyth hyre fadre and moodre ,
the kyndenesse off hyre fadre and moodre to hyre in departyng wyth hyre
, the favore also and goode conceyte +tat they have in my brothere ,
the worshypfull and vertuous dysposicion off hire fadre and moodre ,
whyche prenostikyth +tat of lyklihod the mayde sholde be vertuous and
goode . All whyche concyderyd , and the necessary relyffe +tat my
brother most have , I mervayle the lesse +tat ye have departyd and
geuyn hym the maner of Sperham in suche forme as I haue knowleche off
by W. Gornay , Lomnore , and Skypwyth ; PASTON,I,500.160.4916

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:35
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_160:M4:1477:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and I ame ryght gladde to se in yow suche kyndenesse on-to my brother
as ye have doon to hym , PASTON,I,500.160.4917

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:35
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_160:M4:1477:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and wolde by my trowthe levere than c li. +tat it weere fee symple
londe , as it is entaylyd , whyche by liklyhood scholde prospere wyth
hym and hyis blode the better in tyme to come and sholde also neuer
cavse debate in owre bloode in tyme to come , whyche Godde dyffende
PASTON,I,500.160.4918

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:35
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_160:M4:1477:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
for that weere onnaturell . PASTON,I,500.160.4919

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:35
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_160:M4:1477:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Item , an other jnconvenyence is , wher as I vndrestande +tat the maner
is gevyn to my brother and to hys wyff and to +te issywe bytwen them
bygoten , iff the case weer soo +tat he and she hadde yssywe togedre a
dowtre ore moo , and hys wyffe dyed and he maried afftre an othere and
hadde issywe a sone , +tat sone sholde have noon londe , and he beyng
hys fadris heyre . PASTON,I,500.160.4920

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:35
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_160:M4:1477:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And for th'enconvenyence +tat I have knowe late in vre in case lyke ,
and yit enduryth , in Kente by-twyen a jentylman and his sustre , I
wolde ye toke the advyce off yowre concell in thys poynt .
PASTON,I,500.160.4921

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:35
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_160:M4:1477:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And that +tat is past yow by wryghtyng ore by promyse I deme verrely in
yow +tat ye dyd it off kyndenesse and in eschywyng off a moore yll +tat
myght befall . PASTON,I,500.160.4922

meene to putte them in sywerte` +ter-off but iff it weere to be bownde
in an obligacion , wyth a condicion +tat I shalle nott trowble ner

{ED:305._TO_JOHN_PASTON_III_1477,_14_APRIL}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:35

LETTER:PASTON_161:M4:1477:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To John Paston , esquyere . </font> PASTON,I,501.161.4934

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:35
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:33
LETTER:PASTON_161:M4:1477:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Ryght worshypfull and hertely belovyd brother , I recomaunde me to yow
, letyng yow weete +tat as by Pyrse Moody when he was heer I hadde no
leysere to sende answere in wryghtyng to yow and to my cosyne Gurnaye
off yowre letteris ; PASTON,I,501.161.4935

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:35
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:33
LETTER:PASTON_161:M4:1477:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
butt for a conclusion , ye shalle fynde me to yowe as kynde as I maye
be , my conciense and worshyp savyd , whyche when I speke wyth yowe and
them ye bothe shall weell vndrestande . PASTON,I,501.161.4936

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:35
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:33
LETTER:PASTON_161:M4:1477:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And I praye God sende yow as goode speede in +tat mater as I wolde ye
hadde , and as I hope ye shall have er thys letter come to yow ;
PASTON,I,501.161.4937

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:35
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:33
LETTER:PASTON_161:M4:1477:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and I praye Gode sende yow yssywe betwyne yow +tat maye be as honorable
as euer was any off yowre ancestris and theris , wheroff I wolde be as
gladde in maner as off myn owne . Wherffor I praye yow sende me worde
how ye doo , PASTON,I,501.161.4938

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:35
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:33
LETTER:PASTON_161:M4:1477:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and iff Godde fortune me to doo weell , and be off any powere , I woll
be to Syr Thomas Brewse and my lady hys wyffe a verry sone in lawe for
yowre sake , and take <P_I,502> them as ye doo , and doo for them as
iff I weere in case lyke wyth them as {in}_P ye bee .
PASTON,I,502.161.4939

I recomand me to yow , letyng yow weete +tat I have spoken wyth Herry
Colett and entretyd hym in my best wyse for yow , soo +tat at +te last
he is agreyd to a resonable respyght for +te xv li. +tat ye sholde have
payd hym at Mydsomer , as he seyth , and is gladde to do yow ease or
plesyre in all +tat he maye . PASTON,I,504.162.4952

Tywesdaye nexte afftre Seynt James Daye , wherin ye desyre me to
remembre Kokett , and also to be helpyng to my brother Johnys mariage .
PASTON,I,504.163.4967

+tat I myght <P_I,505> paye hym by thatt daye ; PASTON,I,505.163.4968

for thoos materis +tat be off grettest wyght and charge and +tat stonde
nerrest my weell , +tat is to seye the sywerte` off +te maner off
Castre , and the mater bytwen Anne Hault and me , shall wyth Goddys
grace thys terme be at a perffyght ende , whyche will charge me
ferthere than I have mony as yitt , ore lyke to have byffore that tyme
off myn owne , PASTON,I,505.163.4969

Neuerthelesse I suppose +tat ye be nott so weell purveyd ; wherffore ,
iff it please yow at yowre ease here-afftre to performe yowre seyde
gyffte and promysse , so +tat I maye have it wyth-in a yere ore ij ,
ore yitt iij , I sholde par case gete yowre obligacion to yow ageyn
from Kokett , and he pleasyd . Wherffor I beseche yow +tat I maye have
an assyngnement off suche dettys as been owyng yow , payeable at
leysere off suche mony as is owyng for the woode at Basyngham ore
ellys-wher , PASTON,I,505.163.4979

<font> To my ryght worshypfull moodre Margrete Paston be thys delyueryd
. </font> PASTON,I,510.164.4991

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:36
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_164:M4:1478:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Please it yow to weete +tat , where as I entendyd to have ben at home
thys Mydsomer , and purposyd wyth yowre goode helpe to have bygonne
vppon my fadrys tombe so +tat it myght have ben endyd thys somyre , it
is soo +tat fore suche cawsys as are nowe bygynne by-twyen my lorde off
Suffolk and me for the manerys off Heylesdon , Drayton , &c. , for
whyche materis I most nedys be heere thys nexte terme , therffor I deme
jt wolle be afftre Mydsomer ere than I can see yowe .
PASTON,I,510.164.4992

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:36

Please it yow also to weete +tat I comonyd wyth Master Pykenham to
weete iffe he wolde bye the clothe off golde fore soo moche as he
desyryd onys {for}_P to have bowte it , PASTON,I,510.164.4993

Butt it is soo +tat the Kynge dothe make sertayne copys and vestymentys
off like clothe whyche he entendyth to gyve to the coledge at
Foodryngeye wher my lorde hys fadre is nowe buryed , and he byethe at a
grete pryce . PASTON,I,510.164.4998

RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_164:M4:1478:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and he hathe grauntyd me to doo , as Whetleye can telle yow ; wherffor
, iff it plese yow that it be bystowyd for to make a towmbe for my
fadre at Bromholme , iff ye lyke to sende it hyddre , iffe it be solde
I vndretake or Mychelmesse +tat ther shalle be a tombe and somwhatt
ellys ovyre my fadris grave , on whoys sowle God have mersye , +tat
ther shalle noone be lyke it in Norffolk , and as ye shalle be gladde
herafftre to see it . PASTON,I,510.164.5000

and ellys I gyve yow cawse neuyre to trust me whylle ye and I lyve .
PASTON,I,510.164.5003

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:36
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_164:M4:1478:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
When I was last wyth yow ye grauntyd +tat the seyde clothe off golde
sholde be bywaryd abowte thys werke +tat is above wretyn , whyche iff
ye wylle perfforme , I vndretake +tat ther shalle be suche a towmbe as
ye shalle be pleased wyth , thowghe it cost me xx marke off myn owne
purse besyde , iff I onys sette vppon it . PASTON,I,510.164.5004

{ED:312._TO_JOHN_PASTON_III_1478,_25_AUGUST}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:36
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:34
LETTER:PASTON_165:M4:1478:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To John Paston , esquyere , be thys lettre delyueryd , ore to my
mestresse hys wyfe at Norwych to delyuer to hym . </font>
PASTON,I,511.165.5009

Brother John , I recomaund me to yow , PASTON,I,511.165.5010

and I thanke God , my sustre yowre wyffe , and yow off my fayre nevywe
Crystofre whyche I vndrestande ye have , where-off I ame ryght gladde
PASTON,I,511.165.5011

And he tellyth me +tat ther is like to be troble in the maner off
Oxenhed , wherffore I praye yow take hede lesse +tat the Duke off
Suffolk councell pley therwyth now at the vacacion off the beneffyse as
they ded wyth the beneffice off Drayton , whyche by the helpe off
Master John Salett and Donne hys man ther was a qweste made by the
seyde Donne +tat fownde +tat the Duke off Suffolk was verrye patrone ,
whyche was false PASTON,I,511.165.5018

Item , yonge William Brandon is in warde and arestyd fore thatt he
scholde have by force ravysshyd and swyvyd an olde jentylwoman , and
yitt was nott therwyth easyd but swyvyd hyr oldest dowtre and than
wolde have swyvyd the othere sustre bothe , wher-fore men sey fowle off
hym , that he wolde ete the henne and alle her chekynnys ;

<P_I,512>

{ED:313._TO_MARGARET_PASTON_1479,_ABOUT_MAY_-_JUNE}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:37
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_166:M4:1479:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To Mestresse Margrete Paston be thys delyueryd . </font>
PASTON,I,512.166.5044

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:37
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_166:M4:1479:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Please it yow to weete +tat I sende yow by Barkere , the berere heroff
, iij triacle pottes off Geane , as my potecarie swerytht on-to me ,
and mooreouyre that they weer neuer ondoo syns +tat they come from
Geane ; wheroff ye shalle take as many as pleasyth yow .
PASTON,I,512.166.5045

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:37
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_166:M4:1479:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Neuerthe lesse my brother John sente to me for ij ;
PASTON,I,512.166.5046

+terfore I most beseche yowe +tat he maye have at +te leste on .
PASTON,I,512.166.5047

There is on potte +tat is morkyn ondre +te bottome ij tymes wyth thyes
letteris , ' M. P. ' , whyche potte I have best truste on-too , and
nexte hym to +te wryghe potte ; PASTON,I,512.166.5048

the toppe , lesse +tat he hathe ben ondoone . PASTON,I,513.166.5049

Item , it was soo +tat I was yisterdaye wyth myn oncle Mautebyes wyffe
, and delyueryd yowre letter , and lete her wete also +tat ye had
wretyn to me to speke wyth hyre and to have delyuere` off suche
euydencys as she hathe . PASTON,I,513.166.5053

And in effecte she is nott dysposyd to delyuer them on-to +te tyme +tat
she be in sywerte` off her mony off the arreragys on-to myn oncle here
husbonde , whyche she seythe is abowte +te somme off xx li. ;
PASTON,I,513.166.5054

{ED:315._TO_MARGARET_PASTON_1479,_29_OCTOBER}

<font> To +te ryght worshypfull Mestresse Margret Paston be thys
delyueryd . </font> PASTON,I,515.167.5091

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:37
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_167:M4:1479:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Please it yow to weete +tat I have ben heer at London a xiiij nyght ,
wher {ED:o} ff the first iiij dayes I was in suche feere off the
syknesse , and also fownde my chambre and stuffe nott so clene as I
demyd , whyche troblyd me soore ; PASTON,I,515.167.5092

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:37
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_167:M4:1479:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and as I tolde yow at my departyng I was nott weell monyed ,

for I hadde nott paste x $marke {TEXT:mrke} , wheroff I departyd xl s.
to be delyueryd off my olde bedfelawe , PASTON,I,515.167.5094

me and +te Duke off Suffolk , PASTON,I,515.167.5096

and in effecte I cowde have at +te most and at +te soneste yisterdaye
xx s. ; wherffor I beseche yow to purveye me c s. , and also to wryght
to Pekok +tat he purveye me as moche , c s. , whyche I suppose +tat he
hathe gaderyd at Paston and other placys by thys tyme .
PASTON,I,515.167.5101

extremum and also a supercedeas . PASTON,I,515.167.5105

PASTON,I,515.167.5106

<P_I,516>

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:37
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_167:M4:1479:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Iff myn oncle hadde hys will in that , yitt sholde he be neuer the
nerre the londe , PASTON,I,516.167.5107

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:37
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_167:M4:1479:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
butt in effecte he shold have thys avauntage whyche is behovefull for a
weyke matere , to have a coloure ore a clooke ore a botrase .
PASTON,I,516.167.5108

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:37
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_167:M4:1479:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
But on Tywesdaye I was wyth +te Bysshop off Hely , whyche shewyth
hym-selffe goode and worshypfull , PASTON,I,516.167.5109

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:37
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_167:M4:1479:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and he seyde +tat he sholde sende to myn oncle William +tat he sholde
nott procede in no suche mater till +tat he speke wyth hym ; and
moore-ouyre +tat he scholde cawse hym to be heer hastelye . In whyche
mater is no remedy as nowe , butt iff it were soo +tat +te exchetor ,
iff he be entretyd to sytte by myn oncle William , whyche par case he
shall nott , +tat iff my brother John and Lomnore have knowleche off
the daye , and they myght be there , Lomnore can geve euydence j-now in
that mater wyth-owte +te boke . And more-ouyre +tat they see bothe the
letter and the other noote +tat I sente to +te exchetor , and wyth
helpe off th'exchetor all myght be as beste is . PASTON,I,516.167.5110

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:1442:37
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_167:M4:1479:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And iff my brother and Lomnor take labor her-in , I shall recompence
ther costys . PASTON,I,516.167.5111

<P_I,521>

{ED:318._TO_JOHN_PASTON_I_PROBABLY_1461,_10_NOVEMBER}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:17?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:FATHER:1421:40?
LETTER:PASTON_168:M4:1461?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
<font> To my most reuerent and worchepfull fadyr John Paston be thys
delyueryd in hast . </font> PASTON,I,521.168.5116

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:17?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:FATHER:1421:40?
LETTER:PASTON_168:M4:1461?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Most reuerent and worchepfull fadyr , I recomande me to yow lowly ,
preying yow of yowyr blyssyng and hertly desyiryng to her of yowyr
welfare and prosperyte` , the whyche I prey God preserue and kepe to
hys plesans and to yowyr hertys desyir . PASTON,I,521.168.5117

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:17?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:FATHER:1421:40?
LETTER:PASTON_168:M4:1461?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Plesyt yow to haue knowlage +tat I haue spoke wyth Warwyk and Stwkle`
fore the plase and +te londys in Arleham , PASTON,I,521.168.5118

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:17?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:FATHER:1421:40?
LETTER:PASTON_168:M4:1461?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and they wyle not geue but vj d. for an acre , and they to kepe the
reparacion of the plase ; PASTON,I,521.168.5119

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:17?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:FATHER:1421:40?
LETTER:PASTON_168:M4:1461?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
but so I wold not lete heme haue it . PASTON,I,521.168.5120

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:17?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:FATHER:1421:40?
LETTER:PASTON_168:M4:1461?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
But Stwkle` hathe promysyd me +tat all the londys schalle be purveyd
for as for thys yer . PASTON,I,521.168.5121

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:17?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:FATHER:1421:40?
LETTER:PASTON_168:M4:1461?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Warwyk was wyth my modyr as thys day , PASTON,I,521.168.5122

and he desyiryth to haue the londys in Arleham for vij d. an acre as
for thys yer . PASTON,I,521.168.5123

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:FATHER:1421:40?

And in as myche as Stwkle` had promysyd me to purvey for the londys for
thys yer , I cownselyd my modyr +tat he schuld not haue heme wyth-owt
he wold tak hem for a longer terme . PASTON,I,521.168.5124

nowthyr for vij nor viij d. an acr and to kepe the reparacion of the
plase . PASTON,I,521.168.5125

lady , and is lyke to kepe hys Crystmas her in Walys ,
PASTON,I,522.169.5137

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:18

LETTER:PASTON_169:M4:1462:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
for +te Kyng hathe desyiryd hym to do +te same . Wherfor I beseche yow
+tat {ED:ye} wole wychesaue to send me some mony by the berer herof ,
for in good feythe , as it is not onknowyng to yow , +tat I had but ij
noblys in my purse whyche +tat Rychard Call took me by yowyr
comandement when I departyd frome yow owt of Norwyche .
PASTON,I,522.169.5138

plese yow to delyuer hym as myche mony as he may bye it wyth ;
PASTON,I,522.169.5139

PASTON,I,523.170.5150

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:20
LETTER:PASTON_170:M4:1462:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Plesyt yow to wet +tat as thys day we had tydyngys her that the Scottys
wyll come in-to Inglond wyth-in vij days aftyr the wryttyng of thys
lettyr for to rescue these iij castellys , Alnewyk , Donsamborowe , and
Bameborowe , whyche castellys wer besegyd as on yesterdaye .
PASTON,I,523.170.5152

desyiryd yow to let hem haue knowlage of the tydyngys in thys letyr ,
PASTON,I,524.170.5183

{ED:321._TO_JOHN_PASTON_I_1464,_1_MARCH}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:20
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:FATHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_171:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
<font> To my ry+gte reuerent and worchepfull fadyr John Paston ,
dwellyng in Castyr , be thys delyueryd . </font> PASTON,I,525.171.5197

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:20
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:FATHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_171:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Ryth reuerent and worchepfull fadyr , I recomand me on-to yow ,
besechyng yow lowly of youyr blyssyng , desyiryng to her of youyr
wellfar and prosperyte` , the whyche I pray God preserue on-to hys
plesans and to yowyr hertys desyir ; besechyng yow to haue me excusyd
+tat ye had no wrytyng fro me syth +tat I departyd frome $yow ,
PASTON,I,525.171.5198

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:20
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:FATHER:1421:43
LETTER:PASTON_171:M4:1464:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
for so God me helpe , I send yow a lettyr to London a-non aftyr
Kandylmas by a man $of my lordys PASTON,I,525.171.5199

I beseche yow +tat ye wole wychesaue that on of youyr men may send a
byll to myn oncyll Clement or to some othyr man , who +tat ye wole , in
youyr name , +tat they may delyuer me the mony tha {ED:t} I am be-hynd

+tat some +tat it plesyd yow to grant me by yer , PASTON,I,526.171.5220

and we may knowe of it , but if ye send vs othyr-wys word .

{ED:324._TO_JOHN_PASTON_I_1465,_3_OCTOBER}

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:FATHER:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_173:M4:1465:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To my ryth reuerend and worchepfull fadyr John Paston be thys
delyueryd . </font> PASTON,I,529.173.5274

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:21
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:FATHER:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_173:M4:1465:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA

beseche yow of youyr blyssyng . PASTON,I,529.173.5275

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:21

Plesyt yow to haue knowlege +tat , as on Sonday next be-for Myhelmas
Day , as my modyr came fro London ward sche cam homward by Cotton ;
PASTON,I,529.173.5276

for when Debnam herd sey how +tat I began to gadyr syluyr he reysyd
many men wyth-in j daye and an halfe , to +te nombyr of iij=c= men , as
I was credebly assartaynyd by a yeman of +te chambyr of my lordys that
connythe me good wyll , whech yeman , as <P_I,530> sone as he had sene
ther felauschep , rod streyth to my lord and jnformyd hym of it ;
PASTON,I,530.173.5283

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:21

and also he informyd my lord how +tat I had gadryd a-nothyr gret
felawschep , whyche felawschep he namyd more then we wer by j=c= and an
halfe and yett more . PASTON,I,530.173.5284

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:21
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:FATHER:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_173:M4:1465:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And he seyd on-to my lord and my lady and to ther consell +tat wyth-owt
that my lord took a dyreccyon in the mater that ther wer leek to be do
gret harme on bothe ouyr pertyes , wheche wer a gret dysworchep to my
lord , consederyng how +tat he takyth vs bothe for hys men and so we be
knowyn well j-now ; vpon whyche jnformacion and dysworchep to my lord
+tat tweyn of hys men schold debat so ner hym , contrary to +te Kyngys
pese , consedryd of my lord and my lady and ther cownsell , my lord
sent for me and Syr Gylberd Debnam to come to hym to Framlyngham bothe
. PASTON,I,530.173.5285

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:21

And as it fortunyd well , my modyr come to me to Cotton not half an
owyr be-for +tat the mesenger cam to me fro my lord , wheche was late
vpon Twysday last past at nyth , PASTON,I,530.173.5286

and the next day on the mornyng I rod to my lord to Framlyngham ,

And as sone as we wer come we wer sent for to come to my lord ,
PASTON,I,530.173.5289

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:21
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:FATHER:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_173:M4:1465:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and when we came to my lord he desiyryd of vs bothe +tat we schold
neythyr gadyr no felawschep , but syche men as we had gadryd +tat we
schold send hem home a-yen and +tat the coort schold be contenuyd in-to
the tyme +tat my lord , or syche as he wold asyngne , had spok bothe-4
wyth yow and Yeluerton and Jenney , and +tat on jndeferent man chosyn
by us bothe schold be assynyd to kep the plase in-to +te tyme +tat ye
and they wer spook wyth . PASTON,I,530.173.5290

and seyd how +tat at that tyme I had my mastyr wyth-in +te maner of
Cotton , whyche was my modyr , and in-to the tyme +tat I had spook wyth
hyr I cowd geue none answer ; PASTON,I,530.173.5292

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:21

and so my lord sent Rychard Fulmerston , berer her-of , to my modyr
thys day for an answer , whyche answer he schold bryng to my lord to
London , PASTON,I,530.173.5293

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:21
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:FATHER:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_173:M4:1465:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
for my lord rod to Londonward as yesterday , and +te soner be-cause he
trustyd to haue a good end of +tis mater and alle othyr be-twyx yow ,
whyche he takyth for a gret worchep to hym ward and a gret auantage
bothe and he cowd bryng +tis mater abowt ; PASTON,I,530.173.5294

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:21

LETTER:PASTON_173:M4:1465:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
for then he wold trust to haue youyr seruyse alle , whyche wer to hym
gret tresour and auantage . PASTON,I,530.173.5295

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:21
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_I:MALE:FATHER:1421:44
LETTER:PASTON_173:M4:1465:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And +tis was the answer +tat my modyr and I gaue hym , +tat at +te
instans of my lord and my ladye we wold do +tus myche as for to put +te
coort in contenuans and no more to receyue of +te profytys of +te maner
than we had , and had dystresid for , tyll in-to +te tym that sche and
I had word ayen fro my lord and yow if so wer +tat +tey wold neythyr
mak entreys nor dystreyn the tenauntys nor cepe no coort more then we
wold do ; PASTON,I,530.173.5296

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:21

and we told Rychard Fulmerston that thys my modyr and I ded at +te
jnstans and gret request of my lord because <P_I,531> my lord intendyd
pes , whyche resonably we wold not be ayenst , PASTON,I,531.173.5297

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:21

and yet we seyd we knew well +tat we schold haue no thank of yow when
ye knew of it wyth-owt it wer be-cause we ded it at my lordys jnstans .
PASTON,I,531.173.5298

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:21

But be-for thys answer we had receyvyd as myche syluyr full nye as
Rychard Calle sent vs bokys of for to gadyr yt bye ,
PASTON,I,531.173.5299

and Syr Gylberd agreyd so that Yeluerton and Jeney wold do +te same ,

{ED:326._TO_JOHN_PASTON_II_1467,_7_FEBRUARY}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:23
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:25
LETTER:PASTON_174:M4:1467:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Syr , it is so +tat thys Saterday John Rus sent me word by Robert
Botler +tat William Yeluerton hathe ben thys iij dayis in Yermothe for
to get new wytnessys vp to London , PASTON,I,533.174.5320

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:23
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:25
LETTER:PASTON_174:M4:1467:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and it is thowt by the seyd John Rus and Robert Botler ther wytnessyng
is for to proue +tat it was Syr John F. wyll +tat ther schold be
morteysyd iij=c= mark by yer to +te colage , and also +tat syche astat
as my fadyr took her at Caster at Lames next be-for +tat Syr John F.
dyid was delyueryd to my fadyr to +te intent for to $perform
{TEXT:perfom} +te seyd wyll . PASTON,I,533.174.5321

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:25
LETTER:PASTON_174:M4:1467:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Bartholomew Elys , John Appylby , and John Clerk ar the wytnessys .

and also men sey in Yermowthe +tat he is bawde be-twyx a clerk of
Yermowthe and hys owne wyfe . PASTON,I,533.174.5324

And as <P_I,534> for John Appylby , he is halff frentyk , and so take
in the towne , not wythstandyng he is an attorny , as Bartholomew Elys
is , in the baylys coort of Yermowthe . PASTON,I,534.174.5325

And as for John Clerk of Gorleston , he is owtlawyd at Syr John
Fastolfys swte , and at dyuers othyr menys , not wythstandyng he is
thorow wyth Syr T. Howys for Syr J. F. , for thys cause +tat the seyd
clerk was on of Syr T. Howys last wytnessys be-for thys .
PASTON,I,534.174.5326

{ED:327._TO_JOHN_PASTON_II_1467,_APRIL}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:23
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:25
LETTER:PASTON_175:M4:1467:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Syr , plesyth yow to weet +tat my modyr and I comonyd +tis day wyth
Freyr Mowght to vndyrstand what hys seying shall be in the coort when
he comyth vp to London , wheche is in +tis wyse . PASTON,I,534.175.5338

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:23
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:25
LETTER:PASTON_175:M4:1467:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
He seyth at syche tyme as he had shreuyn Master Brakley and howsyllyd
hym bothe , he let hym wet that he was enformyd by dyuers personys that
the seyd Master Brakley owt for to be in gret consyens for syche
thyngys as he had doone and seyd , and causyd my fadyr , whom God
asoyle , for to do and seye allso , in prouyng of Syr John Fastolfys
wyll ; to whom the seyd Mastyr Brakley answerd thus agayne :
PASTON,I,534.175.5339

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:23
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:25
LETTER:PASTON_175:M4:1467:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
' I am ryght glad that it comyth to yow in mynd for to meue me wyth
thys mater in dyschargyng of my consyens ayenst God , '
PASTON,I,534.175.5340

<P_I,535>

hys sowle shold to , that the wyll +tat my fadyr put in to the coort
was as veryly Syr John Fastolfys wyll as it was trew that he shold onys
deye . PASTON,I,535.175.5341

PASTON,I,535.175.5346

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:23
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:25
LETTER:PASTON_175:M4:1467:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
' Syr , $wher as of your owne mosyon ye meuyd me the last day to tell
yow aftyr my consyens of Syr John Fastolfys wyll lyek wyse as I knew ,
and now of myn owne mocyon and in dyschargyng of my sowle , for I know
well +tat I may not askape but +tat I must dye in hast , wherfor I
desyir yow that {ED:ye}_NP-SBJ wyll report aftyr my dethe +tat I took
it vpon my sowle at my dying +tat that wyll +tat John Paston put in to
be prouyd was Syr John Fastolfys wyll . ' PASTON,I,535.175.5347

the good syth +tat was ther , by trowththe I had leuer se yow onys in

and London . PASTON,I,535.175.5350

nowght in +tat mater , PASTON,I,535.175.5351

bot so God help me I supose +tat she wend I wold haue ben in Norwyche
for to haue sen hyr dowghtyr . PASTON,I,535.175.5358

day ; PASTON,I,535.175.5359

Ryght worchepfull modyr , I recomand me on-to yow , lowly besechyng yow
of your blyssyng . PASTON,I,536.176.5366

God , and all ouyr felawshep ; PASTON,I,536.176.5367

and as for me , I tryst to God to $se yow by Halowmes or wyth-in iiij
dayis aftyr at the ferthest , at whyche tyme I tryst to fynd +te menys
$to dyscharge yow of syche folk as ye kepe of my brodyrs .

And as for Bekham , I warant and ye wyll send the plate whyche ye and I
comond of for to helpe to paye hys dettys and for to swe forthe for hys
jwgement thys terme , it shall neythyr-2 be morgagyd nor sold . Wherfor
, modyr , I and he bothe beseche yow +tat ye wyll send hym the plate by
Jwde` , or ellys , so God help me , I wot not how he shall do ;
PASTON,I,536.176.5372

{ED:330._TO_MARGARET_PASTON_1468,_8_JULY}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:24
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_178:M4:1468:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To my ryght reuerend and worchepfull modyr Margaret Paston ,
dwellyng at Caster , be thys delyueryd in hast . </font>
PASTON,I,538.178.5414

LETTER:PASTON_178:M4:1468:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Ryth reuerend and worchepfull modyr , I recomand me on-to you as
humbylly as I can thynk , desyiryng most hertly to her of youyr welfare
and hertys ese , whyche I pray God send yow as hastyly as eny hert can
thynk . PASTON,I,538.178.5415

all ouyr felawshep wer in good helle , blyssyd be God .

To begyn , God yeld yow for my hatys . PASTON,I,543.179.5454

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:25
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:27
LETTER:PASTON_179:M4:1469:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
The Kyng hathe ben in thys contre` and worchepfully receyuyd in-to
Norwyche , PASTON,I,543.179.5455

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:25
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:27
LETTER:PASTON_179:M4:1469:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and had ryght good cher and gret gyftys in thys contre` , wherwythe he
holdyth hym so well content that he wyll hastyly be her agayn , and the
Qwen allso ; wyth whom , by my power auyse , ye shall com if so be that
the terme be do by +tat tym +tat she com in-to +tis contre` .
PASTON,I,543.179.5456

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:25
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:27
LETTER:PASTON_179:M4:1469:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And as for yowr maters her , so God help me , I haue don as myche as in
me was in laboryng of theym as well to my Lord Reuers as to my Lord
Scalys , Syr John Wydvyll , Thomas Wyngfeld , and othyr abowt the Kyng
. PASTON,I,543.179.5457

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:25
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:27
LETTER:PASTON_179:M4:1469:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And as for the Lord Reuers , he seyd to myn oncyll William , Fayirfax ,
and me that he shold meue the Kyng to spek to the two dwkys of Norffolk
and Suffolk that they shold leue of ther tytyls of syche lond as wer
Syr John Fastolffys , and if so be +tat they wold do nowt at the Kyngys
reqwest , +tat then the Kyng shold comand theym to do no wastys nor mak
non assawtys nor frayis vpon yowyr tenauntys nor plasys tyll syche tym
as the lawe hathe determynd wyth yow or ayenst yow .
PASTON,I,543.179.5458

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:25
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:27
LETTER:PASTON_179:M4:1469:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
+Tis was seyd by hym the sam day in the mornyng that he depertyd at
noon ; PASTON,I,543.179.5459

whedyr he meuyd the Kyng wyth it or nowt I can not seye .

Thomas $Wyngfeld {TEXT:Wygfeld} told me and swore on-to me that when
Brandon meuyd the Kyng and besowght hym to shew my lord fauour in hys
maters ayenst yow , that the Kyng seyd on-to hym a-yen , ' Brandon ,
thow thou can begyll the Dwk of Norffolk , and bryng hym abow {ED:t}
the thombe as thow lyst , I let the wet thow shalt not do me so ,
PASTON,I,544.179.5465

hys hold of that mater that Brandon shold repent itt euery veyn in hys
hert ; PASTON,I,544.179.5467

+tat it myght falle downe by the self as be plukyd downe ,

{ED:335._TO_JOHN_PASTON_II_1469,_5_OCTOBER}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:25
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:27
LETTER:PASTON_181:M4:1469:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To my master Syr John Paston in Flettstret . </font>
PASTON,I,547.181.5526

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:25
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:27
LETTER:PASTON_181:M4:1469:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Ryght worchepfull syr , I recomand {ED:me}_NP-OB1 on-to you , praying
yow that ye wyll in all hast send me word how +tat ye wyll +tat Syr
John Styll , John Pampyng , W. Mylsent , Nycolas Mondonet , T. Tomson
shall be rwlyd , and whedyr +tat they shall sek hem newe seruysys or
not , and Mathewe and Bedford also , PASTON,I,547.181.5527

nor for to tery wyth yow when I am ther but if ye send me some ;

thys delyueryd . </font> PASTON,I,551.182.5569

awardyd owt of yowyr lond wyche drawyth in all bettyr than v mark ,

and I am fayn to borow the mony to pay it , by +tat Lord I beleue on ,

haue receyuyd , that ye may haue a cler reknyng of all that ye owe in
thys contre` and what your tenauntys owe yow . PASTON,I,557.183.5660

{ED:346._TO_MARGARET_PASTON_1471,_30_APRIL}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:27
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_185:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Aftyr humbyll and most dew recomendacyon , jn as humbyll wyse as {in}_P
I can I beseche yow of your blyssyng , preying God to reward yow wyth
as myche plesyer and hertys ease as I haue latward causyd you to haue
trowbyll and thowght . PASTON,I,565.185.5703

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:27
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_185:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And wyth Godys grace it shall not be longe to or then my wrongys and
othyr menys shall be redressyd , PASTON,I,565.185.5704

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:27
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_185:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
for the world was neuyr so lyek to be owyrs as it is now ; werfor I
prey yow let Lomnor $not be to besy as yet . PASTON,I,565.185.5705

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:27
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_185:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Modyr , I beseche yow , and ye may spare eny money , +tat ye wyll do
your almesse on me and send me some in as hasty wyse as {in}_P is
possybyll , PASTON,I,565.185.5706

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:27
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_185:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
for by my trowthe my lechecrafte and fesyk , and rewardys to them that
haue kept me and condyt me to London , hathe cost me sythe Estern Day
more then v li . PASTON,I,565.185.5707

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:27
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_185:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And now I haue neythyr met , drink , clothys , lechecraft , nor money
but vp-on borowyng , PASTON,I,565.185.5708

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:27
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_185:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and I haue asayid my frendys so ferre that they be-gyn to fayle now in
my gretest ned that euyr I was in . PASTON,I,565.185.5709

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:27
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_185:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Also , modyr , I beseche yow , and my horse +tat was at lechecraft at
the Holt be not takyn vp for the Kyngys hawkys , that he may be had hom
and kept in your plase , and not to go owght to watyr nor no whedyr
ellys , but that the gat be shet and he to be chasyd aftyr watyr
wyth-in your plase , and that he haue as myche met as he may ete .
PASTON,I,565.185.5710

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:27
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_185:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
I haue hey j-now of myn owne , PASTON,I,565.185.5711

I wer acordyd . PASTON,I,565.185.5716

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:27
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_185:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Item , that Boton send me hyddyr the two shyrtys that wer in my casket
, and +tat he send me hydyr xl s. by the next messenger +tat comyth to
London . PASTON,I,565.185.5717

<P_I,566>

doblettys , and a jaket of plonket chamlett , and a morey bonet owt of
my cofyr - Syr Jamys hathe the key - as I sent hyr word be-for thys .

{ED:347._TO_MARGARET_PASTON_1471,_5_JULY}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:27
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_186:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Most worchepfull and my ryght specyall good modyr , as humbylly as I
can I recomand me on-to yow , besechyng yow of youyr blyssyng .
PASTON,I,566.186.5727

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:27
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_186:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Please it yow to vndyrstand that thys day I spake wyth Bacheler Water ,
whyche let me haue vndyrstandyng of your welfare , wherof I thank God
wyth all my hert . PASTON,I,566.186.5728

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:27
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_186:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Also he leet me haue knowlage that the Lord Scalys had grauntyd yow to
be my good lord , wherof I am no-thyng prowd PASTON,I,566.186.5729

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:27

LETTER:PASTON_186:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
for he may do leest wyth the gret mastyr , PASTON,I,566.186.5730

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:27
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_186:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
but he wold depert ouyr the see as hastyly as he may .
PASTON,I,566.186.5731

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:27
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_186:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And because he wenyth that I wold go wyth hym , as I had promyseyd hym
euyr and he had kept foorthe hys jornay at that tyme , thys is the
cause that he wyll be my good lord and help to get my pardon .
PASTON,I,566.186.5732

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:27
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_186:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
The Kyng is not best pleaseyd wyth hym for that he desyerthe to depert
, jn so myche that <P_I,567> the Kyng hathe seyd of hym that wen so
euyr he hathe most to do , then the Lord Scalys wyll sonest axe leue to
depert , PASTON,I,567.186.5733

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:27
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_186:M4:1471:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and weenyth that it is most be-cause of kowardyese .

As for perdon , I can non get wyth-owght I shold paye to myche money
for it , PASTON,I,567.186.5735

take hym but let hym sey , whedyr they wyll let hym haue hym or not ,
that I haue promyseyd my brodyr Edmund a bettyr hors for hym so that he
wyll not cleyme the same for hys . PASTON,I,567.186.5740

{ED:352._TO_JOHN_PASTON_II_1472,_5_JUNE}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:28
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:30
LETTER:PASTON_188:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
<font> To my ryght worchepfull brodyr Syr John Paston , knyght .
</font> PASTON,I,573.188.5767

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:28
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:30
LETTER:PASTON_188:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Ryght worchepfull syr , I recomand me to yow , sertyfying yow +tat , as
God help me , I wend +tat William Barker had ben wyth yow thys
Whyghtsontyd at London and browght yow monye , PASTON,I,573.188.5768

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:28
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:30
LETTER:PASTON_188:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
for so he promysyd bothe Jude` and me +tat he shold do , and also at
hys comyng to London +tat he shold make yow ther a clere reknyng what
mony he had receyuyd and delyuerd . PASTON,I,573.188.5769

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:28
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:30
LETTER:PASTON_188:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And tyll thys day that I spak wyth hys son I wend he had ben wyth yow
be-cause I herd not fro yow the contrary syn Jwde` was her .
PASTON,I,573.188.5770

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:28
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:30
LETTER:PASTON_188:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Hys son hathe promysyd me that he shall be wyth me thys nyght or
to-morow at the ferthest , PASTON,I,573.188.5771

money as is be-left it most be devydyd to euery man a parte aftyr the
quantyte` , whyche dyuysyon is not yet mad ; PASTON,I,574.188.5780

desyer as for the knyghtys of the shyer was an impossybyl to be browhgt
a-bowght , PASTON,I,577.190.5882

of your ; PASTON,I,581.191.5958

rennyth on it wyth opyn mowthe in hys werst wyse .

dyspleaseid wyth me , evyn as who seyth he wold I wyst that he settyth
not by the best of vs . PASTON,I,582.191.5970

of your dylygence and cost whyche ye had in gettyng of the hawk whyche
ye sent me , PASTON,I,583.192.5989

thow she had ben the best of the world . PASTON,I,583.192.5990

euer I spak wyth can jmagyn , she shall neuer serue but to ley eggys ,

good as lame in boothe hyr leggys , as euery man may se at jee ;
wherfor all syche folk as haue seen hyr auyse me to cast hyr in-to some
wood wher as I wyll haue hyr to eyer . PASTON,I,583.192.5993

<A-GENDER_MALE> <A-REL_---> <A-DOB_1444> <R_JOHN_MOWBRAY_SR>

<P_I,587>

{ED:359._TO_THE_DUKE_OF_NORFOLK:COPY_1472,_LATE}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:28
RECIPIENT:JOHN_MOWBRAY_SR:MALE:_:1415:57
LETTER:PASTON_193:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER_CODE_METADATA
To the right hyghe and myghty prince and my right good and gracious
lord , my lord the Dwke of Norffolk PASTON,I,587.193.6024

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:28
RECIPIENT:JOHN_MOWBRAY_SR:MALE:_:1415:57
LETTER:PASTON_193:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER_CODE_METADATA
Mekly besechyth your hyghness your poore and trew contynuall seruaunt
and oratour John Paston the yonger that it myght please your good grace
to call on-to your most discret and notabyll remembrance that lateward
, at the costys and charge of my brodyr John Paston , knyght , whyche
most entendith to do that myght please your hyghness , the ryght nobyll
lord the Bysshopp of Wynchester entretyd so and compouned wyth your
lordshepp that it liekyd the same to be so good and gracyous lord to my
seyd brodyr that , by forsse of serteyn dedys , relessis , and lettrys
of attorney selyd wyth the sealys of your good grace and of other
serteyn personys jnfeoffyd to your vse in the maner of Castre , late
John Fastolffys , knyght , in the conte` of Norffolk , my seyd brodyr
and I , wyth other enffeoffyd to my seyd brodyrs vse in the seyd maner
, wer peasably possessyd of and in the same tyll syche tyme as serteyn
personys , seruauntys on-to your good grace , entred in to the seyd
maner , and therof haue takyn the jssues and profitys in the name of
your seyd hyghnesse by the space of thre yer and $more , to the gret
hurt of my seyd brodyr and me , your seyd seruaunt and oratour .
Wherfor , as I haue oft tymys befor thys , I beseche your good grace ,
at the reuerence of God and in the wey of charyte` , that my seyd
brodyr may by your hyghness be a-yen restoryd in-to the possessyon of
the $seyd maner $accordyng to the lawe and good conscyence .
PASTON,I,587.193.6025

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:28
RECIPIENT:JOHN_MOWBRAY_SR:MALE:_:1415:57
LETTER:PASTON_193:M4:1472:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER_CODE_METADATA
And we shall prey to God for the preseruacyon of your most nobyll
estate . PASTON,I,587.193.6026
