{ED:365._TO_JOHN_PASTON_II_1475,_10_OCTOBER}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:31
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:33
LETTER:PASTON_195:M4:1475:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To the ryght worchepfull Syr John Paston , knyght , lodgyd at
the George by Powlys Wherff in London . </font> PASTON,I,594.195.6047

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:31
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:33
LETTER:PASTON_195:M4:1475:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Ryght worchepfull syr , I recomand me to yow , sertyfying yow that I
haue comonyd wyth Barnard and other your wellwyllers wyth my lord of
Norffolk , whyche avise me that ye shold for your nyghest meane to get
Caster a-yen labore to get a lettre fro the Kyng dyrect to R. Sothewell
, Jamys Hubbard , and o+ter of my lordys consayll being , and to jche
of theym ; and in the seyd letter to lete theym haue knowlage that the
Kyng mevyd to my lord of the seyd mater beyond +te see , and hough my
lord answerd the Kyng that at hys comyng in-to Inglond he wold meue to
hys seyd consayll of the seyd mater and geue the Kyng an answer .
Wherfor the Kyng in the seyd lettyr must streyghtly charge theym , and
iche of theym , to comon wyth my lord in the seyd mater in syche wyse
that the Kyng may be sertyfyed of an answer fro my lord and theym at
the ferthest by Crastino Animarum , PASTON,I,594.195.6048

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:31
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:33
LETTER:PASTON_195:M4:1475:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
for Suthewell nor Jamys Hubbard shall not be at London befor Halowmass
. PASTON,I,594.195.6049

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:33
LETTER:PASTON_195:M4:1475:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And thys is the best wey that ye may take , as we thynk here .

as fayne ye had it as eny body ; PASTON,I,594.195.6051

{ED:366._TO_JOHN_PASTON_II_1475,_23_OCTOBER}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:31
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:33
LETTER:PASTON_196:M4:1475:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To Syr John Paston , knyght , lodgyd at the George by Powlys
Wherff in London . </font> PASTON,I,595.196.6076

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:31
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:33
LETTER:PASTON_196:M4:1475:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Aftyr all dwte`s of recomendacyon , please it yow to vndyrstand that I
haue spokyn wyth my lady sythe I wrot to yow last , and she told me
that the Kyng had no syche woordys to my lord for Caster as ye told me
; PASTON,I,595.196.6077

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:31
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:33
LETTER:PASTON_196:M4:1475:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
but she seyth that the Kyng axid my lord at hys departyng fro Caleys
how he wold deele wyth Caster , PASTON,I,595.196.6078

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:31
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:33
LETTER:PASTON_196:M4:1475:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and my lord answerd nevyr a woord . PASTON,I,595.196.6079

<P_I,597>

{ED:368._TO_JOHN_PASTON_II_1476,_23_JANUARY}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34
LETTER:PASTON_198:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To Syr John Paston , knyght , at +te George at Powlys Wharffe .
</font> PASTON,I,597.198.6131

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34
LETTER:PASTON_198:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Aftyr all dewte`s of recomendacyon , lyeketh yow to weet that I ensuer
yow your sendyng to Caster is evyll takyn among my lordys folkys , in
so myche that some sey that ye tendryd lytyll my lordys dethe in as
myche as ye wold so sone entre vp-on hym aftyr hys dyssease wyth-ought
avyse and assent of my lordys consayll . Wherfor it is thought here by
syche as be your frendys in my lordys house that , if my lady haue onys
the graunt of the wardshepp of the chyld , that she wyll ocupye Caster
wyth other londys and ley the defaute on your vnkynd hastyness of
entre` wyth-ought hyr assent . Wherfor in eny wyse gete yow a patent of
+te Kyng ensealyd be-for hyrs , and ye may by eny meane possybyll .
PASTON,I,597.198.6132

wherfor if I $myght be pardond for eny kepyng of horse at Caleys tyll
myd-somer it wer a good torne . PASTON,I,598.198.6135

vj=xx= and x li. it is nough , PASTON,I,598.198.6139

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34
LETTER:PASTON_198:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and I wold haue vij=xx= li. and x li. , and I to plege it ought in iiij
or v yer or ellys to forfet the maner . PASTON,I,598.198.6140

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:32
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:34
LETTER:PASTON_198:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Wretyn at Norwyche the Twysday next aftyr your departyng thens .
PASTON,I,598.198.6141

<P_I,599>

{ED:370._TO_LORD_HASTINGS_1476,_2_MARCH}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:32
RECIPIENT:WILLIAM_HASTINGS:MALE:_:1430?:46?
LETTER:PASTON_199:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
<font> To my lord . </font> PASTON,I,599.199.6143

<P_I,600>

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:32
RECIPIENT:WILLIAM_HASTINGS:MALE:_:1430?:46?
LETTER:PASTON_199:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
My most doughtyd and singuler good lord , aftyr most humble and dew
recomendacyon please it your good lordshepp to have knowlage that ,
accordyng to your comandement , jn my wey homeward I remembred me of a
persone whyche to my thynkyng is meetly to be clerk of your kechyn ,
whyche persone is now in seruyse wyth Master Fitzwater , and was befor
that wyth Whethyll at Gwynes and purveyor for hys house , and at syche
tyme as the Kyngys grace was ther last in hys vyage towardes France .
PASTON,I,600.199.6144

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:32
RECIPIENT:WILLIAM_HASTINGS:MALE:_:1430?:46?
LETTER:PASTON_199:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
Thys man is meane of stature , yonge j-nough , well wittyd , well
manerd , a goodly yong man on horse and foote . PASTON,I,600.199.6145

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:32
RECIPIENT:WILLIAM_HASTINGS:MALE:_:1430?:46?
LETTER:PASTON_199:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
He is well spokyn jn Inglyshe , metly well in Frenshe , and verry
parfite in Flemyshe . PASTON,I,600.199.6146

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:32
RECIPIENT:WILLIAM_HASTINGS:MALE:_:1430?:46?
LETTER:PASTON_199:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
He can wryght and reed . PASTON,I,600.199.6147

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:32
RECIPIENT:WILLIAM_HASTINGS:MALE:_:1430?:46?
LETTER:PASTON_199:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
Hys name is Rychard Stratton . PASTON,I,600.199.6148

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:32
RECIPIENT:WILLIAM_HASTINGS:MALE:_:1430?:46?
LETTER:PASTON_199:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
Hys modyr is Mastress Grame of Caleys . PASTON,I,600.199.6149

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:32
RECIPIENT:WILLIAM_HASTINGS:MALE:_:1430?:46?
LETTER:PASTON_199:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
And when I had shewyd hym myn jntent he was agreable and verry glad if
that it myght please your lordshepp to accept hym in-to your servyse ,
wherto I promysed hym my poore helpe as ferforthe as I durst meve your
good lordshepp for hym , trustyng that I shold have knowelage of your
plesure her-in or I departed towardes your lordshep ought of this
contrey . Wherfor I advysed hym to be redy wyth-in xiiij dayes of
Marche at the ferthest , that if it pleasyd your lordsheppe to accept
hym or to haue a syght of hym be-for your departyng to Caleys , that
ther shold be no slaughthe in hym . PASTON,I,600.199.6150

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:32
RECIPIENT:WILLIAM_HASTINGS:MALE:_:1430?:46?
LETTER:PASTON_199:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
He desyred me to meve Master Fitzwater to be good mastyr to hym in thys
behalve , PASTON,I,600.199.6151

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:32
RECIPIENT:WILLIAM_HASTINGS:MALE:_:1430?:46?
LETTER:PASTON_199:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
and so I dyd ; PASTON,I,600.199.6152

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:32
RECIPIENT:WILLIAM_HASTINGS:MALE:_:1430?:46?
LETTER:PASTON_199:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
and he was verry glad and agreable ther-to , seying if hys sone had ben
of age , and all the seruauntis he hathe myght be in eny wyse
acceptabell to your lordshepp , that they all , and hym-silff in lyek
wyse , shall be at your comandment whyll he leveth .
PASTON,I,600.199.6153

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:32
RECIPIENT:WILLIAM_HASTINGS:MALE:_:1430?:46?
LETTER:PASTON_199:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
And at my comyng hom to my poore house I sent for Robart Bernard
PASTON,I,600.199.6154

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:32
RECIPIENT:WILLIAM_HASTINGS:MALE:_:1430?:46?
LETTER:PASTON_199:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
and shewid on-to hym that I had mevyd your lordshepp for hym ,
PASTON,I,600.199.6155

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:32
RECIPIENT:WILLIAM_HASTINGS:MALE:_:1430?:46?
LETTER:PASTON_199:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
and he in lyek forme is agreable to be redy by the xiiij day of Marche
to awayte on your lordshepp , be it to Caleys or ellys where , and fro
that day so foorthe for ever whyll hys lyff wyll last , wyth-ought
grugeing or contrarying your comandement and plesure in eny wyse that
is in hym possibyll t'accomplishe . PASTON,I,600.199.6156

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:32
RECIPIENT:WILLIAM_HASTINGS:MALE:_:1430?:46?
LETTER:PASTON_199:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
I shewed on-to hym that I had preyed Master Talbot to be a mean to your
good lordshepp for hym , and if so wer that Mastyr Talbot thought that
your lordshepp wer content to take hys servyse then , that it wold
please Mastyr Talbot to meve my lady of Norffolkys grace to wryght
<P_I,601> or send to Bernard puttyng hym in knowlage that hyr grace is
content that he shall become your menyall seruaunt ; wherof he was
passyng well pleasyd . PASTON,I,601.199.6157

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:32
RECIPIENT:WILLIAM_HASTINGS:MALE:_:1430?:46?
LETTER:PASTON_199:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
But that not wythstandyng , as I enformed your lordshepp , he is not so
reteyned neyther-2 by fee nor promess but that he may let hym-sylff
loose to do your lordshepe seruyse when ye wyll receyue hym ,
PASTON,I,601.199.6158

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:32
RECIPIENT:WILLIAM_HASTINGS:MALE:_:1430?:46?
LETTER:PASTON_199:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
and so wyll he do ; PASTON,I,601.199.6159

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:32
RECIPIENT:WILLIAM_HASTINGS:MALE:_:1430?:46?
LETTER:PASTON_199:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
but your lordshepe so pleasid , leve wer bettyr . PASTON,I,601.199.6160

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:32
RECIPIENT:WILLIAM_HASTINGS:MALE:_:1430?:46?
LETTER:PASTON_199:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
Rychard Stratton told me that whyll he was in servyse wyth Whethyll ,
John Redwe mocyond hym onys myche aftyr thys jntent ,
PASTON,I,601.199.6161

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:32
RECIPIENT:WILLIAM_HASTINGS:MALE:_:1430?:46?
LETTER:PASTON_199:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
but at that tyme Whethyll wold not be so good mastyr to hym as to meve
your lordshepe for hym . PASTON,I,601.199.6162

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:32
RECIPIENT:WILLIAM_HASTINGS:MALE:_:1430?:46?
LETTER:PASTON_199:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
My lord , I trust that your lordshepe shall lyek bothe ther persones
and ther condicyons , PASTON,I,601.199.6163

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:32
RECIPIENT:WILLIAM_HASTINGS:MALE:_:1430?:46?
LETTER:PASTON_199:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
and as for ther trowthes , if it may please your good $lordshepe to
accept my poore woord wyth thers , I wyll depose largely for that .
PASTON,I,601.199.6164

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:32
RECIPIENT:WILLIAM_HASTINGS:MALE:_:1430?:46?
LETTER:PASTON_199:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
And as it pleasyth your good lordshepe to comand me in thes maters and
all other , jf it may please your lordshepe to shewe the same so to my
brodyr Nessfeld , he knowith who shall sonest be wyth me to putt me in
knowlage of your plesure , whyche I shall be at all seasons redy
t'accomplyshe to my poore power , wyth Godys grace , whom I beseche
longe to contenue the prosperous astate of your good lordshepp .
PASTON,I,601.199.6165

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:32
RECIPIENT:WILLIAM_HASTINGS:MALE:_:1430?:46?
LETTER:PASTON_199:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
Fro Norwyche the second day of Marche , wyth the hand of your most
humble seruaunt and beedman John Paston PASTON,I,601.199.6166

<P_I,601>

{ED:371._TO_MARGARET_PASTON_1476,_PROBABLY_LATE_MARCH}

<P_I,602>

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_200:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Aftyr all dewte`s of recomendacyon , in as humbyll wyse as {in}_P I can
I beseche yow of your blyssyng . PASTON,I,602.200.6167

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_200:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
The cheff cause that I wryght to yow for at thys season is for that I
vndyrstand that my lady wold be ryght glad to haue yow a-bought hyr at
hyr labore , jn so myche that she hathe axyd the questyon of dyuers
gentyllwomen whedyr they thought that ye wold awayte on hyr at that
season or nought . PASTON,I,602.200.6168

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_200:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And they answerd that they durst sey that ye wold wyth ryght good wyll
awayte on hyr at that tyme and at all other seasons that {at}_P she
wold comand yow . PASTON,I,602.200.6169

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_200:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And so I thynk that my lady wyll send for yow ; PASTON,I,602.200.6170

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_200:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and if it wer your ease to be here I wold be ryght glad that ye myght
be here , PASTON,I,602.200.6171

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:32
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_200:M4:1476:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
for I thynk yowr being here shold do gret good to my brodyrs maters
that he hathe to sped wyth hyr . Wherfor , for Godys sake , haue your
horse and all your gere redy wyth yow wherso euer ye be , ought or at
home . PASTON,I,602.200.6172

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:32

and my lady myght then fortune to be ferforthe on hyr jorney or ye cam
, if she wer as swyfte as ye wer onys on Good Fryday .
PASTON,I,602.200.6177

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:32

And as for the mater in the latter end of my brodyr Syr Johnys lettyr ,
me thynk he takyth a wronge wey if he go so to werk ;
PASTON,I,602.200.6178

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:32

for as for the peopyll here , I vndyrstand non other but that all
folkys here be ryght well dysposyd towardys that mater , fro the
hyghest degre` to the lowest , except Robart Brandon and John Colvyll .
PASTON,I,602.200.6179

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:32

towardys that mater , in as myche as they wold put yow to the labore
aboue wretyn ; PASTON,I,602.200.6180

contre` now of new that the tombe is not mad . PASTON,I,602.200.6182

{ED:374._TO_MARGARET_PASTON_1477,_8_MARCH}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:33
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_201:M4:1477:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
<font> To my ryght worchepfull modyr Margaret Paston . </font>
PASTON,I,605.201.6191

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:33
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_201:M4:1477:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Ryght worschepfull modyr , aftyr all dwte`s of recomendacyon , jn as
humble wyse as {in}_P I can I beseche yow of your dayly blyssyng .
PASTON,I,605.201.6192

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:33
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_201:M4:1477:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Modyr , $please $it {TEXT:pleasyt} you to wett that the cause that Dam
Elyzabeth Brews desyreth to mete wyth yow at Norwyche , and not at
Langley as I apoyntyd wyth yow at my last being at Mawtby , is by my
meanys ; PASTON,I,605.201.6193

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:33
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_201:M4:1477:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
for my brodyr Thomas Jermyn , whyche knowyth nought of the mate {ED:r}
, tellyth me that the causey or ye can come to Bokenham Fery is so
over-flowyn that ther is no man that may an-ethe passe it , though he
be ryght well horsyd ; whyche is no mete wey for yow to passe ouer ,
God defend it . PASTON,I,605.201.6194

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:33
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_

to be at Norwyche as for a day or tweyn , and passe not , then to mete
at Langely wher every thyng is dere ; PASTON,I,605.201.6195

{ED:375._TO_JOHN_PASTON_II_1477,_9_MARCH}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:33
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:35
LETTER:PASTON_202:M4:1477:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
<font> Thys bylle be delyuerd to Thomas Grene , good-man of the George
by Powlys Wharffe , or to hys wyff , to send to Syr John Paston wherso
evere he be , at Caleys , London , or other placys . </font>
PASTON,I,606.202.6214

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:33
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:35
LETTER:PASTON_202:M4:1477:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Ryght worchepfull syr and my most good and kynde brodyr , in as humbyll
wyse as {in}_P I can I recomand me to yow . PASTON,I,606.202.6215

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:33
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:35
LETTER:PASTON_202:M4:1477:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Syr , it is so that I haue , sythe John Bekurton departyd fro hens ,
ben at Toppcrofft at Syr Thomas Brewse . PASTON,I,606.202.6216

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:33
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:35

And as for the mater that I sent yow word of by Jon Bekurton towchyng
my-sylff and Mastress Margery Brews , I am yet at no serteynte` ,
PASTON,I,606.202.6217

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:34
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_203:M4:1478:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Ryght worchepfull modyr , aftyr all dwte`s of humble recomendacyon , in
as humble wyse as {in}_P I can I beseche yow of your dayly blyssyng .
PASTON,I,612.203.6240

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:SON:1444:34
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_203:M4:1478:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
$Please $it {TEXT:Pleasyt} yow to wett that at my being now at London ,
lyek as ye gaue me in comandment I mevyd to Mastyr Pykenham and to
Jamys Hubart for ther being at Norwyche now thys Lent , that ye myght
haue ther avyses in syche maters as ye let me haue vndyrstandyng of .
PASTON,I,612.203.6241

for he told Doctore Pykenham that ther was no gentylwoman in Inglond of
so lytyll aqueyntance as he had wyth yow that he wold be <P_I,613>
glader to do servyse on-to , and myche the glader for he purposeth fro
hensforthe duryng hys lyff to be a Norffolk man and to lye wyth-in ij
myle of Loddon , whyche is but viij or x myle at the most fro Mautby .
PASTON,I,613.203.6250

other maters leyd apart . PASTON,I,613.203.6251

of age . PASTON,I,613.203.6255

{ED:381._TO_JOHN_PASTON_II_1479,_6_NOVEMBER}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:37
LETTER:PASTON_204:M4:1479:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
<font> To Syr John Paston , knyght . </font> PASTON,I,614.204.6281

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:37
LETTER:PASTON_204:M4:1479:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Syr , aftyr all dute`s of recomendacyon , $please $it {TEXT:pleasyt} to
vndyrstand that , acordyng to your lettre sent me by Wyllson , Lomnore
and I mett at Norwyche and drew ought a formable bylle ought of your ,
and sent it a-yen to th'exchetore Palmer by my brodyr Edmund , whyche
had an other erand in-to that contre` to spek wyth H. Spylman to get
hys good wyll towardys the bargayn lyek to be fynyshed hastyly betwyx
Mastress Clyppysby and hym . PASTON,I,614.204.6282

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:37
LETTER:PASTON_204:M4:1479:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And , syr , at the delyuere` of the bylle of jnquisicyon to
th'exchetour , my brodyr $Edmund {TEXT:Edmud} told hym that , accordyng
to your wryghtyng to me , I spak wyth myn oncle William and told hym
that I vndyrstood by yow that my lord of Elye had aswell desyred hym in
wryghtyng as you by mouthe that non of you shold swe to haue the
jnquisycion fond aftyr your jntentys tyll other weyes of pese wer takyn
betwyx yow ; wherfor my brodyr $Edmund {TEXT:Edmud} desyred hym that
wyth-ought myn oncle labord to haue it fond for hym , ellys that he
shold not proced for yow . PASTON,I,614.204.6283

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:37
LETTER:PASTON_204:M4:1479:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
But th'exchetour answerd hym that he wold fynd it for you aftyr your
byll of hys owne autorite` , PASTON,I,614.204.6284

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:37
LETTER:PASTON_204:M4:1479:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and so it was <P_I,615> fond . PASTON,I,615.204.6285

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:37
LETTER:PASTON_204:M4:1479:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
But , syr , ye must remembre that my lord of Ely desyred myn oncle as
well as you to surcease , as I putt my oncle in knowlage .
PASTON,I,615.204.6286

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:37
LETTER:PASTON_204:M4:1479:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And myn oncle at the fyrst agreid that he wold make no more sute
a-bought it , in trust that ye wold do the same acordyng to my lord of
Elys desyer ; wherfor ye had ned to be ware that th'exchetor slyppe not
fro yow when he comyth to London and sertyfye it or ye spek wyth hym .
PASTON,I,615.204.6287

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:37
LETTER:PASTON_204:M4:1479:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And so I trow it is lyek to be of some of the dettors , what for
casuelte` of dethe and thes other causes befor rehersyd . Wherfor me
thynkyth if it wer apoyntyd be-for the arbytrors that he shold receyue
theym as he seythe , it wer not for yow to brek it ;
PASTON,I,615.204.6297

Also , syr , ye must of ryght , consyderyng my brodyr Edmundys
diligence in your maters sythe your departyng , helpe hym forwardys to
myn oncle Syr George Brown , as my brodyr $Edmund {TEXT:Edmud} preyid
yow in hys lettyr that he sent on-to yow by Mondys sone of Norwyche ,
dwellyng wyth Thomas Jenney , that myn oncle Syr George may gett to my
brodyr Edmund of the kyng +te wardshepp of John Clyppysby , son and
heyer to John Clyppysby , late of Owby in the conte` of Norffolk ,
sqwyr , dwryng the nonnage of my lord and lady of York , thow it cost
iiij or v mark the swte . PASTON,I,615.204.6303

at London , whych I thought shold not haue ben , PASTON,I,617.205.6332

tyll he her fro me ayen , axe hem non , PASTON,I,618.205.6344

for the Kynges Attorney Jamys Hobart ; PASTON,I,628.206.6353

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:_
RECIPIENT:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_206:M4:1490S?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_OTHER
But when ye send me the playster ye must send me wryghtyng hough it
shold be leyd to and takyn fro hys knee , and hough longe it shold abyd
on hys kne vnremevyd , and hough longe the playster wyll laste good ,
and whethyr he must lape eny more clothys a-bowte the playster to kepe
it warme or nought . PASTON,I,628.206.6357

<A-GENDER_MALE> <A-REL_---> <A-DOB_1444> <R_JOHN_RADCLIFFE>

<P_I,628>

{ED:390._TO_LORD_FITZWALTER:DRAFT_BETWEEN_1487_1495}

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_RADCLIFFE:MALE:_:1452?:_
LETTER:PASTON_207:M4:1490S?:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
Humbly besecheth your good lordshepe your dayly seruaunt and beedman
John Paston , more kayteff than knyght , that it may please yow of your
<P_I,629> specyall grace to dyrect ought your lettres sygned wyth your
hand and sealid wyth your seall to the dreedfull man Jamys Radcliff of
Byllingforthe , sqwyer , fermour of your wareyn ther - ought of whoys
wareyn no maner of man nor vermyn dare take on hym for dought of your
seyd dredfull {ED:man} to take or carye a-wey eny of your game ther for
fere of hangyd vp among other mysdoers and forfaytours , as wesellis ,
lobsters , polkattys , bosartys , and mayne currys - thatt the seyd
Jamys shall vpon the syght of your seyd wryghtyng delyver or cause to
be delyverd to your seyd besecher or to hys depute` delyuerer of your
seyd lettres at hys fyrst syght of the same vj coupyll blake conyes or
rennyng rabettys , or some blake and some whyght to the seyd nombre ,
to store wyth a newe grownd of your seyd besechers at Oxenhed , more
lyeke a pynnefold then a parke . PASTON,I,629.207.6360

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_RADCLIFFE:MALE:_:1452?:_
LETTER:PASTON_207:M4:1490S?:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
And your seyd besecher shall daylye prey to God for the preservacyon of
your noble estate longe t'endure . PASTON,I,629.207.6361

yet , PASTON,I,629.208.6362

also . PASTON,I,629.208.6365

PASTON,I,629.208.6367

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:56?

Carter to come hydyr on Fryday or Saterday next comyng and end ther
acomptes her at Norwyche . PASTON,I,629.208.6368

AUTHOR:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1444:56?

LETTER:PASTON_208:E1:1500?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_SERVANT
I sye John Wynnys byllis that his man brought me yesterday , Twysday ,
wherby I vndyrstand that he desyreth to be alowyd v li. for Byshoppis
of <P_I,630> Yermouthe , and for hering delyuerd to myn cosyn Loveday ;
wherto I am agreid , PASTON,I,630.208.6369

paye theym , PASTON,I,630.208.6370

in Flegge and Yermouthe that ar enpanellid betwyx the Kynge and me to
be at Thettford at the assises on Wednysday next comyng .
PASTON,I,630.208.6373

{ED:399._TO_MARGARET_PASTON_1481,_27_JANUARY}

AUTHOR:EDMOND_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:_:_
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_213:M4:1481:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To my ryght wurchypfull and especiall good mothere Margaret
Paston . </font> PASTON,I,640.213.6489

AUTHOR:EDMOND_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:_:_
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_213:M4:1481:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Ryght worchypfull and moste especialle good modyre , jn my moste vmble
wyse wyth alle my dute` and seruyse I recomawnd me to yow , besechynge
+gow of +gour blyssyng , whyche is to me moste joy of erthely thynge .
PASTON,I,640.213.6490

AUTHOR:EDMOND_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:_:_
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_213:M4:1481:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And it plese +gow to be so good and kynde modyre to forgeue me and also
my wyffe of owur leude offence +tat we haue not don owur dute` , whyche
was to haue seyn and ave waytyd vp-on +gow ore now .
PASTON,I,640.213.6491

AUTHOR:EDMOND_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:_:_
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_213:M4:1481:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
My huswyffe trustythe to ley to +gow here huswyferey fore here excuse ,
wyche I muste beseche +gow not to accepte ; PASTON,I,640.213.6492

AUTHOR:EDMOND_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:_:_
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_213:M4:1481:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
fore jn good faythe I deme here mynde hathe ben othereweys ocapyed +tan
as to huswyfery , whyche semyth welle be +te latchesnes of +te tylthe
of here landdys . PASTON,I,640.213.6493

AUTHOR:EDMOND_PASTON_II:MALE:SON:_:_

+te good parson of Mautby , and also Mastyre Baley , who I wende woold
not haue balkyd this pore loggeyng to Norwyche wardys .

wyth shuld goo to the redemyng of +gour landys and othere +gour
dawngeres . PASTON,I,642.214.6519

was $thought be Ser Harry H. that Ser R. Townesend shuld haue ben
contentte wyth it , whyche is knowyn the contrary , and causyd hym to
geue delaye in that be-halffe to +gow . PASTON,I,642.214.6520

AUTHOR:EDMOND_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:_
LETTER:PASTON_214:M4:1490S?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Yf +ge wyll putt lande in feffement fore +geres , to the full
contentacyon of Townesend , Colett , and of my vncle , whyche he and
all men thynke +ge muste be charged to ore euer +ge goo thorow , and
that +gour next frendys haue the receyte of it tyll it be full contente
and payed , thus ore suche a suere weye to be had fore the well of all
parteys , I darre say he is not alyve wyll indevoure hym wyth better
wyll to deele wyth +gow , and , as my mynde seruys me , streytte
hym-sylffe as it may be booryn , be-syde my $mastres hys modyres v c .
PASTON,I,642.214.6524

fore fere of the plage , and haue comyn seyne my wyffe , and specyallly

{ED:402._TO_MARGARET_PASTON_BEFORE_1479,_19_MAY}

AUTHOR:WALTER_PASTON:MALE:SON:1455:_
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_215:M4:1470S:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
<font> To his worchypfull $moder Margaret Paston , $dwellyng in Mawtby
, $be +tis letter delyveryd in hast . </font> PASTON,I,644.215.6541

AUTHOR:WALTER_PASTON:MALE:SON:1455:_
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_215:M4:1470S:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Rytgh reverent and worchypfull moder , I recomavnd me on-to yowre good
moderchypp , besechyng yow to geve me yowre dayly benedyiccyon ,
desyeryng hartyly to heere of yowre prosperyte` , whych God preserve to
hys plesure and to yowre hartys desyyre , &c . PASTON,I,644.215.6542

AUTHOR:WALTER_PASTON:MALE:SON:1455:_
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_215:M4:1470S:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
I marvel soore that yow sent me noo word of the letter wych I sent to
yow by Master Wylliam Brown at Ester . PASTON,I,644.215.6543

AUTHOR:WALTER_PASTON:MALE:SON:1455:_
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_215:M4:1470S:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
I sent yow word that tym that I xold send yow myn exspenses
partyculerely , PASTON,I,644.215.6544

AUTHOR:WALTER_PASTON:MALE:SON:1455:_
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_215:M4:1470S:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
but as at thys tym the berare here-of had a letter sodenly that he xold
com hom , PASTON,I,644.215.6545

AUTHOR:WALTER_PASTON:MALE:SON:1455:_
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_215:M4:1470S:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and there-fore I kowd have noo leysure to send them yow on that wys ;
PASTON,I,644.215.6546

AUTHOR:WALTER_PASTON:MALE:SON:1455:_
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_215:M4:1470S:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and there-fore I xall wryt to yow in thys letter the hool som of my
exspenses sythyns I was wyth yow tyll Ester last paste , and also the
reseytys , rekenyng the xx s. that I had of yow to Oxon. wardys , wyth
the Buschopys fyndyng . PASTON,I,644.215.6547

AUTHOR:WALTER_PASTON:MALE:SON:1455:_
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_215:M4:1470S:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
The hool som of reseytys ys v li. xvij s. vj d. , PASTON,I,644.215.6548

AUTHOR:WALTER_PASTON:MALE:SON:1455:_
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_215:M4:1470S:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and the holl som of exspenses ys vj li. v s. v d. ob. qua. ;
PASTON,I,644.215.6549

AUTHOR:WALTER_PASTON:MALE:SON:1455:_
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_215:M4:1470S:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and that comth over the reseytys in my exspenses I have borowd of
Master Edmund , PASTON,I,644.215.6550

AUTHOR:WALTER_PASTON:MALE:SON:1455:_
RECIPIENT:MARGARET_PASTON[N.MAUTBY]:FEMALE:MOTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_215:M4:1470S:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and yt drawyth to viij s. , PASTON,I,644.215.6551

AUTHOR:WALTER_PASTON:MALE:SON:1455:_

{ED:403._TO_JOHN_PASTON_II_1479,_22_MAY}

AUTHOR:WALTER_PASTON:MALE:BROTHER:1455:24
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:37
LETTER:PASTON_216:M4:1479:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To hys ryth reverend broder Ser John Paston at Caster Hall in
Norfolk . </font> PASTON,I,645.216.6562

AUTHOR:WALTER_PASTON:MALE:BROTHER:1455:24
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:37
LETTER:PASTON_216:M4:1479:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
After all dw reverens and recomendacions , likyth yt yow to vnderstond
that I reseyvyd a letter fro my broder John wher-by I vnderstod that my
moder and yow wold know what +te costys of my procedyng schold be .
PASTON,I,645.216.6563

AUTHOR:WALTER_PASTON:MALE:BROTHER:1455:24
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:37
LETTER:PASTON_216:M4:1479:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
I sent a letter to my broder John certyfyyng my costys and +te causys
why that I wold procede ; PASTON,I,645.216.6564

AUTHOR:WALTER_PASTON:MALE:BROTHER:1455:24
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:37
LETTER:PASTON_216:M4:1479:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
but as I have sent word to my moder I purpose to tary now tyll yt be
Mychylmas , PASTON,I,645.216.6565

AUTHOR:WALTER_PASTON:MALE:BROTHER:1455:24
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:37
LETTER:PASTON_216:M4:1479:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
for yf I tary tyll than sum of my costys schall be payyd for .
PASTON,I,645.216.6566

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:1442:37
LETTER:PASTON_216:M4:1479:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA

Qwenys broder schold have procedyd at Mydsomer , PASTON,I,645.216.6567

; thankyng yow of dyverse letterys that yow sent me .
PASTON,I,646.217.6582

desyrynge to here of yowre welfare and prosperite` , letynge yow wete
that I haue reseuyd of Alwedyr a lettyr and a nobyll in gowlde +ter-in
. PASTON,I,649.218.6601

for a monthe was to pay for $when he had mony laste .
PASTON,I,649.218.6605

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:19?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:34?
LETTER:PASTON_218:M4:1478?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Also I beseche yow to sende me a hose clothe , on for +te halydays of
sum colore and a-nothyr for +te workyng days , how corse so euer it be
it makyth no matyr ; and a stomechere , and ij schyrtys , and a peyer
of sclyppers . PASTON,I,649.218.6606

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:19?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:34?
LETTER:PASTON_218:M4:1478?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And if it lyke yow that I may come wyth Alwedyr be watyr and sporte me
wyth yow at London a day or ij thys terme tyme , than +ge may let all
thys be tyl +te tyme that I come . PASTON,I,649.218.6607

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:19?

And than I wol telle you when I schall be redy to come from Eton , by
+te grace of God , whom haue yow in hys kepyng . PASTON,I,649.218.6608

Wretyn the Saturday next aftyr All Halown Day , wyth +te hand of your
brodyr Wylliam Paston PASTON,I,649.218.6609

{ED:407._TO_JOHN_PASTON_III_PROBABLY_1479,_23_FEBRUARY}

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?
LETTER:PASTON_219:M4:1479?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
<font> To his worchepfull broder John Paston be thys delyuered in hast
. </font> PASTON,I,650.219.6610

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?
LETTER:PASTON_219:M4:1479?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Ryght reuerent and worchepfull broder , aftyr all dewte`s of
recomendacion I recomaunde me on-to yow , desyryng to here of your
prosperite` and welfare , whych I pray God long to contynew to hys
plesore and to your hertys desyre ; letyng yow wete that I receyued a
letter from yow , in the wyche letter was viij d. , wyth +te whyche I
schuld bye a peyer of slyppers ; ferthere-more certyfyyng yow as for
+te xiij s. iiij d. whyche +ge sende by a jentylmannys man for my borde
, cawlyd Thomas Newton , was delyuered to myn hostes , and soo to my
creancere Master Thomas Steuenson ; PASTON,I,650.219.6611

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?
LETTER:PASTON_219:M4:1479?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and he hertely recomended hym to yow . PASTON,I,650.219.6612

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?
LETTER:PASTON_219:M4:1479?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Also +ge sende me worde in the letter of xij li. fyggys and viij li.
reysons . PASTON,I,650.219.6613

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?
LETTER:PASTON_219:M4:1479?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
I haue them nott delyuered , PASTON,I,650.219.6614

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?
LETTER:PASTON_219:M4:1479?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
but I dowte not I schal haue , PASTON,I,650.219.6615

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?
LETTER:PASTON_219:M4:1479?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
for Alwedyr tolde me of them PASTON,I,650.219.6616

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?
LETTER:PASTON_219:M4:1479?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and he seyde +tat they came aftyr in an other barge .
PASTON,I,650.219.6617

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?
LETTER:PASTON_219:M4:1479?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And as for +te yong jentylwoman , I wol certyfye yow how I fryste felle
in qweyntauns wyth hyr . PASTON,I,650.219.6618

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?
LETTER:PASTON_219:M4:1479?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Hir fader is dede . PASTON,I,650.219.6619

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?
LETTER:PASTON_219:M4:1479?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Ther be ij systers of them , +te <em> elder ... </em> +te whych weddyng
I was wyth myn hostes , and also desyryd by +te jentyl-man hym-selfe ,
cawlyd Wylliam Swanne , whos dwellynge is in Eton .
PASTON,I,650.219.6620

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?
LETTER:PASTON_219:M4:1479?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
So it fortuned that myn hostes reportyd on me odyrwyse than I was wordy
, so +tat hyr moder comaundyd hyr to make me good chere ,
PASTON,I,650.219.6621

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?
LETTER:PASTON_219:M4:1479?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and soo in good feythe sche ded . PASTON,I,650.219.6622

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?
LETTER:PASTON_219:M4:1479?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Sche is not a-bydynge ther sche ys now , PASTON,I,650.219.6623

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?
LETTER:PASTON_219:M4:1479?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
hyr dwellyng is in London ; PASTON,I,650.219.6624

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?
LETTER:PASTON_219:M4:1479?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
but hyr moder and sche cam to a place of hyrs v myle from Eton , were
+te weddyng was , for be-cause it was nye to +te jentylman whyche
weddyd hyr dowtyr . PASTON,I,650.219.6625

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?
LETTER:PASTON_219:M4:1479?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And on Monday next comyng , +tat <P_I,651> is to sey +te fyrst Monday
of Clene Lente , hyr moder and sche wyl goo to +te pardon at Schene ,
and soo forthe to London , and there to a-byde in a place of hyrs in
Bowe Chyrche-yerde . PASTON,I,651.219.6626

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?
LETTER:PASTON_219:M4:1479?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And if it plese yow to inquere of hyr , hyr modyrs name is Mestres
Alborow . PASTON,I,651.219.6627

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?
LETTER:PASTON_219:M4:1479?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
+Te name of the dowtyr is Margarete Alborow , PASTON,I,651.219.6628

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?
LETTER:PASTON_219:M4:1479?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
the age of hyr is be all lykelyod xviij or xix +gere at +te fertheste .
PASTON,I,651.219.6629

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?
LETTER:PASTON_219:M4:1479?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And as for the mony and plate , it is redy when soo euer sche were
weddyd ; PASTON,I,651.219.6630

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?
LETTER:PASTON_219:M4:1479?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
but as for the lyuelod , I trow not tyl after hyr modyrs desese ,
PASTON,I,651.219.6631

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?
LETTER:PASTON_219:M4:1479?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
but I can not telle yow for very certeyn <em> ... </em>
PASTON,I,651.219.6632

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?
LETTER:PASTON_219:M4:1479?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
but yow may know by inqueryng . PASTON,I,651.219.6633

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?
LETTER:PASTON_219:M4:1479?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And as for hyr bewte` , juge yow that when +ge see hyr , yf so be that
+ge take +te laubore ; PASTON,I,651.219.6634

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?
LETTER:PASTON_219:M4:1479?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and specialy beolde hyr handys , PASTON,I,651.219.6635

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?
LETTER:PASTON_219:M4:1479?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
for and if it be as it is tolde me sche is dysposyd to be thyke .
PASTON,I,651.219.6636

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?
LETTER:PASTON_219:M4:1479?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And as for my comynge from Eton , I lake no-thynge but wersyfyynge ,
whyche I troste to haue wyth a lytyll contynuance .
PASTON,I,651.219.6637

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?

Queritur : PASTON,I,651.219.6638

And thes too verse a-fore seyde be of myn own makyng .
PASTON,I,651.219.6644

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?

PASTON,I,651.219.6645

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:20?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:35?
LETTER:PASTON_219:M4:1479?:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Wretyn at Eton the Euen of Seynt Mathy the Apostyll , in haste , wyth
the hande of your broder Wylliam Paston PASTON,I,651.219.6646

<P_I,651>

{ED:408._TO_EDMOND_PASTON_II_AFTER_1480,_22_FEBRUARY}

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:_
RECIPIENT:EDMOND_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_220:M4:1480S:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
<font> To hys right worchepfull brodyr Edmunde Paston be thys lettyr
delyueryd . </font> PASTON,I,651.220.6647

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:_
RECIPIENT:EDMOND_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_220:M4:1480S:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Aftyr all dewte`s of recomendacion I recomaunde me on-to yow , letynge
yow wett that here is closid in thys same byll the wyll of my fadyr ,
suche as my brodyr hathe , PASTON,I,651.220.6648

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:_
RECIPIENT:EDMOND_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_220:M4:1480S:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and he seyth that it is the very wyll of my fadyr and that he had it
owt of the regestyr . PASTON,I,651.220.6649

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:_
RECIPIENT:EDMOND_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_220:M4:1480S:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And as for towchynge of my mater , I <P_I,652> can haue non othe {ED:r}
ende than I had whan I departyd fro yow , sauynge that my brodyr hathe
gotyn a pardon for +te alyenacion +tat the Bochop of Wynchestyr alyenyd
. PASTON,I,652.220.6650

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:_
RECIPIENT:EDMOND_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_220:M4:1480S:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And as for the estate that I schold haue in it , I can gete non but
acordynge to my fadyrs wyll , whyche is to me and to my heyers malys as
is specyfyed in the wyll . PASTON,I,652.220.6651

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:_
RECIPIENT:EDMOND_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_220:M4:1480S:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And as for my brodyrs wyll is non other but that I schuld haue Runham ,
whyche is viij li. a +gere ad minus , in recompense of the x merke owt
of the maner of Sporle , so that I relessyd all my ryght that I haue in
the maner of Sporle . PASTON,I,652.220.6652

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:_
RECIPIENT:EDMOND_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_220:M4:1480S:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And as towchynge yow in my brodyrs wyll , there is no-thyng ;
PASTON,I,652.220.6653

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:_
RECIPIENT:EDMOND_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_220:M4:1480S:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
for I redde it ouer PASTON,I,652.220.6654

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:_
RECIPIENT:EDMOND_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_220:M4:1480S:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and woll wright it also , so that I woll haue the same for my copye
that he wrote wyth hys owne hande . PASTON,I,652.220.6655

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:_
RECIPIENT:EDMOND_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_220:M4:1480S:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Also I beseche yow to recomaunde me hertely to my sustyr your wyff .
PASTON,I,652.220.6656

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:_
RECIPIENT:EDMOND_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_220:M4:1480S:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
No more to yow at thys tyme , but God haue yow in hys kepynge .
PASTON,I,652.220.6657

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:_
RECIPIENT:EDMOND_PASTON_II:MALE:BROTHER:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_220:M4:1480S:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Wretyn at London the xxij day of February , be yowre brodyr Wylliam
Paston PASTON,I,652.220.6658

{ED:409._TO_JOHN_PASTON_III_1487,_7_MARCH}

<P_I,653>

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:28
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:43
LETTER:PASTON_221:M4:1487:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Syr , I recomaunde me on-to yow , latynge yow wete that , as for John
Petyrsons mater , as +gett it is not spedde . PASTON,I,653.221.6659

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:28
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:43
LETTER:PASTON_221:M4:1487:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
I spake on-to Mayster Secretory of it , PASTON,I,653.221.6660

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:28
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:43
LETTER:PASTON_221:M4:1487:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and promysyd hym that +ge badde me ; PASTON,I,653.221.6661

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:28
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:43
LETTER:PASTON_221:M4:1487:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and he aunswerd me that he wold nott geue yowe non cowmfortt in it for
wynnyng of your money other than ye schuld fyend trew ,
PASTON,I,653.221.6662

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:28
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:43
LETTER:PASTON_221:M4:1487:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and so he wold nott vndyrtake it thow +ge wold spende abowt it c merke
. PASTON,I,653.221.6663

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:28
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:43
LETTER:PASTON_221:M4:1487:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And so vp-on thys aunswere I went on-to my lord PASTON,I,653.221.6664

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:28
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:43
LETTER:PASTON_221:M4:1487:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and toke hym on of the byllys , PASTON,I,653.221.6665

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:28
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:43
LETTER:PASTON_221:M4:1487:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and so he aunswerd me that at the fyrst worde the Kynge asched hym l li
. PASTON,I,653.221.6666

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:28
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:43
LETTER:PASTON_221:M4:1487:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And where as +ge reqwere to haue it grauntyd wyth-owt fyne or fee , I
wold +ge had it wyth the payment of +te fyne or fee ,
PASTON,I,653.221.6667

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:28
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:43
LETTER:PASTON_221:M4:1487:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
for it schall nott coste past xx s. or iiij nobyls more than +ge offerd
to +te secretory ; PASTON,I,653.221.6668

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:28
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:43
LETTER:PASTON_221:M4:1487:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and also in nowthyr of those byllys ther is non clawse in it wherby it
scholde be grauntyd wyth-owt fyne or fee , PASTON,I,653.221.6669

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:28
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:43
LETTER:PASTON_221:M4:1487:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and thow ther were it is tolde me it profyte nott ,
PASTON,I,653.221.6670

{ED:410._TO_THE_BAILIFF_OF_MAUTBY_1487}

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1459:28
RECIPIENT:NAME_UNKNOWN_10:MALE:_:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_222:M4:1487:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
<font> To the Baly of Mawlteby . </font> PASTON,I,654.222.6711

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1459:28
RECIPIENT:NAME_UNKNOWN_10:MALE:_:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_222:M4:1487:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
Mayster Baly , I recomaunde me on-to yow , praynge yow that ye woll
sende me be Wylliam Kokkys , berer her-of , iiij nobylles in golde putt
<P_I,655> in to the same boxe that thys byll is in as thow it were
euydens , PASTON,I,655.222.6712

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1459:28
RECIPIENT:NAME_UNKNOWN_10:MALE:_:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_222:M4:1487:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
for I haue tolde the masengere that he schulde brynge me nothynge butt
euydens ; PASTON,I,655.222.6713

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1459:28
RECIPIENT:NAME_UNKNOWN_10:MALE:_:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_222:M4:1487:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
for he is in a manere departyng owt of my seruyse , wherfore I wold
nott he knew so myche of my counsell . PASTON,I,655.222.6714

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1459:28
RECIPIENT:NAME_UNKNOWN_10:MALE:_:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_222:M4:1487:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
And as for the remenaunte , I wollde +ge schulde kepe it tyll I come
my-selfe . PASTON,I,655.222.6715

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:_:1459:28
RECIPIENT:NAME_UNKNOWN_10:MALE:_:_:_
LETTER:PASTON_222:M4:1487:AUTOGRAPH:OTHER
And if Bayard be on-solde I pray yow late hym be made fatte ageyns the
Kynge come in-to the contre` , what so euer I pay for the kepyng of hym
. PASTON,I,655.222.6716

in-to the contre` , be the grace of God , who haue yow in kepyng .
PASTON,I,655.222.6717

<font> To Syr John Paston be thys lettyr delyuered . </font>
PASTON,I,655.223.6719

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:29
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:44
LETTER:PASTON_223:M4:1488:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Aftyr all dewe recomendacion , $please $yt {TEXT:pleasyt} yow to
vndyrstonde that my lorde hathe ben wyth the Kynge in Wyndesour at
Seynt Georgys Feste , PASTON,I,655.223.6720

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:29
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:44
LETTER:PASTON_223:M4:1488:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and ther at the same feste were bothe-1 +te jnbacetours of Breten and
of Flaundyrs as well fro the Kynge of Romayns as fro the yonge Duke .
PASTON,I,655.223.6721

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:29
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:44
LETTER:PASTON_223:M4:1488:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
But I can not schew yow +te certeyn whedyr we schall haue wyth them
warre or pease . PASTON,I,655.223.6722

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:29
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:44
LETTER:PASTON_223:M4:1488:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
But I vndyrstonde for certeyn that all suche capeteyns as wente to +te
see in Lente , +tat is to sey Syr Charlys Somersett , Syr Richard Hawte
, and Syr Wylliam Vampage , makythe them redy to goo to the see ageyn
as schortely as they can , PASTON,I,655.223.6723

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:29
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:44
LETTER:PASTON_223:M4:1488:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
to what jntente I can not sey . PASTON,I,655.223.6724

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:29
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:44
LETTER:PASTON_223:M4:1488:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Also , where as it was seyde that my lord Woddevyle and other schulde
haue gone ouer in-to Breten to haue eyded the Duke of Breten , I can
not tell of non suche eyd . PASTON,I,655.223.6725

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:29
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:44
LETTER:PASTON_223:M4:1488:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Butt vp-on that seynge ther came many men to Sowthehamton , where it
was seyd that he schulde haue takyn schyppyng to haue waytyd vpon hym
ouer , PASTON,I,655.223.6726

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:29
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:44
LETTER:PASTON_223:M4:1488:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and soo whan he was countyrmaundyd thos that resortyd thedyr to haue
gon ouer wyth hym taryde there styll , in hope +tat they schuld haue
<P_I,656> ben lycensyd to haue gone ouer , PASTON,I,656.223.6727

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:29
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:44
LETTER:PASTON_223:M4:1488:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and whan they sey no lykeleod that they schuld haue lycens there was ij
c of them that gete them in-to a Breten schyppe +te whyche was late
come ouer wyth salte , and bad the mayster sett them a lond in Breten .
PASTON,I,656.223.6728

as Phylyp Lewes and Wyndesor bryngythe fro the corte , they be come
thens bothe ; PASTON,I,658.224.6750

but we here of no tydyngys that they brynge but that yondyr folkys
abyde stylle abowte +te place where as thys onhappy dede was done , and
not wyth no grete nowmbyr , PASTON,I,658.224.6751

of ther affynyte` as on Tuesday last past , as it aperythe in the copy
of ther proclamacion heraftyr folowyng . PASTON,I,658.224.6753

offyrde to mete wyth my lorde at Cambryge wyth xxx men apese of them .

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:30
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:45
LETTER:PASTON_224:M4:1489:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
To be knowyn to all the Northe partys of England to euery lorde ,
knyght , esquyer , gentylman , and yeman , that they $shall $be
{TEXT:schalbe} redy in ther defensable aray , jn the Est parte on
Tuysday next comyng on Aldyrton More , and in the West parte on Gateley
More the same day , vpon peyne of losyng of ther goodys and bodyes ,
for to geynsstonde suche persons as is abowtward for to dystroy owre
suffereyn lorde the Kynge and the Comowns of Engelond for suche
vnlawfull poyntys as Seynt Thomas of Cauntyrbery dyed for .
PASTON,I,659.224.6783

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:30

And thys to be fulfyllyd and kept by euery ylke comenere apon peyn of
dethe . PASTON,I,659.224.6784

<P_I,660>

{ED:414._TO_JOHN_PASTON_III_1492,_18_FEBRUARY}

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:33
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:48
LETTER:PASTON_225:M4:1492:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To the ryght worchepfull Syr John Paston , knyght . </font>
PASTON,I,660.225.6787

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:33
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:48
LETTER:PASTON_225:M4:1492:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Aftyr all dew recomendacion , lyke it yow to vndyrstond that Syr Herry
Heydon schewyd me that it is agreyd be Syr Edmond Bedyngfeld that the
mater betwyx hym and my brodyr Yeluerton $shall $be {TEXT:schalbe}
comynd at Norwyche , and there a dyreccion to be takyn in the same
mater mete for them bothe . PASTON,I,660.225.6788

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:33
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:48

LETTER:PASTON_225:M4:1492:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And there is also grete prouysyon made be gentylmen +tat scholde goo
wythe hys grace for hors , harnes , tentys , halys , gardyuyans ,
cartys , and othyr thyngys that scholde serue them for thys jurney that
the Kynge entendythe to take on hand , soo that be lykelyod hys grace
$will $be {TEXT:wolbe} goyng sone vpon Ester . PASTON,I,660.225.6792

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:48

And so I entende , aftyr that I here $heraftyr , to goo to Caleys to
puruey me of harneys and suche thyngys as I schall nede besydes hors ,
vndyr that forme +tat my costys $shall $be {TEXT:schalbe} payd fore .
PASTON,I,660.225.6793

Syr , I am as yet no bettyr horsyd than I was whan I was wythe yow ,
PASTON,I,660.225.6794

for hors flesche is of suche a price here that my purce is schante able
to bye on hors ; wherfor I beseche yow to herkyn for some in yowre
contre` . PASTON,I,660.225.6796

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:33
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1444:48
LETTER:PASTON_225:M4:1492:AUTOGRAPH:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Syr , my cosyn John Heydon tolde me that +te Prior of Waburnes horse
was rially amendyd , and that +te Abott of Seynt Benetys schewed hym
there was a bay hors off a parsons nygh onto Seynt Benetis and +tat +te
Abot wolde gete hym for my cosyn Heydon at a resonable price .
PASTON,I,660.225.6797

AUTHOR:WILLIAM_PASTON_III:MALE:BROTHER:1459:33

Syr , my cosyn John Heydon woll geue me hys entrest in that hors if the
Abot haue bowght hym , PASTON,I,660.225.6798

Syr , as towardys my jurney to Caleys , the whyche I entende to haue
tane at my laste beyng wyth yow , jt was so I was dysapoyntyd of Thomas
Dey and an other man I scholde haue had be hys menys , as ye haue had
knowlege of or now . PASTON,I,660.225.6804

wyllyd me in ony wyse to tary on-tyl hys comyng to London ,

ye lyste , wyth +te grace of God , who haue yow in kepyng .

brodyr Wylliam Paston PASTON,I,661.225.6816

{ED:415._TO_JOHN_PASTON_III_1477,_FEBRUARY}

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:33
LETTER:PASTON_226:M4:1477:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> Vn-to my ryght welbelouyd Voluntyn John Paston , squyer , be
+tis bill delyuered , &c . </font> PASTON,I,662.226.6817

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:33
LETTER:PASTON_226:M4:1477:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Ryght reuerent and wurschypfull and my ryght welebeloued Voluntyne , I
recommande me vn-to yowe full hertely , desyring to here of yowr
welefare , whech I beseche Almyghty God long for to preserve vn-to hys
plesure and +gowr hertys desyre . PASTON,I,662.226.6818

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:33
LETTER:PASTON_226:M4:1477:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And yf it please +gowe to here of my welefare , I am not in good heele
of body ner of herte , PASTON,I,662.226.6819

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:33
LETTER:PASTON_226:M4:1477:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
nor schall be tyll I here from yowe ; PASTON,I,662.226.6820

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:33
LETTER:PASTON_226:M4:1477:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
For +ter wottys no creature what peyn +tat I endure ,
PASTON,I,662.226.6821

LETTER:PASTON_226:M4:1477:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA

And my lady my moder hath labored +te mater to my fadure full

but sche can no more gete +ten +ge knowe of , for +te whech God knowyth
I am full sory . PASTON,I,662.226.6824

LETTER:PASTON_226:M4:1477:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
But yf that +ge loffe me , as I tryste verely that +ge do , +ge will
not leffe me +terfor ; PASTON,I,662.226.6825

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:33
LETTER:PASTON_226:M4:1477:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
for if +tat +ge hade not halfe +te lyvelode +tat +ge hafe , for to do
+te grettyst labure +tat any woman on lyve myght , I wold not forsake
+gowe . PASTON,I,662.226.6826

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_

And yf +ge commande me to kepe me true where-euer I go Iwyse I will do
all my myght +gowe to love and neuer no mo . PASTON,I,662.226.6827

{ED:416._TO_JOHN_PASTON_III_1477,_FEBRUARY}

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:33
LETTER:PASTON_227:M4:1477:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To my ryght welebelouyd cosyn John Paston , swyere , be this
lettur delyueryd , &c . </font> PASTON,I,663.227.6834

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:33
LETTER:PASTON_227:M4:1477:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Ryght wurschypffull and welebelouyd Volentyne , in my moste vmble wyse
I recommande me vn-to yowe , &c . PASTON,I,663.227.6835

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:33
LETTER:PASTON_227:M4:1477:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And hertely I thanke yowe for +te letture whech that +ge sende me be
John Bekurton , wherby I vndyrstonde and knowe +tat +ge be purposyd to
com to Topcroft in schorte tyme , and wyth-owte any erand or mater but
only to hafe a conclusyon of +te mater betwyx my fadur and +gowe .
PASTON,I,663.227.6836

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:33
LETTER:PASTON_227:M4:1477:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
I wolde be most glad of any creature on lyve so +tat the mater myght
growe to effect . PASTON,I,663.227.6837

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:33
LETTER:PASTON_227:M4:1477:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And ther as +ge say , and +ge com and fynde +te mater no more toward
+ten +ge dyd afortyme +ge wold no more put my fadur and my lady my
moder to no cost ner besenesse for +tat cause a good wyle afture ,
weche causyth myn herte to be full hevy ; PASTON,I,663.227.6838

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:33
LETTER:PASTON_227:M4:1477:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and yf +tat +ge com and the mater take to non effecte , +ten schuld I
be meche more sory and full of heuynesse . PASTON,I,663.227.6839

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:33
LETTER:PASTON_227:M4:1477:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And as for my-selfe , I hafe don and vndyrstond in the mater +tat I can
or may , as Good knowyth . PASTON,I,663.227.6840

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:33
LETTER:PASTON_227:M4:1477:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And I lete yowe pleynly vndyrstond +tat my fader wyll no more money
parte wyth-all in that behalfe but an c li. and l marke , whech is
ryght far fro the acomplyshment of +gowr desyre . Wherfor , yf +tat +ge
cowde be content wyth +tat good and my por persone , I wold be +te
meryest mayden on grounde . PASTON,I,663.227.6841

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:33
LETTER:PASTON_227:M4:1477:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And yf +ge thynke not +gowr-selfe so satysfyed , or +tat +ge myght hafe
mech more good , as I hafe vndyrstonde be +gowe afor , good , trewe ,
and lovyng Volentyne , +tat +ge take no such labure vppon +gowe as to
com more for +tat mater ; PASTON,I,663.227.6842

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:33
LETTER:PASTON_227:M4:1477:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
but let it passe , and neuer more to be spokyn of , as I may be +gowr
trewe louer and bedewoman duryng my lyfe . PASTON,I,663.227.6843

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:33
LETTER:PASTON_227:M4:1477:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
No more vn-to yowe at thys tyme , but Almyghty Iesus preserve +gowe
bothe body and sowle , &c . PASTON,I,663.227.6844

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:33
LETTER:PASTON_227:M4:1477:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Be +gour Voluntyne Mergery Brews PASTON,I,663.227.6845

{ED:417._TO_JOHN_PASTON_III_PERHAPS_1481,_1_NOVEMBER}

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:37?
LETTER:PASTON_228:M4:1481?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To my right worshipful master John Paston , in haste . </font>
PASTON,I,664.228.6846

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:37?
LETTER:PASTON_228:M4:1481?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Right $reuerent {TEXT:reuernt} and worshipfull ser , in my moste vmble
vice I recomaunde me vnto yow as lowly as I can , &c .
PASTON,I,664.228.6847

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:37?
LETTER:PASTON_228:M4:1481?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Plese yow to wete John Howes , Alexander Qwharteyn , John Fille , wyth
the parson and the newe myller of Marlyngforth , haue goten Thom at
Welles carte of Estetodenham , fermor to myn vncle William Paston ,
Herry Herby of Meelton Magna , fermour and baly to my seide vncle ,
Richard Barkers carte of the seide towne of Meelton , late fermour and
yette is in daunger to my seide vncle , and William Smythes carte of
Brandon iuxta Bernham Broom , late fermour and baly and also in daunger
to my seide vncle , on Monday and Twesday last past caryed a-wey from
Merlyngforth in-to the place at Seint Edmondes in Norwich xij of your
greete plankes , of the weche they made vj loodes , beryng a-bowte the
seide cartes bowes and gleves for feere of takyng a-wey .
PASTON,I,664.228.6848

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:37?
LETTER:PASTON_228:M4:1481?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Ser , as for your tenauntes of Marlyngforth , they wythholde her catell
and hem-selfe bothe from the coorte PASTON,I,664.228.6849

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:37?
LETTER:PASTON_228:M4:1481?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and come not wythin the lordship PASTON,I,664.228.6850

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:37?
LETTER:PASTON_228:M4:1481?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
nor make noon attornment , exept Thom Davy and John Water , weche
absentyng of the tenauntes is to them a greet hurt and los for lak of
sedyng of ther londes wyth ther wynter corn ; besechyng you for Godes
sake to remembre som remedy for them . PASTON,I,664.228.6851

and ther was moche cominicacion of your mater be-twix you and myn vncle
, seyng to my Lady Caltorp ye nede not a go to London , ye myght haue
had an ende at home , rememberyng to my seid Lady Caltorp of the mocion
that he made towchyng the maner of Sporle , promyttyng to my lady to
a-bide +tat and to write and seale as largely as any man wol desire hym
; PASTON,I,664.228.6854

{ED:418._TO_JOHN_PASTON_III_PERHAPS_1481,_4_NOVEMBER}

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:37?
LETTER:PASTON_229:M4:1481?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To my ryght wurchupfull mayster John Paston , esquyer , be this
letter delyuerd in hast . </font> PASTON,I,665.229.6869

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:37?
LETTER:PASTON_229:M4:1481?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Myne owyn swete hert , jn my most humyl wyse I recomaund me on-to you ,
desyryng hertly to here of youre welfar , the wheche I beseche
Allemyghty God preserue and kepe to his pleser and youre hertys desyer
. PASTON,I,665.229.6870

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_?
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:37?
LETTER:PASTON_229:M4:1481?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Sere , the cause of my wrytyng to you at this tyme : on Friday att
nyght last past come Alexander Wharton , John Hous , and John Fylle ,
wyth ij good cartys well mannyd and horsyd wyth hem , to Marlyngford ,
PASTON,I,665.229.6871

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:37?
LETTER:PASTON_229:M4:1481?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and there at +te maner of Marlyngford and at the mille lodyn bothe
cartys wyth mestlyon and whete , PASTON,I,665.229.6872

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:37?

and betymys on Saturday in the mornyng they departyd fro Marlyngford
towardys Bongey , as it is seyd ; PASTON,I,665.229.6873

RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:37?
LETTER:PASTON_229:M4:1481?:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
for the seyd cartys come fro Bongey , as I soppose by the sendyng of
Bryon , PASTON,I,665.229.6874

{ED:419._TO_JOHN_PASTON_III_1486,_21_JANUARY}

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:42
LETTER:PASTON_230:M4:1486:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
<font> To my mastyr John Paston be this delyvird . </font>
PASTON,I,666.230.6900

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:42
LETTER:PASTON_230:M4:1486:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Ryght reuerent and wortschepfull syre , jn my most vmbill weysse I
recomaunde me to you , desyryng to here of your welfare , the wytche I
beseche God to preserve to his plesur and to your hartys desyir .
PASTON,I,666.230.6901

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:42
LETTER:PASTON_230:M4:1486:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Syr , I thank you for the venyson that ye sent me .
PASTON,I,666.230.6902

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:42
LETTER:PASTON_230:M4:1486:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
And youre schepe is seylyd owte of +te havene as this daye .
PASTON,I,666.230.6903

<P_I,667>

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:42
LETTER:PASTON_230:M4:1486:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Syr , I send you be my brodyr Wyllem your stomachere of damaske .
PASTON,I,667.230.6904

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:42
LETTER:PASTON_230:M4:1486:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
As for youre teppet of velvet , it is not here ; PASTON,I,667.230.6905

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:42
LETTER:PASTON_230:M4:1486:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
An seythe that ye put yt jn your casket at London .
PASTON,I,667.230.6906

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:42
LETTER:PASTON_230:M4:1486:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Syr , your chyldryn be jn goode helle , bellsside be God .
PASTON,I,667.230.6907

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:42
LETTER:PASTON_230:M4:1486:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Syr , I prey you sende me the gowild that I spak to you of be the nexst
man that comythe to Norwytche . PASTON,I,667.230.6908

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:42
LETTER:PASTON_230:M4:1486:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Syr , your mast that laye at Yermowythe is letyn to a scheppe of Hull
for xiij s. iiij d. ; PASTON,I,667.230.6909

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:42
LETTER:PASTON_230:M4:1486:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
and if ther fawyll ony hurt ther-to ye schall have a new mast ther-for
. PASTON,I,667.230.6910

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:42
LETTER:PASTON_230:M4:1486:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
No mor to you at this tyme , but Almyty God have you in his kepyng .
PASTON,I,667.230.6911

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:42
LETTER:PASTON_230:M4:1486:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
Wretyn at Castyr Hawill the xxj daye of Janeuer jn the furst yere of
Kyng Harry the vij=th= . Be your seruaunt Margery Paston
PASTON,I,667.230.6912

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:42
LETTER:PASTON_230:M4:1486:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR
I prey God no ladyis no more ovyr-com you that ye geve no lenggar
respyt jn your materys . PASTON,I,667.230.6913

{ED:420._TO_JOHN_PASTON_III_1489,_10_FEBRUARY}

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:45
LETTER:PASTON_231:M4:1489:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
<font> To my rygth wurchypful maystyr Syr John Paston , knyth , +tis
lettyr be delyveryd in hast . </font> PASTON,I,667.231.6914

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:45
LETTER:PASTON_231:M4:1489:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Rygth reuerent and worchypfull syr , in +te most owmble wyse I recomand
me vn-to yow , desyryng to here of yowre welfare , +te qwech God long
contynew . PASTON,I,667.231.6915

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:45
LETTER:PASTON_231:M4:1489:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Syr , myn brodyr Wyllyam recomawnd hym on-to yow ,
PASTON,I,667.231.6916

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:45
LETTER:PASTON_231:M4:1489:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and as for +te lettyr +tat +ge sent on-to hym , he hath schewyd my lord
+te entent +ter-off PASTON,I,667.231.6917

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:45
LETTER:PASTON_231:M4:1489:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and he thynkyth hym-self +tat it is no part of hys dute` to have any
part of +te fysch ore any mony +tat schuld grow +ter-of .
PASTON,I,667.231.6918

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:45
LETTER:PASTON_231:M4:1489:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Never +te lasse my lord , acordyng as yowre desyre was in +te letter ,
had qwestyond John a Lowe of thys fych , a-for +te comyng of John
Danyel , what he had doon <P_I,668> wyth-all , PASTON,I,668.231.6919

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:45
LETTER:PASTON_231:M4:1489:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and he aunswerd as for +te nedyre chavyll +ter-of he had put it in
sewrte` and leyd it in a howse be-cawse yowre debyte` seasyd it to my
lordys vse tyll it myth be vndyrstond wedyre +te propyrte` ware in +te
Kyng or in my lord . PASTON,I,668.231.6920

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:45
LETTER:PASTON_231:M4:1489:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And so my lord held hym well content it schud be so , in so moch as +te
Kyng and my lord have comawndyd John a Lowe +tat thys forsayd chavyll
schuld be browth vp to +te Kyng in all goodly hast .
PASTON,I,668.231.6921

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:45
LETTER:PASTON_231:M4:1489:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Fardermore my brodyr Wyllyam perseyvyd be yowre wrytyng +tat ye cowd
make +te remnawnth of +te fych worth a iiij li. to my lord .
PASTON,I,668.231.6922

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:45
LETTER:PASTON_231:M4:1489:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
My lord wold +ge schuld not trobyll yowre-self no more wyth-all
be-cawse he thynkyth +tat +te propyrte` is not in hym .
PASTON,I,668.231.6923

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:45
LETTER:PASTON_231:M4:1489:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
And also anodyre , my brodyre Wyllyam heryth sey in +te corte +tat +te
Kyng and my lord be content +tat +te remenavnt of +te fych be to +te
vse of them of +te cuntre` , +te wech +ge schall here +te more serteyn
+ter-of here-after . PASTON,I,668.231.6924

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:45
LETTER:PASTON_231:M4:1489:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
Also my broder Wyllyam seyth +tat my lord wyllyd yow +tat +ge schuld
send +te retorne of +te comyscion as hastyly as +ge can ,
PASTON,I,668.231.6925

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:45
LETTER:PASTON_231:M4:1489:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
and mervell +tat +ge hath not sent it vp or thys .
PASTON,I,668.231.6926

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
RECIPIENT:JOHN_PASTON_III:MALE:HUSBAND:1444:45
LETTER:PASTON_231:M4:1489:COPY:FAMILY_NUCLEAR_CODE_METADATA
As tovardys +te brekyng vp of +te parlement , many lykelywoodys +ter be
+tat it schuld contynew no wyle , PASTON,I,668.231.6927

AUTHOR:MARGERY_PASTON[N.BREWS]:FEMALE:WIFE:_:_
